original: ji ltar blo nyid yin gyi don ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar blo nyid yin gyi don ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it the mind and not the object?

original: bsgrub bya sgrub par rtog pa la zhes smos so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub par rtog pa la zhes smos so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúin the conception of the probandum as proven.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbye ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed du rtogs pa la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbye ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed du rtogs pa la yod pa yin no //
translated: Because the division of phenomena exists in the conception of the probandum as proven.

original: gal te de don la yod pa nyid yin na ni de'i tshe bsgrub bya sgrub par rtogs pa la dngos po mthong ba yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir bsgrub bya @248b sgrub par rtogs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de don la yod pa nyid yin na ni de'i tshe bsgrub bya sgrub par rtogs pa la dngos po mthong ba yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir bsgrub bya @248b sgrub par rtogs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does exist in reality, then at that time, since one would see the thing in order to understand the proof of the probandum, one would not understand the proof of the probandum.

original: des na dngos po mthong ba nyams pa'i phyir 'di ni blo'i yul nyid do //
analyzed: des na dngos po mthong ba nyams pa'i phyir 'di ni blo'i yul nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because the seeing of the thing is lost, it is the object of the mind.

original: ji ltar bya ba 'di blo nyid la mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: ji ltar bya ba 'di blo nyid la mngon par brjod do //
translated: How is this activity expressed in the mind?

original: gang gi phyir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos ba lang gi ldog pa'i khyad par can rang gi mtshan nyid bzung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos ba lang gi ldog pa'i khyad par can rang gi mtshan nyid bzung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the master DignƒÅga accepts that he apprehends the specific nature of the exclusion of cow.

original: de ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: That is not so.

original: khyad par ni rang gi mtshan nyid la /
analyzed: khyad par ni rang gi mtshan nyid la /
translated: The specific nature is the exclusion.

original: spyi dang 'dras zhes bya ba ni ldog pa khyad par du byas pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang 'dras zhes bya ba ni ldog pa khyad par du byas pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means that the specific nature that is qualified by the exclusion is not apprehended.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bshad pa / de ni spyi dang khyad par la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / de ni spyi dang khyad par la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: Because it is not apprehended as the nature of a generality, a particular, and so on.

original: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na zhes ston pa ni gcig la khyad par rnam pa mang po dag mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na zhes ston pa ni gcig la khyad par rnam pa mang po dag mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Why is that? He explains: Because many different aspects are not suitable in one thing.

original: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i yul ma yin la rnam par rtog pa'i yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni sgra'i yul ma yin la rnam par rtog pa'i yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: Therefore he explains: The intrinsic identity is not the object of words and it is not the object of conceptuality.

original: de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúits nature‚Äù is that.

original: des na de ltar don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba 'di'i mthar thug pas ni dngos po la bsgrub bya'i yul can gyi gnyen por gyur pa tha dad pa'i don can nyid bshad la /
analyzed: des na de ltar don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba 'di'i mthar thug pas ni dngos po la bsgrub bya'i yul can gyi gnyen por gyur pa tha dad pa'i don can nyid bshad la /
translated: Thus, in this way, the ultimate of this classification of ‚Äúone entity of the object‚Äù and so on explains the meaning of difference as the antidote to the object of affirmation in things.

original: de yang sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
translated: Moreover, it is the nature that eliminates superimposition.

original: don de la yang ldog pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi yul yang dngos su ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: don de la yang ldog pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi yul yang dngos su ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Also, the object that has the nature of a negation is not directly the object of that meaning.

original: 'on kyang lhag par zhen pa la ltos nas yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang lhag par zhen pa la ltos nas yin no //
translated: However, it is in dependence upon the special adherence to the object.

original: dngos po'i yul can ma yin na yang rnam par gzhag pa mi 'ga' ba'i phyir ltos pa mtha' dag sel ba gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can ma yin na yang rnam par gzhag pa mi 'ga' ba'i phyir ltos pa mtha' dag sel ba gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Even though it is not an object of real things, it is still a valid cognition because it is not contradicted by other cognitions.üîΩNow, in order to show that it is also established in another way, he says, ‚ÄúMoreover, why is it called . . . ?‚ÄùüîΩThe word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.üîΩThe word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.üîΩThe word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.

original: da ni rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir skabs dang 'brel pa nyid du brjod pa ni yang ci'i phyir zhes bya bas /üîΩde de bzhin du rtogs byed pa'i //üîΩsgra yod ma yin rtogs pa yang //
analyzed: da ni rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir skabs dang 'brel pa nyid du brjod pa ni yang ci'i phyir zhes bya bas / de de bzhin du rtogs byed pa'i // sgra yod ma yin rtogs pa yang //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.üîΩThe word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.üîΩThe word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.

analyzed: zhes bshad pa la rtsod par byed do //

original: 'dir ni des spyi khyad par du zhes bya ba'i bye brag 'di ni blo don la zhes bya bas de nyid sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag gi yul yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir ni des spyi khyad par du zhes bya ba'i bye brag 'di ni blo don la zhes bya bas de nyid sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag gi yul yin gyi /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is established in another way.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no zhes gnas pa na /üîΩde'i yul la brgal zhing brtag par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no zhes gnas pa na /üîΩde'i yul la brgal zhing brtag par byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used

original: mi sbyor ba'i gtan tshigs bshad pa ni /
analyzed: mi sbyor ba'i gtan tshigs bshad pa ni /
translated: The reason for non-application is stated:

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúbecause‚Äù .

original: brdar btags pa'i khyad par can sgra'i brjod par bya bar @249a * //
analyzed: brdar btags pa'i khyad par can sgra'i brjod par bya bar @249a * //
translated: The object of expression of the word ‚Äúparticular‚Äù is indicated by the convention.

original: bstan to // de ston pa ni de la rab tu sbyor ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: bstan to // de ston pa ni de la rab tu sbyor ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: The teaching of that is the application to that, that is, the expression of that,

original: de rtogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it causes the understanding of that.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gal te dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid kyis sgra rnams don la 'jug par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid kyis sgra rnams don la 'jug par 'gyur na ni /
translated: If the nature of things were to cause the engagement of words in objects,

original: de dag gi de rang gi mtshan nyid las 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gi de rang gi mtshan nyid las 'gyur te /
translated: then that would be due to their intrinsic identity,

original: dper na mig la sogs pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mig la sogs pa de bzhin no //
translated: just like the eye, etc.

original: gang gi tshe de dag der mthong ba la ltos nas 'jug pa de'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid la mi 'jug go //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de dag der mthong ba la ltos nas 'jug pa de'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid la mi 'jug go //
translated: When they engage in that in dependence on seeing, then they do not engage in intrinsic identity.

original: dngos po la 'brel pa yod kyang tha snyad la de dag gi 'jug pa ni mthong ba la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po la 'brel pa yod kyang tha snyad la de dag gi 'jug pa ni mthong ba la ltos pa yin la /
translated: Even though there is a connection with things, their engagement in conventions is dependent on seeing.

original: 'brel pa med na ni tha snyad la mthong ba de nyid brdar 'gyur ba yin gyi mthong ba la ltos pa la ni rtsod pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa med na ni tha snyad la mthong ba de nyid brdar 'gyur ba yin gyi mthong ba la ltos pa la ni rtsod pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: If there is no relation, then the mere seeing of the conventional would be the convention, but there is no dispute about the dependence on seeing.

original: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la brdar byas pa rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la sbyor bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la brdar byas pa rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la sbyor bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the convention is made only with respect to the intrinsic identity, then the application would be only with respect to the intrinsic identity.

original: ji ltar de la mi sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de la mi sbyor zhe na /
translated: How is it not applied?

original: dogs pa 'di bsu nas brda'i dgos pa ston pas de la med par bshad pa ni /üîΩde ni tha snyad ched du byas //
analyzed: dogs pa 'di bsu nas brda'i dgos pa ston pas de la med par bshad pa ni / de ni tha snyad ched du byas //
translated: Anticipating this doubt, he explains that it does not exist there by showing the purpose of the convention:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is for the sake of convention.

original: gang gi tshe 'di dgos pa de dag de'i tshe sgra 'di las rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di dgos pa de dag de'i tshe sgra 'di las rig par bya ste /
translated: When it has those purposes, then it is understood from this sound:

original: blang ba'am spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don du sgra dgod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: blang ba'am spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don du sgra dgod pa yin gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is to be accepted or rejected.‚Äù This is the meaning for which the sound is applied.

original: de la sgra bkod pas de nyid kyi tshe rtogs pa la ni don 'ga' yang med do ;
analyzed: de la sgra bkod pas de nyid kyi tshe rtogs pa la ni don 'ga' yang med do ;
translated: But when it is applied to that, there is no meaning at all in the understanding at that time.

original: ; lan cig rtogs pas ni dgod pa'i gzhir gyur kyang ji skad brjod pa'i bsam pas de la sbyor bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'gal yang slar 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ; lan cig rtogs pas ni dgod pa'i gzhir gyur kyang ji skad brjod pa'i bsam pas de la sbyor bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'gal yang slar 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even though it is the basis for the establishment of the one who has realized it once, it is not the case that there is a later reversal of that, even though there is a contradiction in the application of the term to it, as it was stated.

original: des na rang gi mtshan nyid la brda ma yin pa'i phyir de la sgra sbyor ba med do //
analyzed: des na rang gi mtshan nyid la brda ma yin pa'i phyir de la sgra sbyor ba med do //
translated: Therefore, because the intrinsic identity is not the conventional symbol, the term is not applied to it.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: That is explained:

original: sgra rnams kyis ni zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyis ni zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe terms‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir mdo bzhin dgos pa sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir mdo bzhin dgos pa sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Here the purpose should be applied according to the s≈´tra.

original: tha snyad kyi don du 'dogs na zhes brjod pas ni ci nas kyang zhes bya ba ni tha snyad yin la /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi don du 'dogs na zhes brjod pas ni ci nas kyang zhes bya ba ni tha snyad yin la /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúIf it is designated for the sake of convention‚Äù shows that ‚Äúin any case‚Äù is a convention.

original: de la yang de nye bar mkho bar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la yang de nye bar mkho bar bshad pa yin no //
translated: And it is explained that it is also necessary for that.

original: sgra de ni yul la sogs pa tha dad la mi 'jug pa'i phyir phyis mi 'jug go //
analyzed: sgra de ni yul la sogs pa tha dad la mi 'jug pa'i phyir phyis mi 'jug go //
translated: That term does not later engage, because it does not engage in the differences of object and so on.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa yin te /
translated: The intrinsic identity is ascertained by object, time, and aspect.

original: de bas na gang gis de las gzhan la 'jug par 'gyur ba de la nges par sbyar bas yul dang dus dang rnam pa spong bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de bas na gang gis de las gzhan la 'jug par 'gyur ba de la nges par sbyar bas yul dang dus dang rnam pa spong bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, since it is applied to that which is other than that, how can it be that the object, time, and aspect are excluded?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la mi sbyor mod /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la mi sbyor mod /
translated: It is not applied to the intrinsic identity.

original: 'on kyang spyi la 'gyur ba'i phyir blo'i don gyi @249b yul can nyid rtsod pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes rtsod pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang spyi la 'gyur ba'i phyir blo'i don gyi @249b yul can nyid rtsod pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes rtsod pa ni /
translated: However, since it is applied to the universal, the cognition that has an object is still disputed.

original: 'o na spyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na spyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Well, then, what is this so-called universal?

original: sgra ni mthong ba la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni mthong ba la ltos pa yin no //
translated: The word is dependent on the seen.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid yul yin na mthong ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan du yang ma mthong bas na sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid yul yin na mthong ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan du yang ma mthong bas na sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the intrinsic identity is the object, then since the intrinsic identity of the seen is not engaged and since the intrinsic identity is not seen elsewhere, it is applied.

original: spyi yul yin na ni skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: spyi yul yin na ni skyon 'di med de /
translated: If the universal is the object, then this fault does not arise.

original: khyab pa'i phyir yang dang yang nye bar gnas pa der nye bar mkho ba yod na sbyor ba'i rten nyid du mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyab pa'i phyir yang dang yang nye bar gnas pa der nye bar mkho ba yod na sbyor ba'i rten nyid du mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Since it is pervasive, it is not contradictory that it is the basis of application when it is present again and again and when there is a need for it to be present there.

original: 'di zlog par byed pa de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zlog par byed pa de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: 'di ltar don byed par nus pa shes nas don byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes don rnams la rjod par byed pa sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar don byed par nus pa shes nas don byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes don rnams la rjod par byed pa sbyor bar byed do //
translated: Thus, having understood that the object is capable of performing a function, one engages in the activity of accomplishing the function of the object.

original: sngar ni gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can spangs par 'gyur ba lan cig bkod pa yang rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can tha snyad kyi don du bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar ni gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can spangs par 'gyur ba lan cig bkod pa yang rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can tha snyad kyi don du bstan pa yin la /
translated: Previously, it was shown that the object of a specific characteristic is abandoned by the cognition of the object, and that conventional objects are taught to have the result of cognition.

original: da lta ni tha snyad de nyid kyi dgos pa ji lta bur gyur pa de brtags pas tha snyad du byas pa'i don spyi'i rang bzhin du nye bar ston pas spyi'i yul can nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'di brjod do //
analyzed: da lta ni tha snyad de nyid kyi dgos pa ji lta bur gyur pa de brtags pas tha snyad du byas pa'i don spyi'i rang bzhin du nye bar ston pas spyi'i yul can nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'di brjod do //
translated: Now, by examining what the purpose of that convention is, it is stated that the object of convention is of the nature of a universal, thus clarifying that it has a universal as its object.

original: 'di ltar gal te sgra nges par sbyar ba'i yul ji ltar rtogs bzhin pa'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i spyi srid na ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te sgra nges par sbyar ba'i yul ji ltar rtogs bzhin pa'i rang bzhin de lta bu'i spyi srid na ni /
translated: Thus, if a universal that exists in the way it is cognized by the application of a term were the object of that term,

original: spyi yul du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: spyi yul du 'gyur gyi /
translated: then it would be the object of the universal.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: But not otherwise.

original: de la rang dam gzhan don bya ba don du gnyer bas don bya ba nus pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sgra sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de la rang dam gzhan don bya ba don du gnyer bas don bya ba nus pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sgra sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The application of a word is for the purpose of realizing the nature of the object that is able to perform a function, because one seeks to benefit oneself and others.

original: des na spyi don bya bar nus pa nyid yin na rigs sbyor ba'i yul du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: des na spyi don bya bar nus pa nyid yin na rigs sbyor ba'i yul du 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, if the universal is able to perform a function, it is the object of the application of a word.

original: don bya ba nus pa'i yul ma yin na ni /
analyzed: don bya ba nus pa'i yul ma yin na ni /
translated: If it is not the object of the ability to perform a function,

original: sgra nges par sbyar ba rigs kyi yul can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra nges par sbyar ba rigs kyi yul can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the application of a word is not the object of a word that has an object.

original: des na 'dis ni nges par sbyor ba ni don bya bar nus pa'i yul can yin no zhes gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dis ni nges par sbyor ba ni don bya bar nus pa'i yul can yin no zhes gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this establishes the thesis that the application of a word is the object of the ability to perform a function.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni 'jig rten na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni 'jig rten na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is explained by ‚Äúin the world.‚Äù

original: re zhig 'jig rten pa'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad thams cad ni 'bras bu 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba can kho na'o //
analyzed: re zhig 'jig rten pa'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad thams cad ni 'bras bu 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba can kho na'o //
translated: All conventions of engagement and disengagement in the world are preceded by the desire for a result.

original: des na brda sbyar ba las 'bras bu 'dod pa'am de sbyar ba'i yul las 'bras bu 'dod par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: des na brda sbyar ba las 'bras bu 'dod pa'am de sbyar ba'i yul las 'bras bu 'dod par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Therefore, if one desires a result from the application of a sign, or if one desires a result from the object of the application of a sign,

original: de la re zhig rnam par rtog pa dang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig rnam par rtog pa dang po ni ma yin te /
translated: The first conception is not so.

original: 'jig rten gyi rtogs pa ni don la brten pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rtogs pa ni don la brten pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir yin gyi /
translated: For, worldly understanding is of the form of desire for an effect that is based on an object.

original: nges par sbyar pa nyid las 'bras bu grub par @250a * //
analyzed: nges par sbyar pa nyid las 'bras bu grub par @250a * //
translated: It is not that one understands the effect to be established from the mere connection.

original: rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The second conception is not so.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa las bzlog nas nges par sbyor ba la 'bras bu 'dod pa ni nyam nga ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa las bzlog nas nges par sbyor ba la 'bras bu 'dod pa ni nyam nga ba zhes brjod do //
translated: For, the desire for an effect in the connection that is the opposite of the desire of the world is called ‚Äúdangerous.‚Äù

original: rigs pa ni 'dir 'thad pas grub pa nyid kyis brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rigs pa ni 'dir 'thad pas grub pa nyid kyis brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, reasoning is not stated by way of establishment by valid cognition.

original: 'on kyang 'jig rten pa'i rtogs pa dpyad pa nyid kyis bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jig rten pa'i rtogs pa dpyad pa nyid kyis bshad pa yin no //
translated: But, rather, worldly understanding is explained by way of analysis.

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin bshad pa ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin bshad pa ni //
translated: The nature of the effect is explained:

original: de ni thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ni thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThat is all‚Äù means that the effect is all.

original: 'bras bu ni thams cad nyid ni 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag bdag nyid la 'brel ba dang bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni thams cad nyid ni 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag bdag nyid la 'brel ba dang bzlog pa yin te /
translated: The effect is all, both the desired, which is pleasure, and the undesired, which is pain, in connection with oneself and the opposite.

original: 'di ltar 'di bdag nyid bde ba dang 'brel par 'gyur ba dang sdug bsngal dang bye par byas pa ni 'bras bur sems pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di bdag nyid bde ba dang 'brel par 'gyur ba dang sdug bsngal dang bye par byas pa ni 'bras bur sems pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the thought that this is the effect of the relation of self to pleasure and the separation from pain is the effect of the relation of self to pain.

original: des na 'di rang gi bdag nyid dam gzhan la 'bras bu de bskyed pa'i don du de'i sgrub par byed pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag ni sbyar ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i
analyzed: des na 'di rang gi bdag nyid dam gzhan la 'bras bu de bskyed pa'i don du de'i sgrub par byed pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa dang ldog pa dag ni sbyar ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i
translated: Therefore, the engagement and disengagement that are preceded by the knowledge of the means of achieving that effect for the sake of generating that effect in either oneself or another are the effect of the application.

original: phyir nges par sbyar ba ni don bya bar nus pa'i yul can du rtogs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
analyzed: phyir nges par sbyar ba ni don bya bar nus pa'i yul can du rtogs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub bo //
translated: Thus, it is established that the ascertainment of the object that is capable of effective action is the result of the application.

original: de de ltar gnas pa na rigs de ni byed par nus pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de de ltar gnas pa na rigs de ni byed par nus pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: When it is thus ascertained, in order to show that the object is not capable of effective action, the treatise states:

original: de la rigs don byed rung min //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'bras bu sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba dang ldan pa yin la //
analyzed: de la rigs don byed rung min // zhes bya ba'o // 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba dang ldan pa yin la //
translated: The object is not capable of effective action.üîΩThe establishment of the effect is an action.

original: bya ba dang ldan pa yang rdzas kho na yin te /
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pa yang rdzas kho na yin te /
translated: And that which has action is a substance.

original: des na rigs don byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rigs don byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the universal does not perform the function.

original: don bya ba byed par rtogs pa la bkod pa'i sgra dag ni don bya ba mi nus pa'i yul du rtogs par nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: don bya ba byed par rtogs pa la bkod pa'i sgra dag ni don bya ba mi nus pa'i yul du rtogs par nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And the words that are applied to the understanding of the performance of the function are not capable of being understood as having a non-functional object.

original: de la 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is error in that case,

original: 'o na ni tha snyad rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul nyid du rtogs pa yang 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'o na ni tha snyad rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul nyid du rtogs pa yang 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: then the understanding that has as its domain the conformity of convention is also erroneous, and so it would have a particular as its object.

original: rtogs pa 'ga' zhig 'khrul par mi 'thad pa yin na ni /
analyzed: rtogs pa 'ga' zhig 'khrul par mi 'thad pa yin na ni /
translated: Or, if it is not tenable that any understanding is erroneous,

original: rang gi kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be particular only.üîΩFor example,

original: dper na / sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags ston //
analyzed: dper na / sgra rnams kyis ni brdar btags ston //
translated: the words teach the conventional symbol.

original: zhes bya bas rjes su 'gro ba la rtogs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya bas rjes su 'gro ba la rtogs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus, the understanding of the conformity does not have a particular as its object.üîΩThe response is:

original: bshad pa ; de bzhin du don bya bar nus pa'i yul can du rtogs pa'i phyir don bya ba mi nus pa'i yul can ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa ; de bzhin du don bya bar nus pa'i yul can du rtogs pa'i phyir don bya ba mi nus pa'i yul can ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, because it is understood as having a functional object, it does not have a non-functional object.

original: don du nus par rtogs pa 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don du nus par rtogs pa 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is mistaken to understand that it is able to perform a function,

original: 'o na ni tha snyad rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul nyid du rtogs pa yang 'khrul pa des na rtogs pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyi @250b yul can du 'gyur ba'am rtogs pa 'ga' zhig 'khrul par mi 'thad na ni /
analyzed: 'o na ni tha snyad rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul nyid du rtogs pa yang 'khrul pa des na rtogs pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyi @250b yul can du 'gyur ba'am rtogs pa 'ga' zhig 'khrul par mi 'thad na ni /
translated: then it is also mistaken to understand that it is the object of a conventional consciousness. Therefore, either that understanding would be of a specifically characterized object or it would be untenable for any understanding to be mistaken.

original: rang nyid gnod pa med pa'i dmigs pa ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin rtogs pa na /
analyzed: rang nyid gnod pa med pa'i dmigs pa ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin rtogs pa na /
translated: When one understands an object that is not undermined, one understands it as it is.

original: don bya ba nus pa'i blo spyi la dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don bya ba nus pa'i blo spyi la dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: When one understands a universal that is the object of a non-mistaken consciousness, one does not understand it as able to perform a function.

original: des na rigs kyi yul can nyid kyi sgra 'god pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rigs kyi yul can nyid kyi sgra 'god pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the term ‚Äúspecifically characterized‚Äù is not used.

original: rigs ni don byed par mi nus kyang don byed par nus pa rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs ni don byed par mi nus kyang don byed par nus pa rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir brjod pa yin no //
translated: Although a universal is not able to perform a function, it is said to be able to perform a function because it causes the understanding of that which is able to perform a function.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni tha snyad la brjod par mi nus pa yin gyi med pa ni ma yin pas na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni tha snyad la brjod par mi nus pa yin gyi med pa ni ma yin pas na /
translated: A specifically characterized object is not able to be expressed in conventional terms, but it is not nonexistent.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni don byed par mi nus kyang brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni don byed par mi nus kyang brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Although a universal is not able to perform a function, it is able to be expressed.

original: de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: de rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
translated: Because it is realized,üîΩand that is the performance of the object‚Äôs function.

original: de yang don bya ba byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gal te gsal ba bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: de yang don bya ba byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gal te gsal ba bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚ÄúBecause the manifestation cannot be taught.‚Äù

original: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni 'brel pa yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni 'brel pa yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to reverse that, he says, ‚ÄúEven if there were a connection.‚Äù

original: tha snyad la bstan par mi nus pa'i gsal ba mtshon pa'i phyir gyis brjod pa yin na mtshon pa de'i sgra'i byed pa 'am rigs kyi byed pa yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: tha snyad la bstan par mi nus pa'i gsal ba mtshon pa'i phyir gyis brjod pa yin na mtshon pa de'i sgra'i byed pa 'am rigs kyi byed pa yin par 'gyur /
translated: If the manifestation were expressed in order to demonstrate the conventional, then the expression would be the function of the word or the function of the class.

original: gang gis na sgrogs so zhes bya bar rgyun ston par byed pa gang gi sgra ni de la sgrogs pa mi srid pas na /
analyzed: gang gis na sgrogs so zhes bya bar rgyun ston par byed pa gang gi sgra ni de la sgrogs pa mi srid pas na /
translated: How could it be that the word is expressed in that way? Since it is impossible for the word to express that,

original: tshig gi don gzhan dang 'brel pa 'gal ba'i phyir gal te rang gi don bstan pa la don gzhan dang 'brel par go bar byed pa de ltar bstan pa yin pa'i phyir sgra'i brjod bya nyid du 'gyur ba des na /
analyzed: tshig gi don gzhan dang 'brel pa 'gal ba'i phyir gal te rang gi don bstan pa la don gzhan dang 'brel par go bar byed pa de ltar bstan pa yin pa'i phyir sgra'i brjod bya nyid du 'gyur ba des na /
translated: if the word were to express its own meaning in connection with another meaning, then it would be the object of expression of the word, because it would be taught in that way.

original: mtshon pa zhes bya ba de ci zhig / de ltar rtogs pa gzhung btsugs par yang mi 'gyur ro //üîΩji ltar 'dir dngos kyi don mtshon pa'i yul las gzhan nyid du nges pa de bzhin du ba lang khyer la shog ces bya ba la ba lang gi tshig gi don khyer te 'ong ba'i bya ba dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gsal ba la phyogs par rtogs
analyzed: mtshon pa zhes bya ba de ci zhig / de ltar rtogs pa gzhung btsugs par yang mi 'gyur ro // ji ltar 'dir dngos kyi don mtshon pa'i yul las gzhan nyid du nges pa de bzhin du ba lang khyer la shog ces bya ba la ba lang gi tshig gi don khyer te 'ong ba'i bya ba dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gsal ba la phyogs par rtogs
translated: What is this so-called indication? And thus the thesis that the word is the cause of the cognition of the object is not established.

original: pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Just as the object of indication is ascertained to be different from the object of the primary meaning, in the same way, in the sentence ‚ÄúBring the cow,‚Äù the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is not understood to refer to the action of bringing, because the meaning of the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is not related to the action of bringing.

original: 'on kyang de nyid de ltar rtogs pa yin pa des na rigs kyi don nyams so //
analyzed: 'on kyang de nyid de ltar rtogs pa yin pa des na rigs kyi don nyams so //
translated: But it is understood in that way, and thus the meaning of the word is lost.

original: slob dpon gyis khas blangs nas kyang rigs sgra'i don yin na /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis khas blangs nas kyang rigs sgra'i don yin na /
translated: The master [DignƒÅga] accepts that, and if the class is the meaning of the word,

original: rnam pa thams cad du gsal ba rtogs pa med par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gsal ba rtogs pa med par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad gsungs so //
translated: he says this in order to prove that in no way is the individual understood.

original: mtshon pa'i yul ni sgra'i don ma yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa yod du zin kyang sgras ma brjod pa de la 'jug par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: mtshon pa'i yul ni sgra'i don ma yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa yod du zin kyang sgras ma brjod pa de la 'jug par mi 'thad do //
translated: Because the object of indication is not the meaning of the word, even if there is a relation, it is not tenable that it is engaged by the word, since it is not expressed by the word.

original: gsal ba'i sgra'i don yin mi srid pa'i phyir de sgras ma brjod pa na /
analyzed: gsal ba'i sgra'i don yin mi srid pa'i phyir de sgras ma brjod pa na /
translated: because it is impossible for it to be the meaning of the term ‚Äúmanifestation.‚Äù

original: rigs de dang 'brel pa'i phyir @251a * //
analyzed: rigs de dang 'brel pa'i phyir @251a * //
translated: If it is not expressed by that term,

original: de'i ci zhig ltar rtogs pa na /
analyzed: de'i ci zhig ltar rtogs pa na /
translated: then how is it understood?

original: sgra las rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / de nyid tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ram brjod par 'dod pa ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad mas grub pa'am /
analyzed: sgra las rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / de nyid tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ram brjod par 'dod pa ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad mas grub pa'am /
translated: It is not understood from the term, because that itself is a valid cognition, or because it reveals what is intended to be expressed, it is established by a valid cognition.

original: smra ba po'i mngon par 'dod pa de ltar rtogs pa na ji ltar rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: smra ba po'i mngon par 'dod pa de ltar rtogs pa na ji ltar rtogs pa yin /
translated: If it is understood in accordance with the speaker‚Äôs desire, how is it understood?

original: 'brel du zin kyang sgra rtogs par byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: 'brel du zin kyang sgra rtogs par byed pa ma yin na /
translated: Even if there is a connection, the term does not cause understanding.

original: don gyis rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: don gyis rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation that ‚Äúif there is no understanding through the meaning, it is not understood‚Äù

original: 'ga' zhig la khar ba chod cig ces smras na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la khar ba chod cig ces smras na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is like the example of someone saying, ‚ÄúCut the stick!‚Äù

original: khar ba chod cig ces smras na khar ba la gnas pa'i gcod pa nags sgras ma brjod pa'i don gyis rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: khar ba chod cig ces smras na khar ba la gnas pa'i gcod pa nags sgras ma brjod pa'i don gyis rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: When one says, ‚ÄúCut the stick!‚Äù there is no understanding of the meaning that is not expressed by the term ‚Äúcutting‚Äù that resides in the stick.

original: gal te khar ba gcod pa ni srid pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te khar ba gcod pa ni srid pa yin gyi /
translated: If it is possible to cut the stick,

original: rigs ni blang ba la sogs par srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs ni blang ba la sogs par srid pa ma yin te /
translated: The class is not possible in the case of taking up, etc.

original: des na de ni mtshon pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di nyid du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na de ni mtshon pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di nyid du yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not the indicator, but rather this very thing.

original: mi srid pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause it is impossible.‚Äù

original: mi srid na ni sgra'i don rnar mi 'ong bar 'gyur gyi de khyad du bsad nas sgra'i don ma yin yang gzhan la 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mi srid na ni sgra'i don rnar mi 'ong bar 'gyur gyi de khyad du bsad nas sgra'i don ma yin yang gzhan la 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is impossible, the meaning of the word will not be heard. But it is not the case that the meaning of the word is disregarded and something else is applied, even though it is not the meaning of the word.

original: glang bzho bar brjod pa na de la mi srid pa'i phyir glang gi sgra des bskyed pa ba lang bzho ba'i spyod yul can du nges pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang ma 'brel pa nyid du zad do //
analyzed: glang bzho bar brjod pa na de la mi srid pa'i phyir glang gi sgra des bskyed pa ba lang bzho ba'i spyod yul can du nges pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang ma 'brel pa nyid du zad do //
translated: When milking a cow is expressed, because it is impossible in that case, the word cow does not produce the ascertainment that the object of milking is a cow, but rather it is simply unconnected.

original: de bzhin du gang na 'bod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag tu yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang na 'bod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag tu yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand in the case of such expressions as ‚Äúhe is calling,‚Äù etc.

original: ci ste yang rang gi don la phyogs pa spang nas tshig gi don gzhan gtsor byed pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa na de brjod pa yin yang de ltar sgra nyid brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang rang gi don la phyogs pa spang nas tshig gi don gzhan gtsor byed pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa na de brjod pa yin yang de ltar sgra nyid brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the word is not related to the object because it is set aside from its own object and the object of another word is emphasized, then even though that is expressed, the word itself is expressed in that way.

original: de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: To refute that, it is explained:

original: don gzhan brjod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gzhan brjod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If another object is expressed.

original: sngar ni don gyi byed pa bkag pa yin la da ltar ni sgra'i byed pa 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: sngar ni don gyi byed pa bkag pa yin la da ltar ni sgra'i byed pa 'gog pa'o //
translated: Previously, the function of the object was refuted, but now the function of the word is refuted.

original: de nyid kyang phyir 'brel pa yod du zin kyang khar ba zhes bya bas zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyang phyir 'brel pa yod du zin kyang khar ba zhes bya bas zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is also explained as follows: Even if there is a relation, it is like saying ‚Äúa stick.‚Äù

original: rang gi don brjod pas don gzhan mtshon pa ni ma yin no //üîΩsgra nyid la der rtogs pa skye ba ni sgra'i don nyid du thal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rang gi don brjod pas don gzhan mtshon pa ni ma yin no // sgra nyid la der rtogs pa skye ba ni sgra'i don nyid du thal ba'i phyir te /
translated: The expression of one‚Äôs own object does not indicate another object.

original: sgra'i don gyi mtshan nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i don gyi mtshan nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The arising of the understanding of that in the word itself is the consequence of being the object of the word, because there is no other definition of the object of the word.

original: rang gi don rtogs pas bar du chod nas rtogs par byed pa nyid na mi 'dra ba tsam du 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang gi don rtogs pas bar du chod nas rtogs par byed pa nyid na mi 'dra ba tsam du 'gyur la /
translated: If it is understood through the understanding of one‚Äôs own object, and it is understood through an intermediary, it would be merely different.

original: dngos su brjod pa ni gtso bo nyid du 'gyur te de las de la rtogs pa skye na de de la phyogs par ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos su brjod pa ni gtso bo nyid du 'gyur te de las de la rtogs pa skye na de de la phyogs par ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The actual expression is the principal one, because if understanding of that arises from that, it is not established that it is not directed toward that.

original: gal te rang gi don ston par byed pa yin yang brjod @251b bar bya ba ma yin pa mtshan nyid pa'i don la gzhol ba'i tshig gi rigs brjod pa yin yang gsal ba la brten pa'i tshig nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi don ston par byed pa yin yang brjod @251b bar bya ba ma yin pa mtshan nyid pa'i don la gzhol ba'i tshig gi rigs brjod pa yin yang gsal ba la brten pa'i tshig nyid do zhe na /
translated: Even if it is one that shows its own meaning, it is a type of expression that is directed toward a meaning that is not to be expressed. Even if it is an expression, it is just an expression that is based on a manifestation.

original: rjod par byed pa las ma rtogs pa'i gzhol ba zhes bya ba 'di ji zhig de rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan na ni brjod bya las mi 'ng'  la /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa las ma rtogs pa'i gzhol ba zhes bya ba 'di ji zhig de rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan na ni brjod bya las mi 'ng'  la /
translated: What is this so-called ‚Äúdirection‚Äù that is not understood from the expression? If it has the ability to make that understood, then it is not different from the expressed meaning.

original: de lta ma yin na yang ma rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir gzhol ba yang med do //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na yang ma rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir gzhol ba yang med do //
translated: If it does not, then because it is not understood, there is no direction either.

original: ston par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir rtags mi 'dra ba tsam byas pa mtshon pa nyid yin na yang mtshon pas rtogs pa yang 'brel pa bstan pa la ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ston par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir rtags mi 'dra ba tsam byas pa mtshon pa nyid yin na yang mtshon pas rtogs pa yang 'brel pa bstan pa la ltos par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the mere difference of the sign is indicated, then the understanding of the indication would depend on the teaching of the relation.

original: ma yin te brjod pa la 'brel pa yod na 'jug pa'i phyir mtshon pa nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma yin te brjod pa la 'brel pa yod na 'jug pa'i phyir mtshon pa nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: No, because the relation exists in the expression, the understanding is by the indication itself.

original: de dang ldan par 'gyur pa'i phyogs las khyad par med pa thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang ldan par 'gyur pa'i phyogs las khyad par med pa thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no difference between the subject of the relation and the subject of the indication.

original: mtshon pa la sogs pa'i yul la ni ngo bo'i don yan lag ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: mtshon pa la sogs pa'i yul la ni ngo bo'i don yan lag ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: In the case of the object of the indication, etc., the meaning of the word is not a part of the meaning of the sentence.

original: lha spyin khrid de shog ces bya ba la ba lang khyer te mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: lha spyin khrid de shog ces bya ba la ba lang khyer te mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: For example, in the sentence Bring Devadatta and the cow, the cow is not brought.

original: / des na phyugs kyi mchod sbyin gyis shig ces bya ba la phyugs yan lag ma yin pa na de dang 'brel pa'i gsal ba 'ga' zhig rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / des na phyugs kyi mchod sbyin gyis shig ces bya ba la phyugs yan lag ma yin pa na de dang 'brel pa'i gsal ba 'ga' zhig rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in the sentence 'Sacrifice the animal,' the animal is not a part of the meaning of the sentence, but rather some entity related to it is understood.

original: gsal ba yang yul dang dus nges par mi 'khrul pa'i phyir gcig 'ga' zhig brjod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gsal ba yang yul dang dus nges par mi 'khrul pa'i phyir gcig 'ga' zhig brjod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur la /
translated: Since the manifestation is also not mistaken with regard to a definite object and time, one understands that it is a single entity.

original: de yang 'di'i zhes ma shes pa'i mi 'jug pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang 'di'i zhes ma shes pa'i mi 'jug pa kho na'o //
translated: Moreover, if one does not know that it is this, one does not engage in it at all.

original: thams cad brjod kyang mtha' yas pas rjes su 'grub pa mi srid pa na tshad ma med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad brjod kyang mtha' yas pas rjes su 'grub pa mi srid pa na tshad ma med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one describes everything, it is impossible to succeed because of the infinitude of things, and there would be no valid cognition.

original: gang la mtshon pa yod par 'gyur ba rigs dang 'brel pa tsam gyi spyi ni med do //
analyzed: gang la mtshon pa yod par 'gyur ba rigs dang 'brel pa tsam gyi spyi ni med do //
translated: There is no universal that is the mere connection with a class that would be the illustration.

original: gsal ba la yod pa ni 'di'i zhes bya bar brgal zhing brtag pa med par mthar phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gsal ba la yod pa ni 'di'i zhes bya bar brgal zhing brtag pa med par mthar phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: That which exists in the manifestation is impossible because it is not final without the examination of this.

original: sgra'i byed pa 'di ni yod pa ma yin no zhes ston pas /
analyzed: sgra'i byed pa 'di ni yod pa ma yin no zhes ston pas /
translated: In order to show that this function of words does not exist, he says:

original: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'brel pa yod du zin kyang zhes smos so //
translated: Even if there were a connection.

original: lha sbyin khar ba thogs par bzung ba na de khar ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir khar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra las khar pa thogs par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha sbyin khar ba thogs par bzung ba na de khar ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir khar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra las khar pa thogs par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is held that Devadatta is the one holding the stick, then it follows that the word stick would be understood from the word holding the stick, because it is related to the stick.

original: ma rtogs par ni 'di'i ngo bo nyid las gyur pa'i sgra'i byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir sgra'i don gtso bo dang phal pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma rtogs par ni 'di'i ngo bo nyid las gyur pa'i sgra'i byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir sgra'i don gtso bo dang phal pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not understood, then it would not be the primary or secondary meaning of the word, because it is not the function of the word to be derived from its nature.

original: tshig don gzhan mi 'grigs na rtogs par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: tshig don gzhan mi 'grigs na rtogs par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is understood when the meaning of the word is not otherwise connected,

original: 'di la gtso bo dang khyad par @252a * //
analyzed: 'di la gtso bo dang khyad par @252a * //
translated: then it would follow that there would be no difference between the primary and secondary meanings.

original: med par thal lo zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: med par thal lo zhes bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: des na sgra don gyi 'brel pa ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'am /
analyzed: des na sgra don gyi 'brel pa ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'am /
translated: Therefore, whether the connection between the word and its meaning is natural or

original: brda las byung ba yin yang bla /
analyzed: brda las byung ba yin yang bla /
translated: arises from convention,

original: gal te nyid phal pa la sogs pa la 'jug na gtso bo kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu la sogs pa dag tu ni brjod bya nye bar btags pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te nyid phal pa la sogs pa la 'jug na gtso bo kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu la sogs pa dag tu ni brjod bya nye bar btags pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
translated: if it occurs in the secondary meaning and so on, it becomes the primary meaning alone. Therefore, in such cases, the expressed meaning should be stated as merely imputed.

original: ji skad du yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin pa bzhin no //
translated: As it has been said, ‚ÄúBecause the universal is figuratively designated in the part.‚Äù

original: 'brel pa ma nges pa'i phyir khar ba thogs pa la sogs pa dag la mi rtogs na rigs la yang mtshungs pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'brel pa ma nges pa'i phyir khar ba thogs pa la sogs pa dag la mi rtogs na rigs la yang mtshungs pa nyid de /
translated: If you do not understand the universal in the case of the man with the stick, etc., because the relation is not ascertained, then the same is true of the case of the class.

original: gal te 'brel pa ma nges pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad do //
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa ma nges pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad do //
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThe relation is not ascertained,‚Äù etc.

original: gsal bas stong pa'i rigs ni 'ga' yang med do zhe na /
analyzed: gsal bas stong pa'i rigs ni 'ga' yang med do zhe na /
translated: There is no class without an individual.

original: thams cad la ltos nas ni bden na /
analyzed: thams cad la ltos nas ni bden na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIt is true that all are related,

original: re re la brten nas ni de med par yod pa kho na ste de mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re re la brten nas ni de med par yod pa kho na ste de mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but each exists without the other, because they are impermanent.‚Äù

original: mtshan nyid ni nges pa gcig gi yul can du brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni nges pa gcig gi yul can du brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: The definition is said to have a single, definite object,

original: de nyid gsal ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nyid gsal ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because it is the property of the individual itself.

original: 'brel pa can nyid kyi rigs kyi sgras gsal ba rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'brel pa can nyid kyi rigs kyi sgras gsal ba rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the individual understood from the word ‚Äúclass,‚Äù which is related to it?

original: de la mtshon par byed pas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshon par byed pas ci bya zhe na /
translated: What is the use of the demonstrative?

original: spun drung zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: spun drung zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The term ‚Äúkinsman‚Äù is used, etc.

original: 'brel pa can gyi sgra dag kho nas de ltar rtogs kyi /
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi sgra dag kho nas de ltar rtogs kyi /
translated: One understands in this way only through terms that are related.

original: 'brel pa yod kyang gzhan gyi ni ma yin la /
analyzed: 'brel pa yod kyang gzhan gyi ni ma yin la /
translated: Even if there is a relation, it is not with another.

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra yang 'brel pa can gyi sgra ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra yang 'brel pa can gyi sgra ma yin no //
translated: The terms ‚Äúcow,‚Äù etc., are not related terms.

original: bdag nyid gang gi rang bzhin gzhan la ltos pa nyid yin pa de nyid kyis brjod bya yin na gzhan du rtogs pa 'phen par byed de /
analyzed: bdag nyid gang gi rang bzhin gzhan la ltos pa nyid yin pa de nyid kyis brjod bya yin na gzhan du rtogs pa 'phen par byed de /
translated: The very nature of something that is dependent on another is itself the object of expression, and it is projected as being understood in another way.

original: dper na spun gyi sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na spun gyi sgra bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the term ‚Äúkinsman.‚Äù

original: de nyid rang bzhin tsam du gyur pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin tsam du gyur pas ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just the nature itself,

original: dper na lha sbyin gyi sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin gyi sgra bzhin no //
translated: for example, like the term ‚ÄúDevadatta.‚Äù

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra yang rang bzhin rjod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra yang rang bzhin rjod par byed pa yin te /
translated: The terms ‚Äúcow,‚Äù etc., also express a nature.

original: des na 'brel pa can gyi sgra ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'brel pa can gyi sgra ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not related terms.

original: gal te 'di dag 'brel pa can gyi sgra yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di dag 'brel pa can gyi sgra yin na /
translated: If these are related terms,

original: gsal ba bral ba dag la yang rigs kyi tshig dag las rtogs par thal te /
analyzed: gsal ba bral ba dag la yang rigs kyi tshig dag las rtogs par thal te /
translated: then it follows that one would understand from the words of a class even when the individuals are absent.

original: spun drung la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin te /
analyzed: spun drung la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin te /
translated: The term kinsman and so on is in accordance with the words.

original: des na dgos pa'i yan lag la nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dgos pa'i yan lag la nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the limb of the purpose is impaired.

original: de bshad pa ni rigs gsal ba dang bral pa can dag gis kyang zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'brel par rung ba tsam rtogs na ni gsal ba mi rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni rigs gsal ba dang bral pa can dag gis kyang zhes bya ba'o // 'brel par rung ba tsam rtogs na ni gsal ba mi rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of that is even by those who are devoid of the manifestation of the universal.

original: gal te dus @252b thams cad du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te dus @252b thams cad du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If one understands mere suitability, then the manifestation would not be understood at all. This is explained by If at all times.

original: gsal ba yod pa ma yin na ni rung ba nyid du rtogs la yod na ni gsal ba nyid du yin no zhes bya ba'i bye brag ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba yod pa ma yin na ni rung ba nyid du rtogs la yod na ni gsal ba nyid du yin no zhes bya ba'i bye brag ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the manifestation does not exist, then it is understood as suitable. If it exists, then it is the manifestation itself. Because the distinction is not established.

original: 'o na ni rigs gsal ba dang 'brel pa nyid kyi brjod bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na ni rigs gsal ba dang 'brel pa nyid kyi brjod bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But if the object of expression is just the connection of the universal with the manifestation,

original: 'brel pa can gyi sgra ma yin yang gsal bar rtogs so zhes bya bar dgos pa gal te gsal ba dang 'brel pa can gyi zhes bya bas bsu nas bzlog pa'i phyir 'o na ni zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi sgra ma yin yang gsal bar rtogs so zhes bya bar dgos pa gal te gsal ba dang 'brel pa can gyi zhes bya bas bsu nas bzlog pa'i phyir 'o na ni zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: then the manifestation is understood even though the word is not connected, if one objects with If the manifestation is connected, then But is stated to refute that.

original: gsal ba dang 'brel pa can nyid du rtogs na gsal pa khyad par nyid du 'phangs pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa'i phyogs las khyad par med par thal lo //
analyzed: gsal ba dang 'brel pa can nyid du rtogs na gsal pa khyad par nyid du 'phangs pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa'i phyogs las khyad par med par thal lo //
translated: If it is understood to be related to manifestation, then manifestation is implied as a distinguishing feature, and it follows that there is no difference between it and the position that possesses it.

original: de dang ldan pa'i phyogs zhes brjod pa ni dgag pa byas pa yin te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i phyogs zhes brjod pa ni dgag pa byas pa yin te /
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe position that possesses it‚Äù is a negation.

original: gang la rigs khyad par nyid du 'gyur pa de ni gzhan nyid do //üîΩ'brel pa can gyi sgra nyid dam /
analyzed: gang la rigs khyad par nyid du 'gyur pa de ni gzhan nyid do // 'brel pa can gyi sgra nyid dam /
translated: That which would be a distinguishing feature of a type is different.

original: mtshan pa ni srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan pa ni srid pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible for the word ‚Äúrelated‚Äù to be a mere indication,üîΩbecause the very relation is not possible, as will be explained by implication.

original: 'brel pa nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i shugs kyis med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa ni rigs dang gsal ba dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i shugs kyis med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa ni rigs dang gsal ba dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äútype and manifestation‚Äù is explained as follows.

original: gal te rigs rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin nam des na de brjod pa na rang gi mtshan nyid yul ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rigs rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin nam des na de brjod pa na rang gi mtshan nyid yul ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If a type is not the intrinsic nature of its own characteristics, then how can it be that when it is expressed, its own characteristics are not the object?

original: rang bzhin dang rang bzhin can dag grub ste gcig pa nyid yin na ni tha mi dad la tha dad pa dang rjes su 'brel pa med par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rang bzhin can dag grub ste gcig pa nyid yin na ni tha mi dad la tha dad pa dang rjes su 'brel pa med par 'gyur ram /
translated: If the nature and the possessor of the nature are established as identical, then they are not different, and there is no connection between the different and the connected.

original: de tha dad na ni khyad par tsam brjod pa na gsal ba ma 'phangs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de tha dad na ni khyad par tsam brjod pa na gsal ba ma 'phangs pa kho na'o //
translated: If they are different, then when the mere difference is stated, the manifest is not projected.

original: de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu pa'o //
translated: Therefore is the conclusion.

original: sgra ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul can nyid du rtogs la de ni sgra'i don yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul can nyid du rtogs la de ni sgra'i don yin no //
translated: The word is understood to have an object that possesses an effect, and that is the meaning of the word.

original: 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul can nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i rigs sgra'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul can nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i rigs sgra'i don ma yin no //
translated: Because it is understood to have an object that possesses an effect, a class without an effect is not the meaning of the word.

original: gal te 'bras bu dang ldan par rtogs pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul can yin na rigs dang ldan pa sgra'i don du 'gyur mod ces de lta na ni 'o na zhes bya bas tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa byed do //
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu dang ldan par rtogs pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul can yin na rigs dang ldan pa sgra'i don du 'gyur mod ces de lta na ni 'o na zhes bya bas tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa byed do //
translated: If it is because it is understood to possess an effect that it has an object that possesses an effect, then indeed a class that possesses an effect would be the meaning of the word. If that is so, then says the commentary on the verse.

original: de nyid ston pa ni de ldan nus pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni de ldan nus pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthat which possesses that capacity‚Äù teaches just that.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ma thos pa'i phyir don byed pa zhes 'brel pa brjod do //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ma thos pa'i phyir don byed pa zhes 'brel pa brjod do //
translated: Since ‚Äúwhere‚Äù is not heard, the meaning of ‚Äúthat which performs a function‚Äù is stated.

original: des na de ltar 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul nyid rtogs pa rjes su gzung bar 'gyur la rigs de dang ldan pa la bkod pa'i phyir 'di tha snyad kyi dus ni ma gnas pa'i nyes pa yang med pa @253a * //
analyzed: des na de ltar 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i yul nyid rtogs pa rjes su gzung bar 'gyur la rigs de dang ldan pa la bkod pa'i phyir 'di tha snyad kyi dus ni ma gnas pa'i nyes pa yang med pa @253a * //
translated: Thus, in that way, the object that possesses an effect is understood and is accepted. Since it is established as possessing that type, there is no fault of non-endurance at the time of convention.

original: yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: This is the thought.

original: slob dpon gyis ni 'di srid par //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ni 'di srid par //
translated: The master DignƒÅga thought:

original: bsams lan gyi cha de yang na //
analyzed: bsams lan gyi cha de yang na //
translated: ‚ÄúThat part of the response

original: ci'i phyir dngos su sbyar mi byed //
analyzed: ci'i phyir dngos su sbyar mi byed //
translated: why is it not directly applied?‚Äù

original: ces 'dogs par mdzad do //
analyzed: ces 'dogs par mdzad do //
translated: He made the designation.

original: sgra rnams rnam pa ji lta bur gyur pa'i rang gi yul can du rtogs pa de lta bur gyur pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid la yang pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra rnams rnam pa ji lta bur gyur pa'i rang gi yul can du rtogs pa de lta bur gyur pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid la yang pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the object of a word is understood to be just that which possesses its own object, it is also just that which possesses its own object in relation to its own meaning.

original: de la sgra 'jug pas na rigs pas bkod ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la sgra 'jug pas na rigs pas bkod ces bya ste /
translated: Since a word is applied to that, it is said to be established by reasoning.

original: dngos su rang gi mtshan nyid la ji ste mi sbyor /
analyzed: dngos su rang gi mtshan nyid la ji ste mi sbyor /
translated: Why would it not be applied to its own characteristic?

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'grel pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúif‚Äù is a particle of explanation.

original: 'dir mi sbyor ba'i rgyu bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir mi sbyor ba'i rgyu bshad pa ni /
translated: Here, the reason for not applying it is explained:

original: gal te mtha' yas phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te mtha' yas phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is because of infinity.‚Äù

original: gsal ba gang la sgra bkod pa de nyid rtogs par byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba gang la sgra bkod pa de nyid rtogs par byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: The very manifestation in which a word is placed is what is understood, not another.

original: de rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa ni de ltar mthong ba la ltos pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa ni de ltar mthong ba la ltos pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because the capacity to understand it is seen to depend on that.

original: ma mthong ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no understanding without seeing.üîΩIt is not the case that conventions are established at all times by a single manifestation.

original: thams cad kyi tshe tha snyad rnams gsal ba gcig gis bsgrub pa ni ma yin no zhes gsal ba gzhan yang nye bar mkho bar mthong bas yul dang dus gzhan dang der yang sgra mthong ba la ltos par bya ba yin te des na gsal pa mtha' yas
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe tha snyad rnams gsal ba gcig gis bsgrub pa ni ma yin no zhes gsal ba gzhan yang nye bar mkho bar mthong bas yul dang dus gzhan dang der yang sgra mthong ba la ltos par bya ba yin te des na gsal pa mtha' yas
translated: Since another manifestation is also seen to be necessary, it is seen that the manifestation must depend on seeing the word in another place and time. Therefore, an infinite number of manifestations

original: pa nges par dgod pa'am mthong ba mtha' yas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: pa nges par dgod pa'am mthong ba mtha' yas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: must be posited or an infinite number of seeings must occur.

original: 'di spong par byed pa ni mtha' yas pa 'di ni de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di spong par byed pa ni mtha' yas pa 'di ni de dang ldan pa'i phyogs la yang mtshungs so //
translated: The refutation of this is limitless, and the same applies to the position that it is endowed with that.

original: gal te 'di snyam du zhes bya ba rtsod pa'i 'brel pa yin la de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni lan gyi 'grel pa yin zhing rigs kyi zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa'o //üîΩde dang ldan pa sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs la ni rigs kyi khyad par can gyi gsal pa nyid sgra'i don yin gyi gang gis de la yang brda byed pa la mi ltos par 'gyur ba rigs ni ba lang nyid dang ldan pa'i gsal ba 'di ba lang
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du zhes bya ba rtsod pa'i 'brel pa yin la de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni lan gyi 'grel pa yin zhing rigs kyi zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa'o // de dang ldan pa sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs la ni rigs kyi khyad par can gyi gsal pa nyid sgra'i don yin gyi gang gis de la yang brda byed pa la mi ltos par 'gyur ba rigs ni ba lang nyid dang ldan pa'i gsal ba 'di ba lang
translated: The phrase ‚Äúif one thinks‚Äù is the connection to the debate, the phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù is the commentary on the response, and the phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù is the establishment of the parallel.üîΩIn the position that it is endowed with the meaning of the word, the manifestation that is qualified by the type is the meaning of the word, but the type is not the meaning of the word. Otherwise, the manifestation that is qualified by the type would be the meaning of the word.üîΩIf the manifestation that is qualified by the type were the meaning of the word, then the word cow would express the manifestation that is qualified by the type cow, and it would not depend on the convention that is made in relation to that.

original: gi sgras rjod par byed pa yin yang ston pa na rigs de'i khyad par can gyi gsal ba gzhan la de'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid du ma bstan pa'i phyir der yang bstan par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gi sgras rjod par byed pa yin yang ston pa na rigs de'i khyad par can gyi gsal ba gzhan la de'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid du ma bstan pa'i phyir der yang bstan par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: However, even though the word cow expresses the manifestation that is qualified by the type cow, it does not teach that the manifestation that is qualified by that type is to be expressed by that word. Therefore, it would also have to teach that.

original: de ltar ni nus pa ma yin te mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni nus pa ma yin te mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not possible, because of the infinite number of possibilities.

original: de bshad pa ni 'brel pa ma byas pa can gyi sgra ni rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni 'brel pa ma byas pa can gyi sgra ni rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The explanation is this: a word that has no connection does not express anything.

original: gal te de dang 'brel pa can la zhes bya bas ni mi mtshungs par dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de dang 'brel pa can la zhes bya bas ni mi mtshungs par dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúit is connected with that,‚Äù the objection is anticipated:

original: de dang ldan pa 'di ni ba lang gi @253b sgra'i don yin no zhes bstan pa ni mtha' yas par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa 'di ni ba lang gi @253b sgra'i don yin no zhes bstan pa ni mtha' yas par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf the meaning of the word ‚Äòcow‚Äô is ‚Äòthat which possesses cowness,‚Äô then it would be infinite,

original: sgra 'di brjod par bya ba ni 'dis khyad par can du gyur pa yin no zhes bstan pas na de'i khyad par can mtha' dag de'i don rtogs par ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgra 'di brjod par bya ba ni 'dis khyad par can du gyur pa yin no zhes bstan pas na de'i khyad par can mtha' dag de'i don rtogs par ro zhe na /
translated: because it is taught that ‚Äòthis word expresses that which is qualified by that.‚Äô Therefore, the entire qualifier would be understood as its meaning.‚Äù

original: 'di bshad zin to zhes bya bas lan 'debs so //
analyzed: 'di bshad zin to zhes bya bas lan 'debs so //
translated: The answer is given by ‚ÄúThis has already been explained.‚Äù

original: gal te yang gsal ba dang rigs 'brel pa'i phyir rigs kyi khyad par can yin pa de lta na yang rigs kyi khyad par can de'i sgras brjod par bya bar ston pa na de dang 'brel pa can khyad par ram 'brel pa can la rtogs par 'gyur grang
analyzed: gal te yang gsal ba dang rigs 'brel pa'i phyir rigs kyi khyad par can yin pa de lta na yang rigs kyi khyad par can de'i sgras brjod par bya bar ston pa na de dang 'brel pa can khyad par ram 'brel pa can la rtogs par 'gyur grang
translated: Even if it is the case that a universal is qualified by a relation to an individual, when the word expresses the qualified universal, would it cause the cognition of the qualifier or the relation?

original: na / de lta na yang khyad par can la sogs pa spyi nyid yin par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro rtsod pa sngar bshad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: na / de lta na yang khyad par can la sogs pa spyi nyid yin par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro rtsod pa sngar bshad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: But even so, the argument given earlier would apply, because the qualified universal and so on would be universals.

original: rigs des rnam par gcad pa'i gsal ba rtogs na ni gsal ba gzhan rtogs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs des rnam par gcad pa'i gsal ba rtogs na ni gsal ba gzhan rtogs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If the cognition of an individual that is distinguished by a universal occurs, how could the cognition of another individual occur?

original: de bzhin du gsal ba tsam yang spyi'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis yul ma yin pa nyid do zhes gzhung gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsal ba tsam yang spyi'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis yul ma yin pa nyid do zhes gzhung gzung bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the mere individual is not an object because it is not a universal. This is the interpretation of the treatise.

original: ba la nyid kyi khyad par can gyi ba lang mtha' dag ba lang gi tshig gi don yin no zhes ston pa yin na yang gsal ba rnams la gsal ba'o zhes mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i yul can nyid ma yin
analyzed: ba la nyid kyi khyad par can gyi ba lang mtha' dag ba lang gi tshig gi don yin no zhes ston pa yin na yang gsal ba rnams la gsal ba'o zhes mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i yul can nyid ma yin
translated: If it is taught that all cows, which are particular instances of cow, are the referent of the word cow, then because the individual cows are understood to be of a similar nature, the word cow is not a non-common referent.

original: no // so so rang gi rang bzhin thun mong ma yin na ni thun mong bas rnam par gcad pa la bkod kyang gzhan la byas pas gzhan la nus par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: no // so so rang gi rang bzhin thun mong ma yin na ni thun mong bas rnam par gcad pa la bkod kyang gzhan la byas pas gzhan la nus par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the individual natures of individual cows are not common, then even if the word cow is applied to them by excluding other things, it cannot be applied to other cows.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni spyi dang ldan pa'i gsal ba yin no zhes de rtogs pa na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni spyi dang ldan pa'i gsal ba yin no zhes de rtogs pa na /
translated: Thus, when one understands that a particular cow possesses the universal cow,

original: ji ltar spyi gsal ba rnams kyis rang bzhin gcig pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du spyi de dang ldan pa yang yin te des na de ltar gcig tu byas pa'i gsal ba rnams la de ltar dmigs pa'i sgra dgod pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar spyi gsal ba rnams kyis rang bzhin gcig pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du spyi de dang ldan pa yang yin te des na de ltar gcig tu byas pa'i gsal ba rnams la de ltar dmigs pa'i sgra dgod pa yin te /
translated: then just as the universal is the same nature as the individual cows, so too that particular cow possesses that universal. Therefore, the word cow is applied to individual cows that are made the same in that way.

original: spyi dang ldan pa de ni re re la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi dang ldan pa de ni re re la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is present in each of them.

original: des na sbyor ba'i nus pa ni spyi de dang ldan pa'i spyi nyid la bkod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na sbyor ba'i nus pa ni spyi de dang ldan pa'i spyi nyid la bkod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the capacity of the application is established in the universal itself, which possesses that universal.

original: rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba de las bzlog pa la tha mi dad pa yin mong /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba de las bzlog pa la tha mi dad pa yin mong /
translated: The opposite of that which is called ‚Äúpervasion‚Äù is ‚Äúnon-difference.‚Äù

original: de dag gi 'brel pa gang yin pa de dag gi gang las rjes su song bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gi 'brel pa gang yin pa de dag gi gang las rjes su song bar 'gyur te /
translated: What is the relation between them? From what do they follow?

original: des na de dang ldan pa'i sgra'i don yin na gsal ba rnams sgra gcig gi rten du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de dang ldan pa'i sgra'i don yin na gsal ba rnams sgra gcig gi rten du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if the meaning of the word is that which possesses that, the individual things would not be the basis of a single word.

original: de'i spyi tha mi dad pa'i phyir ba lang ba lang zhes gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa brten pa yin gyi /üîΩde spyi logs su @254a * //
analyzed: de'i spyi tha mi dad pa'i phyir ba lang ba lang zhes gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa brten pa yin gyi /üîΩde spyi logs su @254a * //
translated: Because their universal is non-different, the individual things are non-different in being the basis of the word ‚Äúcow.‚ÄùüîΩBecause the universal is not different from them, the individual things are not different in being the basis of the word ‚Äúcow.‚Äù

original: byas pas ni so so rang gi bdag nyid du yul du byas ba'i gsal ba tha mi dad par yul du ji ltar byed na gang gis de dang ldan pa gcig nyid la bkod pa'i sgras gzhan thams cad brjod par 'gyur /
analyzed: byas pas ni so so rang gi bdag nyid du yul du byas ba'i gsal ba tha mi dad par yul du ji ltar byed na gang gis de dang ldan pa gcig nyid la bkod pa'i sgras gzhan thams cad brjod par 'gyur /
translated: If it is a product, then how could the individual itself be the object, since the manifestation is not different from the object? By what is it that the word, which is applied to that one which possesses it, expresses all others?

original: des na mtha' yas pa ji ltar ma yin /
analyzed: des na mtha' yas pa ji ltar ma yin /
translated: Therefore, how could it not be infinite?

original: brjod pa 'khrul pa yang yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa 'khrul pa yang yin te /
translated: And the expression would be erroneous,

original: de gcig ma rtogs pa'i phyir gsal ba sgra'i don gyi phyogs bzhin no //
analyzed: de gcig ma rtogs pa'i phyir gsal ba sgra'i don gyi phyogs bzhin no //
translated: because, like the side of the meaning of the word manifestation, it is not understood as one.

original: 'brel pa yang med pa'i phyir 'brel pa can la bkod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa yang med pa'i phyir 'brel pa can la bkod pa ma yin no //
translated: And because there is no relation, it is not applied to the related.

original: des na de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi dang de dang ldan pa sgra'i don ma yin par bstan nas /
