analyzed: des na de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi dang de dang ldan pa sgra'i don ma yin par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having shown that the individual characteristic, the universal, and that which possesses it are not the meaning of the word,

original: gzhan sel ba sgra'i don du brjod pa'i phyir nyes pa spang ba srid pa'i phyogs 'di pha rol po'i ci ste khas mi len zhes 'dri ba ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba sgra'i don du brjod pa'i phyir nyes pa spang ba srid pa'i phyogs 'di pha rol po'i ci ste khas mi len zhes 'dri ba ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: he asks, ‚ÄúWhy do you not accept this other side, the possibility of avoiding the fault, by asserting the exclusion of other as the meaning of the word?‚Äù This is what is meant by ‚ÄúMoreover.‚Äù

original: dbye ba'i don rnams de byed pa ma yin pa las log pa'i phyir mtshungs par gyur pa la //
analyzed: dbye ba'i don rnams de byed pa ma yin pa las log pa'i phyir mtshungs par gyur pa la //
translated: The meaning of the divisions is not that, because it is the opposite of that which is not a maker.

original: de ni tha snyad ched du byas //
analyzed: de ni tha snyad ched du byas //
translated: That is made conventional.

original: zhes bya ba'i skabs su bab pa brda ci ste ma byas //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i skabs su bab pa brda ci ste ma byas //
translated: Why is a convention not made in the context of this statement?

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: spyi sgra'i don nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang mtshan ma'i chos rtogs pa dang mi mthun la /
analyzed: spyi sgra'i don nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang mtshan ma'i chos rtogs pa dang mi mthun la /
translated: The meaning of a general term is not compatible with the realization of its own characteristic and the property of a sign.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba'i rtogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba'i rtogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
translated: The own characteristic is the opposite of the realization of the universal.

original: de ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la 'jug par de'i chos rtogs pa'i 'thad pa yin la tha dad pa yang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa spangs pa la ji ltar gzhan sel ba sgra'i don ma yin /
analyzed: de ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la 'jug par de'i chos rtogs pa'i 'thad pa yin la tha dad pa yang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa spangs pa la ji ltar gzhan sel ba sgra'i don ma yin /
translated: That is the reason for engaging only in the own characteristic, and the realization of its property is the same as the exclusion of difference. Therefore, how can the exclusion of other not be the meaning of a term?

original: don byed pa gang gi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa yang ji skad brjod pa'i gsal bas sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: don byed pa gang gi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa yang ji skad brjod pa'i gsal bas sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The commentary on ‚Äúin terms of which function‚Äù should be applied by the above explanation of the term.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i sgra'i don du khas blangs pa'i nyes pa spangs su chug mod /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i sgra'i don du khas blangs pa'i nyes pa spangs su chug mod /
translated: Granted that the fault of accepting the meaning of the word in terms of its own characteristic and the general meaning is avoided.

original: de dang ldan pa sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs kyi nyes par go ji ltar mi 'gyur zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs kyi nyes par go ji ltar mi 'gyur zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: But how can one avoid understanding the fault of the position that the meaning of the word is that which possesses the referent?üîΩThis is stated in the line:

original: gal te de ldan nyes mtshungs phyir //
analyzed: gal te de ldan nyes mtshungs phyir //
translated: If you say that the fault is the same,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it possesses that.

original: 'dir mtha' yas pa dang 'khrul pa'i nyes pa mtshungs par thal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir mtha' yas pa dang 'khrul pa'i nyes pa mtshungs par thal bar byed pa'o //
translated: Here it is argued that the fault of being infinite and the fault of error are equally entailed.

original: 'di ltar de byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang gi mtshan nyid rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa ni tha dad pa nyid rjes su 'gro bas na de ltar sgras yul du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang gi mtshan nyid rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa ni tha dad pa nyid rjes su 'gro bas na de ltar sgras yul du byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, since the referent does not follow from the essence that produces it, but rather follows from the difference, the word makes it its object in that way.

original: des na tha mi dad pa'i tha dad pas rnam par gcad pa'i khyad par rnams la de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa dang rjes su 'gro ba gnyis las ldog pa khyad par du byas @254b par rtogs pa na sgra'i don nyid du 'thad pa'i phyir 'di de dang ldan
analyzed: des na tha mi dad pa'i tha dad pas rnam par gcad pa'i khyad par rnams la de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa dang rjes su 'gro ba gnyis las ldog pa khyad par du byas @254b par rtogs pa na sgra'i don nyid du 'thad pa'i phyir 'di de dang ldan
translated: Therefore, since the meaning of the word is tenable as the distinction that is the opposite of both the realization of its nature and the realization of the distinction that is the opposite of the latter, which is pervaded by the difference that is not different,

original: pa sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs nyid khas blangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: pa sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs nyid khas blangs par 'gyur te /
translated: one would accept the position that that which possesses that is the meaning of the word.

original: ldog pa des rnam par gcad pa gcig la sgra de bkod kyang gzhan la mi rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: ldog pa des rnam par gcad pa gcig la sgra de bkod kyang gzhan la mi rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If one says that even though the word is applied to one that is distinguished by that opposite, it is not understood in another,

original: dgos pa 'di spong pa ni bla ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgos pa 'di spong pa ni bla ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is better to abandon this purpose.

original: de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa mtshungs par gyur kyang bla ste /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa mtshungs par gyur kyang bla ste /
translated: It is better if the fault of the position that possesses that is the same.

original: de lta na yang ldog pa dang ldan pa don nyid du rigs kyi rigs dang ldan pa ni don du rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang ldog pa dang ldan pa don nyid du rigs kyi rigs dang ldan pa ni don du rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Even so, it is reasonable that that which possesses the opposite is the meaning, but it is not reasonable that that which possesses the property is the meaning.

original: mtshungs pa'i phyir de dag dan pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa spang par mi nus mod /
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i phyir de dag dan pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa spang par mi nus mod /
translated: Because of being the same, it is indeed not possible to abandon the fault of the position that possesses that.

original: rigs ni don med do //
analyzed: rigs ni don med do //
translated: The property is meaningless.

original: yang ji ltar na nyes pa yod kyang gal te ldog pa dang ldan pa don du 'thad pa rigs dang ldan pa'i don nyid ma yin zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na nyes pa yod kyang gal te ldog pa dang ldan pa don du 'thad pa rigs dang ldan pa'i don nyid ma yin zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Again, someone might say, ‚ÄúEven if there is a fault, if there is a reversal, it is not tenable that the object that is suitable to be the reason is the very object that possesses the reason.

original: rigs khyad len pas kyang zhes smos so //
analyzed: rigs khyad len pas kyang zhes smos so //
translated: ‚Äù Therefore it says, ‚ÄúEven if one accepts a reason.‚Äù

original: rigs khas len kyang rigs mthun pa rnams rigs mi mthun pa dag ldog par brten par bya dgos te /
analyzed: rigs khas len kyang rigs mthun pa rnams rigs mi mthun pa dag ldog par brten par bya dgos te /
translated: Even if one accepts a reason, those that are similar to the reason must be based on those that are dissimilar to the reason.

original: de lta ma yin na 'di'i khyad par la rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin nyid dang khyad par can gyi khyad par la brten pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'di'i khyad par la rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin nyid dang khyad par can gyi khyad par la brten pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the nature that is concomitant with its distinction would not be based on the distinction of the possessor of the distinction.

original: des na rigs de brten pas byas pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig po 'di thams cad la re re la yang de brten pa ma yin pa dag las re re las tha dad pa yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na rigs de brten pas byas pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig po 'di thams cad la re re la yang de brten pa ma yin pa dag las re re las tha dad pa yod pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, since that reason is based on it, all of these things that are similar in being based on it are individually different from those that are not based on it.

original: des na de nyid de dag gi tha mi dad pa yin la rag mod /
analyzed: des na de nyid de dag gi tha mi dad pa yin la rag mod /
translated: Therefore, it is certainly the case that it is not different from them.

original: de las kyang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can nyid do //
analyzed: de las kyang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can nyid do //
translated: And because of the realization of the nature of its own characteristics, it is the object of the cognition of its own characteristics.

original: de dag kyang rigs mi mthun pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gcig dang ldan pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'i rtogs pa'i yul du grub pas ji ltar khas blangs pa'i rtogs pa'i yul yin pa na /
analyzed: de dag kyang rigs mi mthun pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gcig dang ldan pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'i rtogs pa'i yul du grub pas ji ltar khas blangs pa'i rtogs pa'i yul yin pa na /
translated: And because of the possession of a single nature that is different from dissimilar kinds, it is established as the object of the cognition of the universal. Therefore, if it is the object of the cognition as it is accepted,

original: rigs khas blangs par dgos pa med do //
analyzed: rigs khas blangs par dgos pa med do //
translated: there is no need to accept the universal.

original: de'i nyes pa spang bar mi nus pa nyid dang / rigs kyi don ni rjes su 'gro ba'i tha dad pa nyid las grub pas rigs khas blangs pas ci bya ste /
analyzed: de'i nyes pa spang bar mi nus pa nyid dang / rigs kyi don ni rjes su 'gro ba'i tha dad pa nyid las grub pas rigs khas blangs pas ci bya ste /
translated: And because the meaning of the universal is established from the difference of the similar, what is the use of accepting the universal?

original: rigs mi mthun gcig las tha dad pa dang / de las log pa rnams kyi tha dad pa de nyid de las log pa rnams la tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun gcig las tha dad pa dang / de las log pa rnams kyi tha dad pa de nyid de las log pa rnams la tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The difference from the dissimilar and the non-difference from the similar are the cause of the cognition of the difference from the dissimilar and the non-difference from the similar.

original: spyi khas blang du ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi khas blang du ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But there is no need to accept the universal.

original: spyi'i dgos pa ni tha dad pas kyang sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i dgos pa ni tha dad pas kyang sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The general purpose is to establish the difference.

original: tha dad pa khas blang ba yang gdon mi za bar bya dgas pa'i phyir @255a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa khas blang ba yang gdon mi za bar bya dgas pa'i phyir @255a * //
translated: And the difference must be accepted, because it is not possible to establish the non-difference of different things.

original: ro // ci ste yang tha dad pa'i don rnams kyi tha mi dad pa yin du zad mod /
analyzed: ro // ci ste yang tha dad pa'i don rnams kyi tha mi dad pa yin du zad mod /
translated: But even if the different things are non-different,

original: 'on kyang des spyi bzhin du tha mi dad par bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba sgrub par ni mi nus te /
analyzed: 'on kyang des spyi bzhin du tha mi dad par bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba sgrub par ni mi nus te /
translated: nevertheless, it is not possible to establish the non-difference of the object of cognition, as it is with the universal, because

original: rtogs pa de ni tha dad pa la mi dmigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rtogs pa de ni tha dad pa la mi dmigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: that cognition does not have a non-different object.

original: de dgag pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: de dgag pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes smos so //
translated: In order to refute that, he says, ‚ÄúMoreover . . . ‚Äù

original: gang la 'jug pa de las gzhan pa gang yin pa de yongs su spangs nas 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas sgra sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: gang la 'jug pa de las gzhan pa gang yin pa de yongs su spangs nas 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas sgra sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúfrom‚Äù is used in the sense that ‚Äúthat which engages engages having excluded that which is different from it.‚Äù

original: des na de las gzhan pa rnams las 'jug pa'i yul rnam par mi gcod na sgra mi sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de las gzhan pa rnams las 'jug pa'i yul rnam par mi gcod na sgra mi sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if it does not exclude the objects of engagement from that which is different from it, then the word would not be used.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: sgras ni nges pa'i don 'ga' zhig bstan par bya ba yin gyi rang bzhin dang 'dres pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgras ni nges pa'i don 'ga' zhig bstan par bya ba yin gyi rang bzhin dang 'dres pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Some definitive meaning is to be taught by the word, but it is not mixed with the nature of the word.üîΩFor example, when one says, ‚ÄúBring the cow,‚Äù the cow is not mixed with the nature of a non-cow, which is the opposite of its nature, and the bringing is not mixed with the non-bringing.

original: dper na ba lang khyer shog cig ces bya bas ba lang ni rang bzhin nges pa'i ba lang ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dang 'dres pa dang / khyer nas 'ong ba yang khyer nas mi 'ong ba dang 'dres pas stong pa nyid bzhin te de lta ma yin na de skad smras pa na gang yang rung ba khyer te 'ongs pa'am ji yang rung ba byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na ba lang khyer shog cig ces bya bas ba lang ni rang bzhin nges pa'i ba lang ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dang 'dres pa dang / khyer nas 'ong ba yang khyer nas mi 'ong ba dang 'dres pas stong pa nyid bzhin te de lta ma yin na de skad smras pa na gang yang rung ba khyer te 'ongs pa'am ji yang rung ba byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, when one says that, one would bring something else or do something else.

original: des na so so nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi don sgras brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na so so nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi don sgras brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the individual nature is to be expressed by the word.

original: gal te nges par nyid kyang rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa yin na dngos po med pa yul rtogs pa 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir pha rol po dag gis dngos po med pa'i yul can gyi tshad ma brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gal te nges par nyid kyang rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa yin na dngos po med pa yul rtogs pa 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir pha rol po dag gis dngos po med pa'i yul can gyi tshad ma brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: If ascertainment definitely exists, and it exists in its own nature, then because no cognition of a non-thing, that is, of an object, would be possible, the opponents should not say that there is a valid cognition that has a non-thing as its object.

original: dper na ba lang zhes bya bar rtogs bzhin pa'i dngos po ba langs nyid kyi khyad par can yin pa de bzhin du nges pa nyid ni dngos po gzhan med pa yin pa'i phyir ldog pas khyad par du ma byas pa ni nges par rtogs pa yod paüîΩmya yin no //
analyzed: dper na ba lang zhes bya bar rtogs bzhin pa'i dngos po ba langs nyid kyi khyad par can yin pa de bzhin du nges pa nyid ni dngos po gzhan med pa yin pa'i phyir ldog pas khyad par du ma byas pa ni nges par rtogs pa yod pa mya yin no //
translated: For example, when one cognizes a thing called ‚Äúcow,‚Äù it is qualified by cow-ness. In the same way, because ascertainment is the absence of another thing, it is not qualified by the exclusion that is present when one cognizes ascertainment.

original: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa gzhan tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po rnams la yin pa de bzhin du tha mi dad pa de ni tha mi dad pa'i rnam par rtog pas kyang yul du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa gzhan tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po rnams la yin pa de bzhin du tha mi dad pa de ni tha mi dad pa'i rnam par rtog pas kyang yul du bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as things that are not different from each other are qualified by difference, in the same way, that which is not different is also made into an object by a non-different conceptual consciousness.

original: rang gi phyogs la ji ltar rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs la ji ltar rnam par gcod pa'i yul can yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained how it is that the cognition of the object is determined in accordance with the object‚Äôs own nature.

original: 'dir ni de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi gzugs brnyan nyid kyis de'i nyes pa mtshungs pa nyid yin yang gzhan nges pa'i yul can nyid du 'thad do zhes brjod pa'i don du 'di skad ces nges pa'i don @255b la 'jug pas na gdon mi za bar sgra rnam
analyzed: 'dir ni de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi gzugs brnyan nyid kyis de'i nyes pa mtshungs pa nyid yin yang gzhan nges pa'i yul can nyid du 'thad do zhes brjod pa'i don du 'di skad ces nges pa'i don @255b la 'jug pas na gdon mi za bar sgra rnam
translated: Here, the opponent‚Äôs position is that the form of the object is reflected in the cognition, and that the cognition is thus determined by the object. The point of the present passage is to show that even though the two cases are similar in this respect, it is still possible for the cognition to be determined by something else.

original: par gcod pa'i yul can du brjod dgos so zhes bshad pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: par gcod pa'i yul can du brjod dgos so zhes bshad pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: The passage is simply saying that because the cognition is engaged in a particular object, it must be said to have a determined object.

original: 'grel pa ni 'di don rnams la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni 'di don rnams la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary explains that the passage means that the cognition is engaged in the object.

original: mi 'dod pa yongs su spangs pa ni so sor nges pa yul du byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa yongs su spangs pa ni so sor nges pa yul du byed pa'o //
translated: The cognition is determined by the object in the sense that it excludes what is not that object.

original: de'i phyir gzhan las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par gcod pa ni sgras yul du bya dgos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par gcod pa ni sgras yul du bya dgos so //
translated: Therefore, the cognition must be said to have as its object the exclusion of the object from other things.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par byed pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par byed pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because the cognition is produced in the form of the object, it is said to have an object.

original: rnam par gcod par brjod dgos so //
analyzed: rnam par gcod par brjod dgos so //
translated: must be expressed by the word ‚Äúexclusion.‚Äù

original: zhes rnam par gcod pa'i tshig gis ldog pa brjod do //
analyzed: zhes rnam par gcod pa'i tshig gis ldog pa brjod do //
translated: Thus, the word ‚Äúexclusion‚Äù expresses negation.

original: ldog pa de yang ldog mtshams las gzhag pa ldog pa'i yul dag la tha mi dad pa yin te ba lang so so la rta med pa yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa de yang ldog mtshams las gzhag pa ldog pa'i yul dag la tha mi dad pa yin te ba lang so so la rta med pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, that negation is posited in relation to the objects of negation, and it is not different from them, for the absence of a horse is in each individual cow.

original: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ba dang // gnod mi za bar yul du bya dgos pa dang / khyad par rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis don bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ba dang // gnod mi za bar yul du bya dgos pa dang / khyad par rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis don bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is certainly to be accepted as non-different, and it is necessarily to be taken as the object, and the proof of the object is by the reason of the concomitance of the distinctions.

original: de bas na de'i /
analyzed: de bas na de'i /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i rtogs pa'i rten nyid du 'gyur ba yongs su don nas rigs khas len pa ni don med pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa ni de nges par khas blangs pa can dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i rtogs pa'i rten nyid du 'gyur ba yongs su don nas rigs khas len pa ni don med pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa ni de nges par khas blangs pa can dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf one necessarily accepts that, then the acceptance of the reason as the basis for the understanding of that is meaningless.‚Äù

original: rigs ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyogs dag tu mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyogs dag tu mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason is not established in terms of the positions of difference and non-difference.

original: tha dad pa dang de rtogs pa yang yod mod 'on kyang des spyi yod pas bsgrub par bya'i dgos pa ni sgrub par mi byed pa ma yin nam 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni rang bzhin yin par rtogs
analyzed: tha dad pa dang de rtogs pa yang yod mod 'on kyang des spyi yod pas bsgrub par bya'i dgos pa ni sgrub par mi byed pa ma yin nam 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni rang bzhin yin par rtogs
translated: Although there are differences and also the realization of that, still, is not the purpose of the proof that the existence of the universal is not accomplished by that? Thus, the nature of those that are not pervaders is understood to be the pervasion.

original: te ba lang zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: te ba lang zhes bya bar ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is the universal of the individual cow.

original: sgra yang de nyid la 'jug pa na gsal ba rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra yang de nyid la 'jug pa na gsal ba rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: And when the word is applied to that, it causes the individual to be understood.

original: tha dad pa ni rjes su 'gro ba yin yang rang bzhin rtogs pa mi srid pa des ji ltar tha dad pa rigs kyi don bsgrub /
analyzed: tha dad pa ni rjes su 'gro ba yin yang rang bzhin rtogs pa mi srid pa des ji ltar tha dad pa rigs kyi don bsgrub /
translated: Although difference is the pervasion, it is impossible to realize the nature. How can difference prove the meaning of the class?üîΩTherefore, it is said that although it is undoubtedly accepted that there is no difference, it is reasonable to accept the class.

original: des na tha mi dad pa gdon mi za bar khas blangs pa gdon mi za bar brjod pa yin yang rigs khas blangs par rigs pa yin no zhes smras pa ni rnam par gcod pa mi byed pa ni ma yin gyi zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na tha mi dad pa gdon mi za bar khas blangs pa gdon mi za bar brjod pa yin yang rigs khas blangs par rigs pa yin no zhes smras pa ni rnam par gcod pa mi byed pa ni ma yin gyi zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: It is not that there is no exclusion.

original: 'jug pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni gang la sgras tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni gang la sgras tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúobject of engagement‚Äù is that which is engaged by a word in the aspect of nondifference.

original: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: To refute this, the root text says:

original: gal te 'di la rnam gcod yod //üîΩces bya'o // rnam par gcod pa blo gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni ba lang la sogs @256a * //
analyzed: gal te 'di la rnam gcod yod // ces bya'o // rnam par gcod pa blo gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni ba lang la sogs @256a * //
translated: If it has exclusion,

original: pa'i blo rnams sgrub pa tsam la brten pa'i phyir khas blangs pas dgos pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: pa'i blo rnams sgrub pa tsam la brten pa'i phyir khas blangs pas dgos pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If exclusion were established by another cognition, then the cognition of an ox, etc., would be established merely on the basis of the word, and the word would have a purpose.

original: gang gi tshe 'di la rnam par gcod pa yod pa yin te /üîΩbsgrub pa 'ba' zhig rtogs pa nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe spyi la yang sgra rnams kyi dgos pa ni ji srid rnam par gcod pa brjod pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du rnam par gcod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir don rnams mtshungs pas na spyi la
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di la rnam par gcod pa yod pa yin te / bsgrub pa 'ba' zhig rtogs pa nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe spyi la yang sgra rnams kyi dgos pa ni ji srid rnam par gcod pa brjod pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du rnam par gcod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir don rnams mtshungs pas na spyi la
translated: But when it has exclusion,üîΩand it is not just the establishment that is understood, then the word has a purpose in relation to the exclusion of other things.üîΩThe purpose of words is simply to express the exclusion of other things.

original: yang mtshungs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yang mtshungs pa kho na'o //
translated: In the same way, the word has the same purpose in relation to the universal as it does in relation to the particular, because the objects are the same in having the property of exclusion.

original: des na rnam pa de lta bu'i dgos pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: des na rnam pa de lta bu'i dgos pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
translated: So what need is there for any other purpose of that kind?üîΩOr else, what need is there for any other?

original: yang na gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba spyi zhes yang 'brel par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba spyi zhes yang 'brel par bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúor‚Äù is connected with the word ‚Äúwhat.‚Äù

original: des na don 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: so so rang gi rang bzhin du so sor nges pa'i don brjod pa na ldog pa gdon mi za bar rtogs pa na las zhes bya bar rtogs pa ni rtogs bzhin pa'i khra bo la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo'i yul can nyid de rang gi
analyzed: so so rang gi rang bzhin du so sor nges pa'i don brjod pa na ldog pa gdon mi za bar rtogs pa na las zhes bya bar rtogs pa ni rtogs bzhin pa'i khra bo la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo'i yul can nyid de rang gi
translated: When the meaning of the individual, which is determined by its own nature, is expressed, the exclusion is definitely understood. The meaning of ‚Äúexclusion‚Äù is understood as the object of the individual nature of the variegated and so on, which is being understood.

original: mtshan nyid kyi chos kyis rnam par gcad pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi chos kyis rnam par gcad pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: This is because they are the objects of the exclusion of other phenomena, as explained earlier.

original: des na tha dad pa'i don rnams la ba lang gi tha dad pa med par rtogs pa 'byung ba 'di ni /
analyzed: des na tha dad pa'i don rnams la ba lang gi tha dad pa med par rtogs pa 'byung ba 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, when the cognition of the exclusion of non-ox arises with regard to individual objects,

original: gcig kyang ba lang ma yin pa la sogs pa gzhan yang ldog pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig kyang ba lang ma yin pa la sogs pa gzhan yang ldog pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan la brten pa yin no //
translated: this is based on the reason of the exclusion of other things, such as the non-ox.

original: gang la de med pa de la ni tha mi dad par rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang la de med pa de la ni tha mi dad par rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: But when that is not the case, there is no cognition of non-difference.

original: dper na gzhan ba lang ma yin pa'i rdzas la bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhan ba lang ma yin pa'i rdzas la bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a substance that is not a cow.

original: des na so sor rang gi rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i ba lang thams cad gcig las ldog pa'i phyir tha mi dad par nges pa yin no //üîΩldog pa tha mi dad pas rang bzhin tha mi dad pa la ji zhig 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: des na so sor rang gi rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i ba lang thams cad gcig las ldog pa'i phyir tha mi dad par nges pa yin no // ldog pa tha mi dad pas rang bzhin tha mi dad pa la ji zhig 'byung zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since all cows are cognized as having their own individual natures, they are ascertained to be non-different from the one.üîΩIf there is no difference in the negated, what is the difference in nature?

original: spyi tha mi dad pas kyang rang bzhin tha mi dad pa la ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: spyi tha mi dad pas kyang rang bzhin tha mi dad pa la ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If there is no difference in the universal, what is the difference in nature?

original: des na ba lang zhes rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na ba lang zhes rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would not be cognized as a cow.

original: 'di ni rjes su song ba dang / rjes su song pa ma yin pa rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang ba lang zhes rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin nyid du snang ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni rjes su song ba dang / rjes su song pa ma yin pa rtogs pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang ba lang zhes rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin nyid du snang ngo //
translated: This is not the cognition of what has gone and what has not gone, but rather the appearance as having the nature of what has gone.

original: des na gal te 'di spyi kho na yin na rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos su rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gal te 'di spyi kho na yin na rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos su rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if this is only a universal, it would not be cognized as a phenomenon with its own characteristics.

original: 'on te 'di de dang ldan pa rtogs pa yin na de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir de las bzlog pa yang rjes su 'gro ba nyid du snang ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'on te 'di de dang ldan pa rtogs pa yin na de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir de las bzlog pa yang rjes su 'gro ba nyid du snang ba de bzhin du /
translated: But if it is the cognition of that which possesses it, then because of the connection with such a universal, the opposite of that also appears to be a universal.

original: gal te ldog pa dang 'brel pa las kyang snang bar 'gyur na @256b 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa dang 'brel pa las kyang snang bar 'gyur na @256b 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: If it appears from the connection with the opposite, what is the contradiction?

original: de bas na tha dad kyang rang bzhin rjes su 'gro bar rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni spyi bzhin du ldog pa la yang khyad par med do zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: de bas na tha dad kyang rang bzhin rjes su 'gro bar rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni spyi bzhin du ldog pa la yang khyad par med do zhes bya bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that even though they are different, the reason for understanding that they are the same in nature is that there is no difference in the case of the opposite, just as there is in the case of the universal.

original: dogs pa gang bsu nas 'di nye bar bkod pa de 'dir dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dogs pa gang bsu nas 'di nye bar bkod pa de 'dir dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to refute this, which is set forth in response to a doubt,

original: 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston te zhes bya bas rjes su 'brel bar byed do //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston te zhes bya bas rjes su 'brel bar byed do //
translated: he connects it with the following by saying, ‚ÄúIt is taught that the object of engagement is clearly shown.‚Äù

original: gal te 'di tha mi dad pa rnam par gcod pa yod pa de lta na yang ba lang ba lang zhes rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i yul can du rtogs pa'i dmigs pa ni rang bzhin tha mi dad pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'di tha mi dad pa rnam par gcod pa yod pa de lta na yang ba lang ba lang zhes rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i yul can du rtogs pa'i dmigs pa ni rang bzhin tha mi dad pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: If, although there is the exclusion of non-difference, the object of the cognition of the subject that has a non-different nature, such as ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúcow,‚Äù is non-difference itself,

original: rang bzhin med pa'i rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is not the exclusion of the absence of nature.

original: de ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThat is not so‚Äù is as follows.

original: skad ni smras na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad ni smras na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúif‚Äù is used.

original: tha mi dad par bya ba 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par bya ba 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: This non-difference is the specific characteristic,

original: ba lang bzho ba dang dgal bar nus pa yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos dang ma 'brel par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang bzho ba dang dgal bar nus pa yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos dang ma 'brel par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the specific characteristic would not be connected with the property, as in ‚Äúable to carry a load and to milk.‚Äù

original: des na rigs nyid ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'i yul du rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rigs nyid ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'i yul du rung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere class itself is not suitable as the object of engagement of a cognition of this kind.

original: mtshon par byed pa snang bas kyang de la 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: mtshon par byed pa snang bas kyang de la 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: It is also explained that it is not engaged by the appearance that causes the designation.

original: de'i sgo nas zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúthrough‚Äù is used.

original: ngag gi don ma 'brel bar yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: ngag gi don ma 'brel bar yang 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning of the words would be incoherent.

original: chu'i byed pa can gyi snang ba brjod pa bzhin te /
analyzed: chu'i byed pa can gyi snang ba brjod pa bzhin te /
translated: It would be like saying that the appearance of the water-crystal-stone is the function of water.

original: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: As was previously explained.

original: de dang ldan pa brjod na rab tu gcod pa yod pa yang bsal zin to zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa brjod na rab tu gcod pa yod pa yang bsal zin to zhes 'brel to //
translated: If one says that it is connected with that, the existence of the exclusion is also refuted.

original: mtha' yas pa mtshungs pas na dngos kyi yul nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ste rang gi mtshan nyid de'i tha mi dad pa spyi'i dbang gis rjes su 'gro bar snang ngo zhes brjod na /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa mtshungs pas na dngos kyi yul nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // de ste rang gi mtshan nyid de'i tha mi dad pa spyi'i dbang gis rjes su 'gro bar snang ngo zhes brjod na /
translated: Because of the similarity of the infinite, the object itself is established.üîΩIf one says that the specific property is not different from that, the universal appears through the power of the connection,

original: de'i tha mi dad pa rnam par gcod pa'i dbang gis 'gyur mod ces thams cad du mtshungs par ston pa ni rigs dang de dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas de ni ldog pa dang ldan pa la yang mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa yin no
analyzed: de'i tha mi dad pa rnam par gcod pa'i dbang gis 'gyur mod ces thams cad du mtshungs par ston pa ni rigs dang de dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas de ni ldog pa dang ldan pa la yang mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa yin no
translated: then it is said that it is due to the power of the exclusion of that non-difference. Everything is shown to be the same. This is from the statement genus and the possessor of that up to the conclusion that is also the same for the exclusion and the possessor of the exclusion.

original: // des ni de ltar gzugs brnyan nyid kyi nyes pa mtshungs kyang bdag nyid yon tan khyad par du gyur pa bstan pas slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i gzhung ji ltar thos bzhin pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan sel pa'i yul can du gzhung btsugs te /
analyzed: // des ni de ltar gzugs brnyan nyid kyi nyes pa mtshungs kyang bdag nyid yon tan khyad par du gyur pa bstan pas slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i gzhung ji ltar thos bzhin pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan sel pa'i yul can du gzhung btsugs te /
translated: Thus, although the fault of being a mere reflection is the same, the master Dignaga, having followed the scriptures of the master Dharmakirti, who taught that the self is a special quality, established the system that the object of other-exclusion is the object of cognition.

original: rang gis rtogs pa dang rjes su mtshungs par rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa yongs su spang bar bzhed pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul la ltos te /üîΩ@257a * // bshad pa ni ldog pa smra ba rnams ji ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gis rtogs pa dang rjes su mtshungs par rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa yongs su spang bar bzhed pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul la ltos te / @257a * // bshad pa ni ldog pa smra ba rnams ji ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And, in accordance with his own understanding, he completely abandoned the faults explained above.üîΩThe explanation is as follows: The proponents of exclusion say, ‚ÄúHow is it that the meaning of the word is the same in the case of the word ‚Äòcow‚Äô and the word ‚Äònon-non-cow‚Äô?‚Äù

original: re zhig mtha' yas par thal ba ni ldog pa dang ldan pa sgra'i don yin pa la mtshungs so zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig mtha' yas par thal ba ni ldog pa dang ldan pa sgra'i don yin pa la mtshungs so zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the word is the same in the case of the word ‚Äòcow‚Äô and the word ‚Äònon-non-cow.‚Äô

original: 'di ltar ldog pa smra ba rnams kyi ltar na ni sgra'i rtogs pas dngos po las tha dad pa'i dngos po med pa 'dzin pa yin la de yang log pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid gcig tu 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa des na lkog shal la
analyzed: 'di ltar ldog pa smra ba rnams kyi ltar na ni sgra'i rtogs pas dngos po las tha dad pa'i dngos po med pa 'dzin pa yin la de yang log pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid gcig tu 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa des na lkog shal la
translated: Thus, according to those who advocate the theory of exclusion, the cognition of a word apprehends an entity that is different from the entity, and that is also the nature of the apprehension of a single identity of a false conception.

original: sogs pa dang ldan pa zhen pa gcig gis yul du byas pa rnams las gcig la brda byas kyang de ltar zhen pas yul du byas pa gzhan la de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sogs pa dang ldan pa zhen pa gcig gis yul du byas pa rnams las gcig la brda byas kyang de ltar zhen pas yul du byas pa gzhan la de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, when one applies a convention to one among those that are taken as objects by a single conception, such as ‚Äúhaving a dewlap,‚Äù etc., one understands it in the same way in relation to the others that are taken as objects by that conception.

original: des na mtha' yas pa thal ba med do //
analyzed: des na mtha' yas pa thal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, the absurd consequence of infinite [words] does not follow.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba yang 'thad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba yang 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, it is also tenable that the nature [of the word] is universal.

original: ldog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba dang ldog pa ni sgro 'dogs rnam par bcad pa yin no zhes bya ba dang / rnam par 'khrul pa de ji ltar log pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa zhes bya ba ni sngar nyid nas bstan zin to //
analyzed: ldog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba dang ldog pa ni sgro 'dogs rnam par bcad pa yin no zhes bya ba dang / rnam par 'khrul pa de ji ltar log pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa zhes bya ba ni sngar nyid nas bstan zin to //
translated: How can that error be the reason for the reversal?

original: ldog mtshams gcig pas ni rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa yang dag pa'i shes par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: ldog mtshams gcig pas ni rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa yang dag pa'i shes par mi 'thad do //
translated: Since there is only one boundary, it is not tenable that the cognition that conforms to the essence is a correct cognition.üîΩIt is not the case that one does not engage with the absence of an entity because one has not realized its nature or generality.

original: dngos po med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid dam spyi chos ma rtogs pa'i phyir mi 'jug pa yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa de ni 'khrul pa'i dbang gis zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid dam spyi chos ma rtogs pa'i phyir mi 'jug pa yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa de ni 'khrul pa'i dbang gis zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: That is explained as being due to the power of error.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa la yang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis de ltar zhen to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa la yang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis de ltar zhen to //
translated: Even with respect to what is not its nature, one conceives of it in that way due to the power of error.

original: gal te yang de la sgra ma bkod kyang gcig tu mngon par zhen pa las de ltar rtogs nas rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan dmigs pa la yang 'di na ba lang 'dug gi zhes rtogs pa'am gzhan la ston par byed par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te yang de la sgra ma bkod kyang gcig tu mngon par zhen pa las de ltar rtogs nas rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan dmigs pa la yang 'di na ba lang 'dug gi zhes rtogs pa'am gzhan la ston par byed par 'gyur mod /
translated: Even though the word is not applied to it, if one understands it in that way through manifest adherence to oneness, then one would understand ‚Äúthe cow is here‚Äù or one would teach it to another, even when observing another‚Äôs particular.

original: de lta na yang ba lang rnyed par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ba lang rnyed par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: In that case, how could one obtain the cow?

original: dngos po mi bslu ba zer ba ni zhes smras so //
analyzed: dngos po mi bslu ba zer ba ni zhes smras so //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe thing is nondeceptive‚Äù is made.

original: ba lang nyid las rjes su spong ba'i ba lang gi rtogs pa nyams su myong ba'i bag chags la brten nas rjes su 'gro ba can du skye ba'i phyir rtogs pa de las de thob pa yin no //
analyzed: ba lang nyid las rjes su spong ba'i ba lang gi rtogs pa nyams su myong ba'i bag chags la brten nas rjes su 'gro ba can du skye ba'i phyir rtogs pa de las de thob pa yin no //
translated: Because the cognition of the cow that is subsequent to the cow itself arises in a manner that is subsequent to the latent potentialities that experience the cow, that thing is obtained from that cognition.

original: gal te sgra tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te sgra tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the word is not a valid cognition,

original: ji ltar de la mi bslu ba'i tshig rigs she na /
analyzed: ji ltar de la mi bslu ba'i tshig rigs she na /
translated: how could it be reasonable to say that it is nondeceptive with respect to that?

original: de ni bde na te gal te ba lang gi shes pa dngos po med pa nyid rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: de ni bde na te gal te ba lang gi shes pa dngos po med pa nyid rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin na /
translated: That is good. If the cognition of the cow is the cognition of the nature that is related to the nonexistence of the thing,

original: ci'i phyir 'di na ba lang 'dug go zhes brjod pa @257b na ba lang brten pa'i mi bslu bar nges par 'gyur gyi bum pa la ma yin na shes pa de de'i yul ma yin pas na bum ba rnyed pa na ji ste mi bslub ma yin laüîΩgzhan du bzlog par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di na ba lang 'dug go zhes brjod pa @257b na ba lang brten pa'i mi bslu bar nges par 'gyur gyi bum pa la ma yin na shes pa de de'i yul ma yin pas na bum ba rnyed pa na ji ste mi bslub ma yin la gzhan du bzlog par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the cognition is not the object of that, then why is it not deceptive when one finds the pot?

original: de la brjod pa ba lang nyid las ba lang du rnam par rtog pa rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir de la mi bslu bar 'chad kyi bum pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la brjod pa ba lang nyid las ba lang du rnam par rtog pa rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir de la mi bslu bar 'chad kyi bum pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: The response to that is: because the conception of a cow as a cow is in the aspect of a cow, it is explained to be non-deceptive with respect to that, but not with respect to the pot.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas 'di mi bslu ba yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas 'di mi bslu ba yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is non-deceptive in the way explained, but not in any other way.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa 'dir sbyar ba de la rtsod pas dngos po las skye na ni 'khrul pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa 'dir sbyar ba de la rtsod pas dngos po las skye na ni 'khrul pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: The opponent objects to the application of the previously explained method: If it arises from a thing, it would not be deceptive,

original: yang dag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be correct.

original: de ste 'khrul pa yin na ni mi bslu bar ga las 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ste 'khrul pa yin na ni mi bslu bar ga las 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is an error, how can it be non-deceptive?

original: de re zhig 'khrul pa nyid du bshad pa ni ma yin te zhes bya bas 'khrul pa dang 'gal ba'i chos spangs te /
analyzed: de re zhig 'khrul pa nyid du bshad pa ni ma yin te zhes bya bas 'khrul pa dang 'gal ba'i chos spangs te /
translated: It is not explained as an error, but rather as a quality that is incompatible with error.

original: der lhag par zhen pa'i phyir zhes bya bas 'khrul pa nyid du gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
analyzed: der lhag par zhen pa'i phyir zhes bya bas 'khrul pa nyid du gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
translated: Since there is attachment to that, it is established as an error.

original: dngos po las skyes pa de snang ba nyid yin na yang dag par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: dngos po las skyes pa de snang ba nyid yin na yang dag par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If it were to arise from an entity, it would be a correct appearance.

original: de ni med la de lta na yang der lhag par zhen pa yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni med la de lta na yang der lhag par zhen pa yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: But since it does not exist, and there is still attachment to it, it is an error.

original: dngos po las skyes pa la yang 'khrul pa'i yod pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po las skyes pa la yang 'khrul pa'i yod pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: It is explained that even if it arises from an entity, it is still an error.

original: 'od la nor bu nor bur zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'od la nor bu nor bur zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The example is given: ‚ÄúThe light of a jewel is mistaken for a jewel.‚Äù

original: de ni 'khrul pa slu ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes dogs na dgag pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa slu ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes dogs na dgag pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes bshad do //
translated: Fearing that it might be thought that this is a deceptive error, it is said that it is not.

original: nor bu'i 'od mthong bas 'khrul par brjod do //
analyzed: nor bu'i 'od mthong bas 'khrul par brjod do //
translated: It is said to be an error because of seeing the light of a jewel.

original: rigs pa yang bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rigs pa yang bshad pa ni /
translated: The reasoning is also explained:

original: 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of error is as follows.

original: 'khrul pa ni log par snang ba yin la /
analyzed: 'khrul pa ni log par snang ba yin la /
translated: Error is the appearance of what is unreal.

original: med na mi 'byung bas ni mi bslu ba yin pa'i phyir der snang ba ma yin yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis mi bslu ba yin pa la 'gal ba ji yod /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung bas ni mi bslu ba yin pa'i phyir der snang ba ma yin yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis mi bslu ba yin pa la 'gal ba ji yod /
translated: But since it is not deceptive because it does not occur when the object does not exist, then even though it does not appear as that, it is not deceptive because it does not occur when the object does not exist. What contradiction is there?

original: snang ba med par mi bslu bar med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: snang ba med par mi bslu bar med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it is not deceptive because it does not appear.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis der 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis der 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is that by virtue of not occurring when the object does not exist.

original: des na snang ba ma yin par bshad do //
analyzed: des na snang ba ma yin par bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that it is not an appearance.

original: dngos po mi 'dzin pa nyid rigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po mi 'dzin pa nyid rigs pa yin gyi /
translated: It is reasonable that it does not apprehend a real thing.

original: dngos po 'dzin na ni ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba de ston pas dngos po la zhes smos so //
analyzed: dngos po 'dzin na ni ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba de ston pas dngos po la zhes smos so //
translated: But if it does apprehend a real thing, then the fault explained above would occur. To show that, the root text says, ‚Äúin regard to a real thing.‚Äù

original: byed pa po ma yin pa la yang byed pa por lhag par zhen pas 'jug pa spangs nas ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin sgras sems gtod pas 'jug par 'dod na ni mi 'jug pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin pa la yang byed pa por lhag par zhen pas 'jug pa spangs nas ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin sgras sems gtod pas 'jug par 'dod na ni mi 'jug pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: If one wishes to engage in the object by directing the mind to the word just as it is, having abandoned engagement through the reification of a nonagent as an agent, then there would be no engagement at all.

original: @258a * // de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @258a * // de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no phenomenon that is its own characteristic.

original: 'on te rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la sgras sems gtod par byed de /
analyzed: 'on te rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la sgras sems gtod par byed de /
translated: But if the mind is directed to the sound itself,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i chos kyis rnam par gcad pa'i dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i chos kyis rnam par gcad pa'i dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because the object is understood as being differentiated by its own characteristic,

original: de'i tshe gang la sgra mthong ba de nyid la 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe gang la sgra mthong ba de nyid la 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
translated: then at that time, the sound would engage only that which is seen,

original: gzhan la ni ma yin te /üîΩha cang thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa ni gzhan la yang 'jug na ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin te / ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa ni gzhan la yang 'jug na ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: but not others,üîΩbecause it would follow, absurdly, that there would be too many possible referents.

original: rta la yang 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rta la yang 'jug par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it engaged others, then it would follow, absurdly, that it would engage even horses.

original: 'on te de ldan pa sgras 'dzin to zhes brjod na de'i tshe mtha' yas pa skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin na spyis ci zhig bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te de ldan pa sgras 'dzin to zhes brjod na de'i tshe mtha' yas pa skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin na spyis ci zhig bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin pa yin no //
translated: But if you say that the sound apprehends that which possesses the sound, then at that time, since there would be no end of faults, what need is there to mention the faults that would ensue from the use of the general term?

original: sgras ni rigs nyid 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: sgras ni rigs nyid 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: The sound itself apprehends the mere type,

original: gzung bar bya ba spyi'i don byed pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir 'jug par mi 'gyur ro zhes brtsad par bya ba yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba spyi'i don byed pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir 'jug par mi 'gyur ro zhes brtsad par bya ba yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: and it is not to be argued that the word does not apply because the universal does not have the capacity to perform a function.

original: gal te rigs gzung na yang zhes smos so //üîΩgang gis na rjes su 'gro ba 'di la ni sgra 'jug par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te rigs gzung na yang zhes smos so // gang gis na rjes su 'gro ba 'di la ni sgra 'jug par 'gyur la /
translated: To show this, he says, ‚ÄúEven if the universal is apprehended.‚ÄùüîΩBy what is this concomitance understood, that the word applies to this but not to that?

original: de las bzlog pa 'di la ni ma yin no zhes rjes su 'gro ba med pa 'di las ni don byed pa la de las bzlog pa 'di las ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa 'di la ni ma yin no zhes rjes su 'gro ba med pa 'di las ni don byed pa la de las bzlog pa 'di las ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ba /
translated: From this concomitance, the meaning of the word is understood: ‚ÄúThe word applies to that which performs a function, but not to that which does not.‚Äù

original: rigs dang gsal ba dag mngon sum gyis rtogs pa la bum pa dang snam bu ltar phan tshun ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid du ni rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: rigs dang gsal ba dag mngon sum gyis rtogs pa la bum pa dang snam bu ltar phan tshun ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid du ni rtogs pa med do //
translated: When the universal and the instance are directly perceived, they are not perceived as having natures that are mutually exclusive, like a pot and a cloth.

original: gang gis ni spyi rtogs byed pa'i sgra las don du gnyer ba mi 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gis ni spyi rtogs byed pa'i sgra las don du gnyer ba mi 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: By what means is the person who seeks the meaning of the word not engaged in understanding the universal?

original: de dag 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir 'dres pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir 'dres pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the universal and the instance are mixed, they are understood to have a mixed nature.

original: gang las ni don byed la gang las ni mi byed ces tha dad par rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: gang las ni don byed la gang las ni mi byed ces tha dad par rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: But it is not understood that it performs a function in one case and not in another.

original: des na rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rang bzhin la log pa zhig tu gyur pa gzhan rtogs pa med kyi /
analyzed: des na rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rang bzhin la log pa zhig tu gyur pa gzhan rtogs pa med kyi /
translated: Therefore, there is no understanding of an otherness that is a negation of intrinsic reality by intrinsic identity.

original: 'on kyang 'khrul pa rnams mi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'khrul pa rnams mi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not the case that error is not understood.

original: dper na ba khra mo la sogs pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na ba khra mo la sogs pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, it is like a variegated cow, etc.

original: de spangs nas kyang spyi'i rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro ;üîΩ/ gang zhig med na rigs kyi rtogs pa med pa'i gsal ba'i bdag nyid de dang ni rigs kyi rtogs pa 'dres par snang ba las 'da' ba ma yin te dper na don bya ba 'am /
analyzed: de spangs nas kyang spyi'i rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro ; / gang zhig med na rigs kyi rtogs pa med pa'i gsal ba'i bdag nyid de dang ni rigs kyi rtogs pa 'dres par snang ba las 'da' ba ma yin te dper na don bya ba 'am /
translated: Because, even though it is abandoned, the understanding of the universal exists.

original: gsal ba'i rang bzhin tsam bzhin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i rang bzhin tsam bzhin no //
translated: That which, if it did not exist, the understanding of the universal would not exist, and which has the nature of manifestation, is not beyond the appearance of a mixture with the understanding of the universal, for example, like a function or the mere nature of manifestation.

original: de'i phyir rigs kyi rtogs pa gsal ba 'di ni kha dog @258b gi rnam pa gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs kyi rtogs pa gsal ba 'di ni kha dog @258b gi rnam pa gsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this manifestation of the understanding of the universal is the manifestation of the aspect of color.

original: de'i phyir rigs pa na yang mi 'khrul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos spangs nas rtogs pa med pa'i phyir don bya ba don du gnyer bar 'jug par 'thad pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs pa na yang mi 'khrul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos spangs nas rtogs pa med pa'i phyir don bya ba don du gnyer bar 'jug par 'thad pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, even in the case of a valid cognition, it is quite reasonable to engage in the performance of an action for the sake of an object, having abandoned the consideration of a phenomenon that is the intrinsic identity of a non-erroneous cognition, because there is no apprehension of an object.

original: de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That is not so.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: At that time.

original: blo la 'dres par snang na ni rigs tha ma yin la /
analyzed: blo la 'dres par snang na ni rigs tha ma yin la /
translated: When there is an appearance as mixed in the cognition, it is the last type.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dang ldan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dang ldan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, it is not even associated with that,

original: rigs sam de dang ldan pa'i rang gi ngo bo rnam par gnas pa ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs sam de dang ldan pa'i rang gi ngo bo rnam par gnas pa ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the intrinsic identity of the type or that which is associated with it is not apprehended as something that is present.

original: 'di ltar rigs ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa rjes su 'gro ba'i rigs nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa rjes su 'gro ba'i rigs nyid yin la /
translated: Thus, the type is the very type that is empty of the intrinsic identity of its nature.

original: rigs dang 'brel bar mi 'khrul ba la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rigs dang 'brel bar mi 'khrul ba la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa kho na'o //
translated: And, in the case of non-erroneous association with the type, there is no intrinsic identity of a phenomenon that is present at all.

original: des na 'dres par snang na rjes su 'gro ba stong pa'i gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang rjes su song bar rtogs par 'gyur la rigs gsal ba'i chos kyis stong pa yang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gsal ba nyid du 'khrul pa yin la des na sangs rgyasüîΩpa'i smra ba la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'dres par snang na rjes su 'gro ba stong pa'i gsal ba'i rang bzhin yang rjes su song bar rtogs par 'gyur la rigs gsal ba'i chos kyis stong pa yang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gsal ba nyid du 'khrul pa yin la des na sangs rgyas pa'i smra ba la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: And because the nature of the object that is empty of the property of the clear type is also that, it is mistaken as clarity itself.üîΩTherefore, it is based on the statement of the Buddhist logicians that the object of the conceptual consciousness is a universal.

original: 'di ltar spyi dang spyi de yang don bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba rtogs par ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar spyi dang spyi de yang don bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba rtogs par ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
translated: In this way, how is it not mistaken to realize that a universal and that universal itself are called ‚Äúthe performer of a function‚Äù?

original: spyi rtogs pas yul du byas pa la don bya ba byed pa'o zhes bya bar ma rtogs par ni de don du gnyer ba mi 'jug pas de ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
analyzed: spyi rtogs pas yul du byas pa la don bya ba byed pa'o zhes bya bar ma rtogs par ni de don du gnyer ba mi 'jug pas de ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
translated: Since one does not engage in seeking that object without realizing that the object that is the domain of the realization of the universal is the performer of a function, how is it not mistaken?

original: des na de ltar rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang spyi'i yul can ma yin pa dang / gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: des na de ltar rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang spyi'i yul can ma yin pa dang / gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, in this way, it has been demonstrated that the conceptual consciousness is not a subject that has a universal as its object and that it is a subject that has an other-exclusion as its object.

original: tshul gzhan yang bshad pa'i don du spyi'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshul gzhan yang bshad pa'i don du spyi'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Another method of explanation is set forth in order to demonstrate the nature of consciousness in general.

original: de lta na ni 'o na zhes rtsod pa slong bar byed do //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na zhes rtsod pa slong bar byed do //
translated: Thus, the opponent raises the question, But if that is so...

original: rtsod pa 'di ni gzhung gi 'brel pa tsam byed par zad do //
analyzed: rtsod pa 'di ni gzhung gi 'brel pa tsam byed par zad do //
translated: This objection is merely a pretext for the treatise.

original: spyi tha dad pa khas blangs kyang de nyid 'di yin no zhes 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na kyang 'dir ni ngo shes pa'i rnam pa can gyis spyi gzhung gzugs par bya ba yin pas de nyid la de ltar brgal bar bya ste /
analyzed: spyi tha dad pa khas blangs kyang de nyid 'di yin no zhes 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na kyang 'dir ni ngo shes pa'i rnam pa can gyis spyi gzhung gzugs par bya ba yin pas de nyid la de ltar brgal bar bya ste /
translated: Although one accepts a difference in universals, one does not accept that this is that. But here, the universal is to be established by the aspect of recognition, so one should argue in that way.

original: nyes ba de ni med de tha dad kyang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: nyes ba de ni med de tha dad kyang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo brjod pa yin no //
translated: That fault does not exist, as stated in the verse beginning with Even though different...

original: tha dad pa yin yang shes pa la sogs pa don bya ba gcig byed pa'i don mthong nas de dag gzhan mthong ba na yang ngo shes par byed do //
analyzed: tha dad pa yin yang shes pa la sogs pa don bya ba gcig byed pa'i don mthong nas de dag gzhan mthong ba na yang ngo shes par byed do //
translated: Even though different, one sees the same object, such as consciousness, performing a single function. Having seen that object, one recognizes it when seeing something else.

original: gal te sngar mthong ba dag las tha dad pa kho na'i don mthong ba gang yin pa de lta na yang de nyid @259a * //üîΩ'di'o zhes de dag la ngo shes par byed pa kho na ste /üîΩ'di ltar snga ma dag las de dag tha dad kyang don de byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te sngar mthong ba dag las tha dad pa kho na'i don mthong ba gang yin pa de lta na yang de nyid @259a * // 'di'o zhes de dag la ngo shes par byed pa kho na ste / 'di ltar snga ma dag las de dag tha dad kyang don de byed pa kho na'o //
translated: In that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.

original: ngo shes par byed pa yang lta bar byed pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes bshad par rig par bya la lta bar byed pa yang mthong ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: ngo shes par byed pa yang lta bar byed pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes bshad par rig par bya la lta bar byed pa yang mthong ba nyid yin te /
translated: In that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.

original: des na ngo shes pa ni de nyid las skye zhing de yang don dag las yin pa'i phyir don nyid rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na ngo shes pa ni de nyid las skye zhing de yang don dag las yin pa'i phyir don nyid rgyu yin no //
translated: In that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'grel pa dang yang rjes su mthun no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'grel pa dang yang rjes su mthun no //
translated: In that case, it is only the recognition of that object that is different.üîΩIn that case, it is only the recognition

original: de de ltar don nyid las ngo shes pa skye ba ni spyi med par bshad nas de gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du bshad pa ni de las gzhan dang 'brel ba'i zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de de ltar don nyid las ngo shes pa skye ba ni spyi med par bshad nas de gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du bshad pa ni de las gzhan dang 'brel ba'i zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: He explains that the arising of recognition of the object itself is without a universal, and that it is the subject of the exclusion of other, which is called ‚Äúconnected with something other than that.‚Äù

original: gang dag shes pa la de lta bur gyur pa'i don bya ba mi byed pa de dang bral ba ste sgro 'dogs kyi sgo nas sbyar ba dag gsal ba de'i yul can gyi sgra rnams kyi don nam ngo bo shes pa lhan cig tu sbyar nas te /
analyzed: gang dag shes pa la de lta bur gyur pa'i don bya ba mi byed pa de dang bral ba ste sgro 'dogs kyi sgo nas sbyar ba dag gsal ba de'i yul can gyi sgra rnams kyi don nam ngo bo shes pa lhan cig tu sbyar nas te /
translated: Those cognitions that do not perform the function of an object in that way are connected with the exclusion of that, that is, with the exclusion of superimposition. The objects or referents of those cognitions are connected with the exclusion of that, that is, with the exclusion of superimposition.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
translated: Both are subjects of the exclusion of other.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: gang gi phyir 'dis sngar ba lang nyid dmigs la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dis sngar ba lang nyid dmigs la /
translated: Because this [cognition] previously observed cowness,

original: da ltar yang ba lang nyid dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ltar yang ba lang nyid dmigs pa yin no //
translated: it now observes cowness.

original: ba lang de nyid 'di ma yin pa de lta na yang ba lang ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i 'bras bu rnam par rtog pa gcig 'jug pa tsam yin gyi ngo shes pa rnam pa gcig pa can ni de'i stobs nyid las nyams su myong bas chos
analyzed: ba lang de nyid 'di ma yin pa de lta na yang ba lang ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i 'bras bu rnam par rtog pa gcig 'jug pa tsam yin gyi ngo shes pa rnam pa gcig pa can ni de'i stobs nyid las nyams su myong bas chos
translated: Although that cow is not this cow, the effect of the thought that is different from the thought of a non-cow is merely the engagement of a single thought. The experience of the power of that thought is the recognition of the cow.

original: nas skye ba yin no /
analyzed: nas skye ba yin no /
translated: The thought of a cow arises from that.

original: ji ltar ngo shes pa'i di 'thad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar ngo shes pa'i di 'thad par 'gyur te /
translated: How could the recognition of that be tenable?

original: gang gi phyir 'dir ni ba lang gi rnam pa tha mi dad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir ni ba lang gi rnam pa tha mi dad pa yin no //
translated: Because here the aspect of the cow is not different.

original: de ni ba lang khro bo ba lang ser skya zhes khyad par rnams dang tha dad med par gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni ba lang khro bo ba lang ser skya zhes khyad par rnams dang tha dad med par gyur pa yin te /
translated: That is, the thought of a cow is not different from the various features of a cow, such as a brown cow or a tawny cow.

original: des na ba lang gi rnam pa ngo shes pas de nyid 'di yin no zhes rtogs pa na khyad par yang khyad par gzhan dang gcig tu byas par 'gyur na khra bo gang yin pa de nyid ni ser skya ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ba lang gi rnam pa ngo shes pas de nyid 'di yin no zhes rtogs pa na khyad par yang khyad par gzhan dang gcig tu byas par 'gyur na khra bo gang yin pa de nyid ni ser skya ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the aspect of the cow is recognized and the thought ‚ÄúThat is it‚Äù arises, the features are also made one with the other features. But that which is brown is not tawny.

original: yang na khra bo ser skya zhes bya ba lta zhog gi ba lang gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang khyad par bzung ba na ngo shes pa mi srid par 'gyur te ba lang gang yin pa de 'di nyid do zhes rtogs pa na de nyid 'di'o zhes khyad
analyzed: yang na khra bo ser skya zhes bya ba lta zhog gi ba lang gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang khyad par bzung ba na ngo shes pa mi srid par 'gyur te ba lang gang yin pa de 'di nyid do zhes rtogs pa na de nyid 'di'o zhes khyad
translated: Or else, if one were to apprehend a difference by means of the mere aspect of a cow, recognition would be impossible, for when one understands that the cow is this very one, one would be apprehending a difference by means of the mere aspect of a cow, and that is not possible.üîΩ

original: par yang khyad par gzhan dang bsres par 'gyur te tha dad pa la brten pa ni tha mi dad pa rtogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par yang khyad par gzhan dang bsres par 'gyur te tha dad pa la brten pa ni tha mi dad pa rtogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, forget about the so-called variegated or tawny cow, it is impossible to recognize a particular when it is grasped by the mere aspect of a cow, because when one understands that the cow is this very one, the particular is mixed with another particular, because it is not suitable to understand the non-distinct based on the distinct.

original: des na ji ltar 'di ngo shes pa yin zhe na khyed bden te rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pas spyi rnam par 'jog mi @259b nus so zhes brjod do //
analyzed: des na ji ltar 'di ngo shes pa yin zhe na khyed bden te rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pas spyi rnam par 'jog mi @259b nus so zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, how is this recognized? You are right, I say that a universal cannot be posited by the understanding of a conception.

original: spyi ni mi bslu ba'i shes pa'i yul ma yin nam /
analyzed: spyi ni mi bslu ba'i shes pa'i yul ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt a universal the object of an undeceiving consciousness?

original: 'di la ni de mi srid do //
analyzed: 'di la ni de mi srid do //
translated: That is impossible here.

original: spyi ni tha dad kyang khyad par dag dang tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa yin pas de ji ltar tha dad pa ma bzung bar tha dad pa dag la mtshams sbyor ba'i rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur /
analyzed: spyi ni tha dad kyang khyad par dag dang tha mi dad par rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa yin pas de ji ltar tha dad pa ma bzung bar tha dad pa dag la mtshams sbyor ba'i rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur /
translated: But since the universal is the object of the cognition that realizes that the particulars are not different from it, how could it be the object of a cognition that connects the particulars without apprehending their non-difference?

original: yul dang dus kyi tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa ni de nyid 'di'o zhes rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul dang dus kyi tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa ni de nyid 'di'o zhes rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: And the difference of place and time is not different from it, because it is realized as ‚Äúthat is this.‚Äù

original: dper na bum pa rtag pa nyid la sngar dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa rtag pa nyid la sngar dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the case of the cognition of the permanence of a pot, where it is realized as ‚Äúthat which was previously observed is this.‚Äù

original: khyad par rnams ni de ltar tha mi dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par rnams ni de ltar tha mi dad pa ma yin no //
translated: But the particulars are not like that, they are not non-different.

original: gzhi tha dad pa yin na yang de dag la spyi yod par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhi tha dad pa yin na yang de dag la spyi yod par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And even if they are different bases, it is realized that they have a universal.

original: de ni gzhi tha dad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / gzhi mthun pa ma yin na yang mtshams sbyor ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir tha dad pa med pa gsal bar byed pa spyi'i sgrub byed ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de ni gzhi tha dad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / gzhi mthun pa ma yin na yang mtshams sbyor ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir tha dad pa med pa gsal bar byed pa spyi'i sgrub byed ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: But since it is not realized that they are different bases, and since it is not established that they are connected if they are not common bases, there is no proof at all that the universal is the illuminator of the non-difference of the particulars.

original: gang du tha dad par snang ba la gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'khrul pa yang mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du tha dad par snang ba la gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'khrul pa yang mi srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not impossible that there be such an error, that is, that one should think that what appears as different is one.

original: 'o na ji ltar ngo shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar ngo shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: But how is there recognition?

original: brjod pa tha dad 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtogs pa 'jug pas tha mi dad par shes pa ni ngo shes pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di ni brtag par mi nus pa tha mi dad par zhen pa kho na'o //
analyzed: brjod pa tha dad 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtogs pa 'jug pas tha mi dad par shes pa ni ngo shes pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di ni brtag par mi nus pa tha mi dad par zhen pa kho na'o //
translated: We reply: Recognition is not the knowledge of nondifference, since it is a conceptual cognition that apprehends difference. Rather, it is just the conception of nondifference, which cannot be analyzed.
