analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa nyid kyis chu las ma @265b skyes par grub pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If you think that it is not established that it is not produced from water because of the error,

original: gal te de lta na don gsal ba nyid med par shin tu gsal lo //
analyzed: gal te de lta na don gsal ba nyid med par shin tu gsal lo //
translated: then it is very clear that the manifestation of the meaning does not exist.

original: 'o na ni dbang po'i shes pa yang don dang 'brel par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni dbang po'i shes pa yang don dang 'brel par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But then the sense consciousness would not be related to the object,üîΩbecause the object is not related to the sense consciousness.

original: zla ba gnyis kyi rnam par shes pa zla ba gnyis kyi rang gi rnam par gzhag bsam skyes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis kyi rnam par shes pa zla ba gnyis kyi rang gi rnam par gzhag bsam skyes pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the consciousness of two moons is generated by the two moons.

original: zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa de ltar ma skyes pa'i phyir ma 'khrul pa yang ma skyes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa de ltar ma skyes pa'i phyir ma 'khrul pa yang ma skyes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But that consciousness of two moons is not nonerroneous because it is not generated in that way.

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not nonerroneous because it is different from that.

original: du bas bon las ma skyes bas myu gu mi skye par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du bas bon las ma skyes bas myu gu mi skye par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It follows that a sprout would not arise from a seed because smoke would not arise from a seed.

original: de lta na 'o na rnam par rtog pa yang don dang 'brel pa ni ma 'khrul pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na rnam par rtog pa yang don dang 'brel pa ni ma 'khrul pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if that is so, then even conceptual consciousness is only nonerroneous when it is related to an object.

original: de lta bu ni nus pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: de lta bu ni nus pa ma yin te ;
translated: That is not possible because

original: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa yul gyi khyad par myong ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi khyad par du byas pa rnams shes pa tsam gyi rang bzhin du khyad par med kyang rgyu'i khyad par so sor nges pa yod pa'i phyir sngon po nyid la
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa yul gyi khyad par myong ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi khyad par du byas pa rnams shes pa tsam gyi rang bzhin du khyad par med kyang rgyu'i khyad par so sor nges pa yod pa'i phyir sngon po nyid la
translated: although consciousnesses of blue, yellow, and so on, which are characterized by the experience of the features of the object, are not differentiated by the nature of mere consciousness, the individual ascertainment of the difference in their causes exists.

original: ni sngon po'i rnam par shes pa yin la /
analyzed: ni sngon po'i rnam par shes pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, consciousness of blue arises in dependence on blue.

original: de las gzhan las ni gzhan yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan las ni gzhan yin no //
translated: It is different from the other.

original: chu'i rnam par rtog pa la ni 'di yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chu'i rnam par rtog pa la ni 'di yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The idea of water does not exist in that.

original: 'di thams cad ni chu gcig rig pa nyid kyis spyi'i yul can yin pas phan tshun khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad pa nyid kyi gcig 'brel pa ma yin na thams cad kyang ma 'brel ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di thams cad ni chu gcig rig pa nyid kyis spyi'i yul can yin pas phan tshun khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad pa nyid kyi gcig 'brel pa ma yin na thams cad kyang ma 'brel ba yin no //
translated: All of this is the domain of a single cognition of water, and since it is the domain of a universal, the difference is not established. If there is no connection of one with the other, there is no connection of all with all.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can gyi rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam na sngon po shes pa yod pas sad pa'i sngon po shes pa 'khrul par 'gyur ba gang yin pa gcig 'khrul pas gzhan 'khrul par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can gyi rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam na sngon po shes pa yod pas sad pa'i sngon po shes pa 'khrul par 'gyur ba gang yin pa gcig 'khrul pas gzhan 'khrul par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The cognition that has a particular as its domain is not mistaken, as in the case of the cognition of blue in a dream. The cognition of blue in a dream is not mistaken, because the cognition of blue in the waking state is not mistaken.

original: smig rgyu mthong na shes pa nyams su myong bas yin gyi don las ma yin mod /
analyzed: smig rgyu mthong na shes pa nyams su myong bas yin gyi don las ma yin mod /
translated: When one sees a mirage, the cognition is experienced, not the object.

original: 'khrul pa go ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa go ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it that the cognition is mistaken?

original: de'i zhes smos te /
analyzed: de'i zhes smos te /
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the cognition.

original: 'khrul pa de ni chu'i bag chags sad pas skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa de ni chu'i bag chags sad pas skyed pa yin no //
translated: That mistake is produced by the activation of the latent impressions of water.

original: gal te smig rgyu mthong yang chu'i bag chags sad na /
analyzed: gal te smig rgyu mthong yang chu'i bag chags sad na /
translated: If one sees a mirage and the latent impression of water is awakened,

original: chu'i rnam par rtog pa kho nar 'gyur gyi nam yang smig rgyu'i rnam par rtog par ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: chu'i rnam par rtog pa kho nar 'gyur gyi nam yang smig rgyu'i rnam par rtog par ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then it would be only a conception of water, and it would never be a conception of a mirage.

original: khyad par mtshon pa la mi gsal ba'i phyir zhes smos te /
analyzed: khyad par mtshon pa la mi gsal ba'i phyir zhes smos te /
translated: The response is: because the distinction is not clear.

original: mngon sum gyis chu dang smig rgyu gnyis kyi 'byed par byed pa'i khyad par 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang gi mthus smig rgyu'i rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba gnyi ga la srid pa'i rnam pa'i @266a * //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis chu dang smig rgyu gnyis kyi 'byed par byed pa'i khyad par 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // gang gi mthus smig rgyu'i rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba gnyi ga la srid pa'i rnam pa'i @266a * //
translated: Because direct perception is unable to apprehend the distinction that distinguishes water and a mirage.

original: rjes su byed pa can gyi mngon sum ni 'byed par byed pa'i khyad par gsal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su byed pa can gyi mngon sum ni 'byed par byed pa'i khyad par gsal ba ma yin no //
translated: The direct perception that conforms to the aspect of both, by whose power the conception of a mirage occurs, is not clear with regard to the distinction that distinguishes them.

original: de lta na yang chu kho na'i bag chags sad pa ga las yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang chu kho na'i bag chags sad pa ga las yin te /
translated: Even so, how is it that only the latent impression of water is awakened?üîΩIs it not the case that the latent impression of just that is awakened?

original: de tsam gyi bag chags sad par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes skyon la ltos pas zhes bshad do ;
analyzed: de tsam gyi bag chags sad par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes skyon la ltos pas zhes bshad do ;
translated: The response is: because of the fault of looking at the fault.

original: ; chu don du gnyer bas chu'i rnam pa las tha dad par byed pa smig rgyu'i khyad par ma bzung ba na /
analyzed: ; chu don du gnyer bas chu'i rnam pa las tha dad par byed pa smig rgyu'i khyad par ma bzung ba na /
translated: When one who is in need of water does not apprehend the difference of a mirage from the aspect of water,

original: chu la srid pa'i rang bzhin la chur zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: chu la srid pa'i rang bzhin la chur zhen pa yin no //
translated: he is attached to the nature of water in water.

original: de bzhin du thag pa'i yul la sbrul du rtogs pa dang / tho yor la skyes bur rtogs pa la sogs pa la yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du thag pa'i yul la sbrul du rtogs pa dang / tho yor la skyes bur rtogs pa la sogs pa la yang rig par bya'o //
translated: So too, one should understand the apprehension of a snake in the place of a rope, the apprehension of a man in a scarecrow, and so on.

original: de lta bas na zhes bya ba nas rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas ni skabs des na de ltar ngo shes pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can spyi'i rnam par shes pa 'khrul pa na gsal ba kho na las skyesüîΩpa yin no zhes rang gi phyogs la bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba nas rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas ni skabs des na de ltar ngo shes pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can spyi'i rnam par shes pa 'khrul pa na gsal ba kho na las skyes pa yin no zhes rang gi phyogs la bsgrubs nas /
translated: Therefore, up to the conclusion, ‚Äúbecause there is no concomitance,‚Äù having established in this context that the consciousness of a universal, which has the form of recognition and so on, arises only from a manifest impression,

original: gzhan gyis kyang 'di khas blangs par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang 'di khas blangs par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes smos so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúMoreover,‚Äù in order to prove that the opponent also accepts this.

original: spyi smra ba'i ltar na 'ang mi ngo shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi blo ni spyi 'ba' zhig la dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi smra ba'i ltar na 'ang mi ngo shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi blo ni spyi 'ba' zhig la dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Even according to the theory of the universal, the cognition of the nature of the recognized person does not have a universal alone as its object.

original: des na de spyi kho na las 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de spyi kho na las 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not arise from a universal alone.

original: spyi'i blo ni khyad par sre ba'i rnam pa can yin gyi tha dad pa dag la tha mi dad pa mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i blo ni khyad par sre ba'i rnam pa can yin gyi tha dad pa dag la tha mi dad pa mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of a universal has the form of the superimposition of a difference, but it does not have the form of the connection of the undifferentiated with the differentiated,

original: de 'di la'o snyam du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'di la'o snyam du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no cognition, ‚ÄúThis is in that.‚Äù

original: des na spyi'i blos rang gi mtshan nyid rnams las spyi logs su byas te ma dmigs pas gsal ba tha mi dad par rtogs pa na gsal ba yang rnam pa tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba kho na'i spyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yinüîΩno // gcig las so sor nges par byed /
analyzed: des na spyi'i blos rang gi mtshan nyid rnams las spyi logs su byas te ma dmigs pas gsal ba tha mi dad par rtogs pa na gsal ba yang rnam pa tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba kho na'i spyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no // gcig las so sor nges par byed /
translated: Therefore, since the cognition of a universal does not perceive a universal apart from the particular, when it cognizes the particular as undifferentiated, the particular also becomes the object of the cognition that apprehends it as undifferentiated, but it is not a universal alone.

original: mi snang la gnyis kyi chos snang gang yin pa de ni gcig kho na la gzhag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi snang la gnyis kyi chos snang gang yin pa de ni gcig kho na la gzhag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to posit as a universal that which is not perceived as a universal in one thing and is perceived as a universal in another.

original: des na ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni spyi bzhin du bsal ba'i blor 'gyur te dbyug pa thogs pa bzhin du rang gi rten ma rtogs pa na spyi dang de dang ldan pa dag tha dad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni spyi bzhin du bsal ba'i blor 'gyur te dbyug pa thogs pa bzhin du rang gi rten ma rtogs pa na spyi dang de dang ldan pa dag tha dad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of ‚Äúox‚Äù would be a cognition of a universal, because, like one who holds a stick, one does not understand its basis when one does not understand the universal and its possessor.

original: ji ltar na spyi kho nar rjes su song bar rtogs pa gsal ba zhes bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar na spyi kho nar rjes su song bar rtogs pa gsal ba zhes bya bar 'gyur /
translated: How could it be that one understands only the universal to be pervaded, and that the cognition is called ‚Äúclear‚Äù?

original: des na 'di khyad par rnams tha mi dad par 'dzin pa dang / de la rten pa grub pa'o//
analyzed: des na 'di khyad par rnams tha mi dad par 'dzin pa dang / de la rten pa grub pa'o//
translated: Therefore, this is the establishment of the cognition that apprehends the particulars as undifferentiated and that which is based on them.

original: @266b 'grel ba ni gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @266b 'grel ba ni gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary states, ‚ÄúOthers say . . .‚Äù

original: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i shes pa de dang ldan pa'i blo yin la khar ba thogs pa bzhin rnam par gcad par bya ba dang / rnam par gcod par byed pa'i dngos po yang med pa yin na ni tha mi dad pa'i blo khyad par la dmigs pa zhig na /
analyzed: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i shes pa de dang ldan pa'i blo yin la khar ba thogs pa bzhin rnam par gcad par bya ba dang / rnam par gcod par byed pa'i dngos po yang med pa yin na ni tha mi dad pa'i blo khyad par la dmigs pa zhig na /
translated: If the cognition that is associated with the thought ‚Äúox‚Äù is a cognition that is like one who holds a stick, and if there is no object that is differentiated and that which differentiates, then the undifferentiated cognition would be one that observes the particulars.

original: 'di spyi tsam la brten pa nyid yin na ni 'gal ba med de zhe na /
analyzed: 'di spyi tsam la brten pa nyid yin na ni 'gal ba med de zhe na /
translated: If it is just based on the universal, there is no contradiction.

original: rtag tu de tsam zhes smos so //
analyzed: rtag tu de tsam zhes smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù is said because it is always so.

original: rtag pa kho nar sgra las byung ba'i shes pa dang mngon sum la yang ngo //
analyzed: rtag pa kho nar sgra las byung ba'i shes pa dang mngon sum la yang ngo //
translated: The cognition that arises from words is also direct perception.

original: sgra las byung ba spyi'i yul can yin na mngon sum gyis gsal ba rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba spyi'i yul can yin na mngon sum gyis gsal ba rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the cognition that arises from words has a universal for its object, then it would understand the particular.

original: gang gi tshe gnyi gas kyang spyi'i kho na rtogs pa de'i tshe gsal ba mi shes pa kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gnyi gas kyang spyi'i kho na rtogs pa de'i tshe gsal ba mi shes pa kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If both had universals for their objects, then it would follow that one would not understand the particular at all.

original: gsal ba so so rang gi rang bzhin shes pa gzhan ni med de khyad par dang bral ba'i khyad par can gyi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba so so rang gi rang bzhin shes pa gzhan ni med de khyad par dang bral ba'i khyad par can gyi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no other cognition of the individual nature of the particular, because the nature of the particular is not understood without a distinction.

original: 'di ltar ba lang 'di ni khra bo'o zhes bya ba la de kho na rtar 'gyur te de la yang khra bo nyid kyi spyi'i sgo nas gsal ba rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar ba lang 'di ni khra bo'o zhes bya ba la de kho na rtar 'gyur te de la yang khra bo nyid kyi spyi'i sgo nas gsal ba rtogs pa yin no //
translated: For example, when one says, ‚ÄúThis cow is variegated,‚Äù it is just that which is a cow, and it is understood as a particular through the universal ‚Äúvariegated.‚Äù

original: 'di zhes bya ba yang rtag tu rjes su 'gro ba kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba yang rtag tu rjes su 'gro ba kho na'o //
translated: And ‚Äúthis‚Äù always refers to the particular.

original: des na gal te khyad par gyi blo khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin na /
analyzed: des na gal te khyad par gyi blo khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the cognition of the particular is the final limit of the particular,

original: 'gal ba mi shes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi shes pa kho na'o //
translated: They are simply ignorant of the contradiction.

original: de ste khyad par dang ldan pa'i mthar thug pa yin na /
analyzed: de ste khyad par dang ldan pa'i mthar thug pa yin na /
translated: If the final object is qualified,

original: khyad par rnams tha mi dad pa'i rten du 'gyur ba kho na ste /
analyzed: khyad par rnams tha mi dad pa'i rten du 'gyur ba kho na ste /
translated: then the qualifications themselves would be the basis of the non-different [object].

original: ba lang ngo zhes bya ba 'di la gsal ba'i rnam pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang ngo zhes bya ba 'di la gsal ba'i rnam pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in the expression ‚Äúthis is a cow,‚Äù there is no apprehension of any other aspect of the manifest object.

original: mdo nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: mdo nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: The s≈´tra itself explains:

original: gal te blo 'di zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te blo 'di zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf the cognition is of this,‚Äù

original: gal te shes na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te shes na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it is known, then this fault arises.

original: ma shes na skyon ci yod ce na /
analyzed: ma shes na skyon ci yod ce na /
translated: If it is not known, what is the fault?

original: de'i tshe na zhes smos so //
analyzed: de'i tshe na zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚Äúat that time.‚Äù

original: ba lang zhes bya bar shes pa spyi la dmigs pas gsal ba ma shes na nam yang spyi dang ldan pa skabs kyis spyi dang 'brel pa nges par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba lang zhes bya bar shes pa spyi la dmigs pas gsal ba ma shes na nam yang spyi dang ldan pa skabs kyis spyi dang 'brel pa nges par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the cognition of the universal ‚Äúcow‚Äù does not know the manifest object, then it will never ascertain the connection between the universal and the particular, because the universal is always associated with the particular.

original: 'di rang gi phyogs la spyi dang ldan pa'i gsal ba rnam par 'jog pa gang yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di rang gi phyogs la spyi dang ldan pa'i gsal ba rnam par 'jog pa gang yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the manifest object is posited as possessing the universal in one‚Äôs own system,

original: tshad ma can ma yin par thal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshad ma can ma yin par thal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: then it follows that it is not a valid cognition. This is the meaning.

original: gsal ba shes pa med par ni gsal ba'i chos rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha snyad med par brjod pas ston par byed de /
analyzed: gsal ba shes pa med par ni gsal ba'i chos rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha snyad med par brjod pas ston par byed de /
translated: He shows that there is no convention that a clear object is realized without a clear consciousness.

original: gsal ba mi shes pa'i rgyu de las na tha snyad med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba mi shes pa'i rgyu de las na tha snyad med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of that cause, the non-understanding of the clear, there is no convention.

original: 'grel pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba yin @267a * //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba yin @267a * //
translated: The commentary has ‚Äúwhen‚Äù and so on.

original: no // khyad par rnams zhes bya ba 'di rang gi mtshan nyid dag go //
analyzed: no // khyad par rnams zhes bya ba 'di rang gi mtshan nyid dag go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe particulars‚Äù are the specific characteristics.

original: gal te spyi 'dzin pas khyad par rnams so so'i rang gi rang bzhin du dmigs pa de'i tshe nyes pa ci yod /
analyzed: gal te spyi 'dzin pas khyad par rnams so so'i rang gi rang bzhin du dmigs pa de'i tshe nyes pa ci yod /
translated: If the apprehension of the universal is the perception of the particulars as their own nature, what is the fault?

original: sngon po dang ser po bzhin du gnyi ga shes pa gcig gis 'dzin par mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po bzhin du gnyi ga shes pa gcig gis 'dzin par mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no contradiction in the apprehension of both by a single consciousness, as in the case of blue and yellow.

original: des na gzhan gyi ltar na 'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na gzhan gyi ltar na 'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would not be proper to say ‚Äúeven for the other‚Äù and so on.

original: spyi'i blo la ni gsal ba yang so sor rang gi rang bzhin du snang ba la 'gal ba ci yang med pa'i phyir 'di brjod pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: spyi'i blo la ni gsal ba yang so sor rang gi rang bzhin du snang ba la 'gal ba ci yang med pa'i phyir 'di brjod pas ci zhig bya /
translated: In general, it is not contradictory for clarity to appear as the individual nature of cognition. So what is the point of saying this?

original: 'on te gsal ba'i yul can tu 'gyur dogs na 'thad pa yang ma yin pa des na mi 'dzin par brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba'i yul can tu 'gyur dogs na 'thad pa yang ma yin pa des na mi 'dzin par brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you fear that it would become the object of clarity, then it is not tenable that it is not apprehended.

original: rtsod pa 'di ni gzhan du mthar thug par 'gyur te /üîΩdes na / gal te dngos cig grogs byed pa'i //
analyzed: rtsod pa 'di ni gzhan du mthar thug par 'gyur te / des na / gal te dngos cig grogs byed pa'i //
translated: This dispute will be concluded elsewhere.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: Thus it would be meaningless to say, ‚ÄúIf one thing assists another,‚Äù and so on.

original: des na 'di ni khyad par rnams kyang tha mi dad pa'i shes pa'i rten nyid du bsgrub pa la nges pa yin pas gal te dgos pa so so rang gi ngo bos dmigs pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: des na 'di ni khyad par rnams kyang tha mi dad pa'i shes pa'i rten nyid du bsgrub pa la nges pa yin pas gal te dgos pa so so rang gi ngo bos dmigs pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore this is certain to establish that even the features are the basis of nondistinct cognition. If the purpose is to observe the individual nature of each, there is no fault.

original: de lta ma yin na ni dmigs pa don ci yin zhing de dag 'brel par gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang ji ltar rigs te rang gi bdag nyid kyis ma rtogs na 'brel par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni dmigs pa don ci yin zhing de dag 'brel par gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang ji ltar rigs te rang gi bdag nyid kyis ma rtogs na 'brel par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Otherwise, what would be the point of the object? And how could the words ‚Äúgrasping them as related‚Äù be appropriate, because if they are not understood by themselves, they are not established as related.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: re zhig tha mi dad pa'i rtogs pa 'di ni grub pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig tha mi dad pa'i rtogs pa 'di ni grub pa yin no //
translated: First, this nondistinct cognition is established.

original: 'di nyid ni gzhan gyis kyang khyad par la dmigs par khas blang dgos na /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni gzhan gyis kyang khyad par la dmigs par khas blang dgos na /
translated: And this very thing must be accepted by the opponent as the perception of a difference.

original: 'di la khyad par rnams rang bzhin du snang ba yang med do //
analyzed: 'di la khyad par rnams rang bzhin du snang ba yang med do //
translated: But in this case, the differences do not appear as real.

original: des na khyad par rnams kho na tha mi dad par dmigs pa yin no zhes bsgrub pa'i phyir 'di brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na khyad par rnams kho na tha mi dad par dmigs pa yin no zhes bsgrub pa'i phyir 'di brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is stated to prove that only the differences are perceived as nondistinct.

original: 'o na 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is mistaken.

original: 'bad pa 'di'i don 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'bad pa 'di'i don 'di nyid yin no //
translated: This is the point of this effort.

original: tshig tham bshad pa ni des na de ltar gzhan gyi khas blangs pa la yang gsal ba rnams spyi'i shes pa'i dmigs pa nyid yod pa des na spyi'i don med do zhes gzhung gzugs pa na gzhan dag spyi yod na de dmigs pa nyid du 'gyur gyi gzhan
analyzed: tshig tham bshad pa ni des na de ltar gzhan gyi khas blangs pa la yang gsal ba rnams spyi'i shes pa'i dmigs pa nyid yod pa des na spyi'i don med do zhes gzhung gzugs pa na gzhan dag spyi yod na de dmigs pa nyid du 'gyur gyi gzhan
translated: The words ‚ÄúTherefore, in that way, even in the case of what is accepted by others, since the manifest is the object of cognition of generality, therefore there is no meaning of generality‚Äù are the treatise.

original: du ni ma yin pa des na des khas len to zhes gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: du ni ma yin pa des na des khas len to zhes gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir /
translated: When the treatise is composed, others say, ‚ÄúIf generality exists, it would be the object of cognition, but not otherwise. Therefore, that is accepted.‚Äù

original: gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i //
analyzed: gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i //
translated: If one thing assists another,

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: this is stated.

original: khyad par rnams kho na tha mi dad par dmigs so //
analyzed: khyad par rnams kho na tha mi dad par dmigs so //
translated: The particulars alone are observed without distinction.

original: de yang 'di dag las spyi med par ni @267b mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang 'di dag las spyi med par ni @267b mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, it would not be without generality from these.

original: des na de'i don nyid du spyi khas len pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'o //
analyzed: des na de'i don nyid du spyi khas len pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the idea is that generality is accepted as its very meaning.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni gal te 'di snyam du zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni gal te 'di snyam du zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is explained: ‚ÄúIf one thinks in this way‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: gsal ba rnams rgyu 'ba' zhig yin par ni ma zad kyang 'on kyang dmigs pa yin no zhes dmigs pa'i dngos pos rgyu yin la zhes bya bas brjod do //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams rgyu 'ba' zhig yin par ni ma zad kyang 'on kyang dmigs pa yin no zhes dmigs pa'i dngos pos rgyu yin la zhes bya bas brjod do //
translated: It is not only the cause of the manifestation, but it is also the object.

original: de lta yin dang spyi rnam par shes pa de byed pa la lhan cig byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang spyi rnam par shes pa de byed pa la lhan cig byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, the universal is a cooperative condition in the production of the cognition of itself.

original: des na dmigs pa yang lhan cig tu 'gyur bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na dmigs pa yang lhan cig tu 'gyur bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the object is also a cooperative condition.

original: gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i //üîΩzhes bya ba'i gang yin pa bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te dngos gcig grogs byed pa'i // zhes bya ba'i gang yin pa bstan pa ni gang gi tshe zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If one thing assists another,üîΩThe meaning of this statement is that when the universal is the object of a cognition, it is a cooperative condition in the production of that cognition.üîΩIn order to refute this, it is said:

original: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir brjod pa ni dngos po cig des de rnams kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir brjod pa ni dngos po cig des de rnams kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one thing assists another,üîΩThis shows that the universal is not a cooperative condition in the production of the cognition of itself.

original: 'dis ni re zhig dmigs pa'i dngos po nyid gsal to //
analyzed: 'dis ni re zhig dmigs pa'i dngos po nyid gsal to //
translated: This shows that the universal is not the object of the cognition of itself.

original: gal te spyi yod du zin kyang gsal ba rnams gcig tu gyur pa yin na spyis ci bya /
analyzed: gal te spyi yod du zin kyang gsal ba rnams gcig tu gyur pa yin na spyis ci bya /
translated: If the universal exists, but the manifestations are one, what is the use of the universal?

original: de ste ma yin na de lta na ni 'o na rang gi bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir gcig pa'i yul du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ste ma yin na de lta na ni 'o na rang gi bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir gcig pa'i yul du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it is not so, then the object would be one because it would be one with itself.

original: gsal ba rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: But the manifestations are not one.

original: de nyid dang 'phrod pa 'du ba las ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i tha mi dad pas de dag tha mi dad pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid dang 'phrod pa 'du ba las ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i tha mi dad pas de dag tha mi dad pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is the manifestation because it is not different from the manifestation that is in contact with it, then the object would be the manifestation, which is not different from it.

original: 'brel pa yin yang gzhan gzhan gyi ngo bor 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'brel pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa yin yang gzhan gzhan gyi ngo bor 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'brel pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though there is a relation, one thing does not become the essence of another thing; rather, it becomes the possessor of the relation.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni bdag nyid du gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni bdag nyid du gyur pa yin la /
translated: The essence of a thing is its own nature.

original: spyi ni bdag nyid ma yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni bdag nyid ma yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The universal is not its own nature, because it is different from it.

original: de lta ma yin na ni tha mi dad par thal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni tha mi dad par thal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, it would follow, absurdly, that it would not be different.

original: tha dad par gyur pa'i tha mi dad pa rang bzhin du gyur pa ma yin pas ni tha dad par gyur pa rnams tha mi dad par rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad par gyur pa'i tha mi dad pa rang bzhin du gyur pa ma yin pas ni tha dad par gyur pa rnams tha mi dad par rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Since a thing that is different by nature cannot be different, it is not possible to understand that different things are not different.

original: de dang ldan pa tsam du rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa tsam du rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Because it would follow, absurdly, that it would be perceived merely by possessing that.

original: rtogs pa ji lta bur gyur pa gang gis gang gi rang bzhin de yin par rtogs par 'thad pa de nyid de ltar de lta bu nyid du de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa ji lta bur gyur pa gang gis gang gi rang bzhin de yin par rtogs par 'thad pa de nyid de ltar de lta bu nyid du de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever is perceived in whatever way, by virtue of which it is perceived to be of such and such a nature, that is just the way it is, and that is its nature.

original: tha dad par gyur pa dang ni 'brel du zin kyang gzhan de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad par gyur pa dang ni 'brel du zin kyang gzhan de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if it were related to something different, it would not be perceived to be of the nature of that other thing.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa 'brel pa las ni rang gi ngo bor gyur pa tha mi dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa 'brel pa las ni rang gi ngo bor gyur pa tha mi dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, even if it were related to something different, it would not be of the same nature as that.

original: des na tha mi dad par gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni mi srid do //
analyzed: des na tha mi dad par gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni mi srid do //
translated: Thus it is impossible for it to be of the same nature as that.

original: de bas na gcig gis tha dad pa nyid mi sel bas na /üîΩdngos po @268a * //
analyzed: de bas na gcig gis tha dad pa nyid mi sel bas na / dngos po @268a * //
translated: Therefore, since one cannot eliminate difference,üîΩit is not the case that the consciousness that is the object of the differentüîΩmanifestations that assist a single entity is based on something that is not

original: gcig gis grogs byed pa'i gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig gis grogs byed pa'i gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: different.

original: de nyid du gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid la ni rnam par shes pa gcig 'gal lo zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid du gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid la ni rnam par shes pa gcig 'gal lo zhes ston pa ni /
translated: In order to establish that very point, he shows that a single consciousness is contradictory in regard to difference:

original: tha dad phyir na de dag la //
analyzed: tha dad phyir na de dag la //
translated: Because of difference,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: he says.

original: rgyur zhes bya ba ni dmigs par ro //
analyzed: rgyur zhes bya ba ni dmigs par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAs cause‚Äù means as object.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni gcig pu des zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni gcig pu des zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: He explains that very point: ‚ÄúBy that one alone,‚Äù etc.

original: de de ltar 'di dag dmigs pa'i dngos pos gcig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin par smra ba la /
analyzed: de de ltar 'di dag dmigs pa'i dngos pos gcig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin par smra ba la /
translated: Thus, in regard to the assertion that they are the cause of a single consciousness by means of the entity that is the object,

original: dmigs pa nyid bsal nas rgyu'i dngos po bsal ba'i phyir te du ma'ang gcig ltos nas zhes smos so //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid bsal nas rgyu'i dngos po bsal ba'i phyir te du ma'ang gcig ltos nas zhes smos so //
translated: after refuting the very object, he refutes the entity of the cause, saying, ‚ÄúEven many are one in dependence.‚Äù

original: dngos po du ma rnams kyang gal te gcig la ltos nas tha mi dad par shes par byed pa des na dngos po gcig grogs byed pa can gyi gsal ba rnams shes pa'i rgyur brjod do //
analyzed: dngos po du ma rnams kyang gal te gcig la ltos nas tha mi dad par shes par byed pa des na dngos po gcig grogs byed pa can gyi gsal ba rnams shes pa'i rgyur brjod do //
translated: If many entities are made known as non-different in dependence on one, then the manifestation that has the one entity as its helper is said to be the cause of consciousness.

original: rtsod pa byed pa'i dogs pa 'di nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: rtsod pa byed pa'i dogs pa 'di nyid ston pa ni /
translated: He shows just this doubt that is being disputed, saying,

original: tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of difference,‚Äù etc.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa de'i phyir du mas mi skyed do zhes ni mi smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa de'i phyir du mas mi skyed do zhes ni mi smra'o //
translated: We do not say that because they are different, many do not produce it.

original: ji ltar khra bo dang bum pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir ba lang gi shes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du khra bo dang ser skya dag kyang 'gyur ro zhes gang gis brjod par 'gyur ba tha dad pas 'bras bu skyed pa la 'gal ba med
analyzed: ji ltar khra bo dang bum pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir ba lang gi shes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du khra bo dang ser skya dag kyang 'gyur ro zhes gang gis brjod par 'gyur ba tha dad pas 'bras bu skyed pa la 'gal ba med
translated: Just as a multicolored object and a pot are not causes of the cognition of an ox because they are different, so too a multicolored object and a tawny object would not be causes of the cognition of a tawny object.

original: do // 'on kyang snga ma dag la ni rnam par shes pa de skyed pa'i lhan cig byed pa med pa la 'di gnyis la ni yod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: do // 'on kyang snga ma dag la ni rnam par shes pa de skyed pa'i lhan cig byed pa med pa la 'di gnyis la ni yod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: But the former do not have the simultaneous causes of that cognition, while these two do have them.

original: des na lhan cig byed pa dang bral bas 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na lhan cig byed pa dang bral bas 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because they lack simultaneous causes, they are contradictory.

original: 'di la ni spyi gcig lhan cig byed pa yod pa yin no zhe na de bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di la ni spyi gcig lhan cig byed pa yod pa yin no zhe na de bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: But in this case, a single universal is the simultaneous cause.

original: de lta na ni 'o na ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na ni zhes smos so //
translated: To refute that, it says, ‚ÄúIf that were so‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: 'dis spyi lhan cig byed pa yin na gsal ba rnams rgyu yin par brjod pa rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med par bstan pa'i sgo nas sel bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis spyi lhan cig byed pa yin na gsal ba rnams rgyu yin par brjod pa rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med par bstan pa'i sgo nas sel bar byed do //
translated: This refutes the assertion that the universals are the cause of the manifestation, by showing that there is no invariable concomitance between the presence and absence of the universals and the presence and absence of the manifestation.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid de gcig pu'i tshad ma can yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid de gcig pu'i tshad ma can yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the effect of that is the existence of the single entity, which is the only evidence available.

original: de med na de mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na de mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if that does not exist, the other is not perceived.

original: 'ga' zhig yod pa na 'bras bu snga na med pa 'byung ba gang zhig med na log la gzhan dag ni log kyang mi ldog pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen de tsam tshogs pas skyed par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yod pa na 'bras bu snga na med pa 'byung ba gang zhig med na log la gzhan dag ni log kyang mi ldog pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen de tsam tshogs pas skyed par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: When something exists, the effect that did not exist previously occurs; and if that does not exist, it does not occur. The other does not occur even when it does not exist. It is understood that the effect is produced by the mere assemblage of the cooperative conditions.

original: de la spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar gnas na 'byung ba'i 'bras bu gal te gsal ba yod @268b kyang spyi med par mi 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: de la spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar gnas na 'byung ba'i 'bras bu gal te gsal ba yod @268b kyang spyi med par mi 'byung ba'am /
translated: If the effect that occurs when the universal and the particular are present does not occur in the absence of the universal even when the particular exists,

original: spyi yod kyang gsal ba med par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: spyi yod kyang gsal ba med par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: or if it occurs in the absence of the particular even when the universal exists,

original: de'i tshe gnyi gas bskyed par bya ba yin par rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyi gas bskyed par bya ba yin par rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: then it would be understood that the effect is produced by both.

original: ldog pa bsgrub pa de ni 'di la mi srid de /üîΩgsal ba med par spyi yod pa'am /
analyzed: ldog pa bsgrub pa de ni 'di la mi srid de / gsal ba med par spyi yod pa'am /
translated: But it is impossible for this to be established in the case of a universal.üîΩFor it is impossible to show that a universal exists without an instance,

original: spyi yod pa na gsal ba med pa bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi yod pa na gsal ba med pa bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or that an instance exists without a universal.

original: de nyid kyi phyir spyi 'ba' zhig las shes pa de 'byung ngo zhes brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir spyi 'ba' zhig las shes pa de 'byung ngo zhes brjod par mi nus te /
translated: Therefore, it cannot be said that cognition arises from a universal alone,

original: gsal ba med par de tsam yod par bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba med par de tsam yod par bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to show that a mere universal exists without an instance.

original: des na slob dpon spyi dang lhan cig pa'i gsal ba rgyu nyid du rtogs pa na de med kyang 'byung ba nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: des na slob dpon spyi dang lhan cig pa'i gsal ba rgyu nyid du rtogs pa na de med kyang 'byung ba nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: Therefore, when the master understands that an instance together with a universal is the cause, he explains that it arises even without the instance.

original: gsal ba de dag re re med par yang spyi de gcig pus bskyed par bya ba'i blo la gsal ba de rnams kyi nus pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba de dag re re med par yang spyi de gcig pus bskyed par bya ba'i blo la gsal ba de rnams kyi nus pa med pa yin no //
translated: The capacity of those instances to produce the cognition of a universal alone is absent even when each of those instances is absent.

original: re zhig ba lang ngo snyam pa'i rnam par shes pa ni spyi med na med pa yin te /
analyzed: re zhig ba lang ngo snyam pa'i rnam par shes pa ni spyi med na med pa yin te /
translated: First, the cognition that thinks ‚Äúcow‚Äù does not exist without a universal,

original: rta la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rta la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist in a horse.

original: gal te yang spyi yod na gsal ba med kyang 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi nus pa de lta na yang gsal ba re re med par ci yod na 'byung ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te yang spyi yod na gsal ba med kyang 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi nus pa de lta na yang gsal ba re re med par ci yod na 'byung ba kho na'o //
translated: But even if it is not possible to say that the universal exists without the particulars, still, what exists without each individual particular?

original: 'di ltar khra bo med par ser skya'i gsal ba la ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung ba kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar khra bo med par ser skya'i gsal ba la ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung ba kho na'o //
translated: For example, without a variegated cow, the cognition ‚Äúcow‚Äù arises in regard to a tawny cow.

original: des na gal te dmigs pa nyid rgyu'i rtsa ba can yin pa de lta na yang de ni spyi dang lhan cig pa'i gsal ba rnams la med do zhes bshad pa ni de phyir /
analyzed: des na gal te dmigs pa nyid rgyu'i rtsa ba can yin pa de lta na yang de ni spyi dang lhan cig pa'i gsal ba rnams la med do zhes bshad pa ni de phyir /
translated: Thus, even if the object itself is the root cause, still, it has been explained that it does not exist in the particulars that are concomitant with the universal.

original: blo yis de rnams 'dzin pa med pa yin //üîΩzhes 'brel to //
analyzed: blo yis de rnams 'dzin pa med pa yin // zhes 'brel to //
translated: Therefore, the cognition does not apprehend them.

original: 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: 'grel pa ni /
translated: The Commentary states:

original: da ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, how is it that the cognition of a cow arises in regard to a horse?

original: spyi med na rta la ba lang gi shes pa med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: spyi med na rta la ba lang gi shes pa med pa'i phyir la /
translated: If the universal does not exist, the cognition of a cow does not arise in regard to a horse,

original: spyi yod na khra bo la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi yod na khra bo la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but if the universal exists, the cognition of a cow arises in regard to a variegated cow.

original: 'dir ni nyes pa med de zhes smras te /
analyzed: 'dir ni nyes pa med de zhes smras te /
translated: Here there is no error.

original: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i tshogs pa ni rgyu nyid de /
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i tshogs pa ni rgyu nyid de /
translated: The collection of blue, yellow, and so on is the cause.

original: tshogs pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin no //üîΩlhan cig par gyur pa de rnams las re re bsal kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa ni ma yin yang re re bsal ba yang 'byung ba de la ltos nas tshogs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ma yin par nus pa ma yin
analyzed: tshogs pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin no // lhan cig par gyur pa de rnams las re re bsal kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa ni ma yin yang re re bsal ba yang 'byung ba de la ltos nas tshogs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ma yin par nus pa ma yin
translated: That collection is the cause of visual consciousness.üîΩEven though one of those that are assembled is removed, visual consciousness does not cease to exist. But if one of them is removed, it does not arise. In dependence on that, the collection is not able to be the cause of visual consciousness.

original: no // de bzhin du khra bo la sogs par ba lang zhes tha dad pa med par shes pa skyed pa la spyi'i lhan cig byed pa can dag las re re med kyang rnam par shes pa de yod pa'i phyir nus pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro @269a * //
analyzed: no // de bzhin du khra bo la sogs par ba lang zhes tha dad pa med par shes pa skyed pa la spyi'i lhan cig byed pa can dag las re re med kyang rnam par shes pa de yod pa'i phyir nus pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro @269a * //
translated: In the same way, even though one of the many causes of the consciousness that perceives a cow as a single entity is removed, that consciousness exists because the consciousness that perceives a cow as a single entity arises from the collection of causes that are assembled. Therefore, the collection is not unable to produce the consciousness that perceives a cow as a single entity.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa po'i bsam pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa po'i bsam pa yin te /
translated: This is the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: de ltar na de dag gi tshogs pa la yang nus pa med pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'dir shin tu 'brel par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de dag gi tshogs pa la yang nus pa med pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'dir shin tu 'brel par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In that case, the statement, ‚ÄúEven though the collection of those is not able to produce it,‚Äù would be very well taken.

original: 'di bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to refute that position, the root text states,üîΩ‚ÄúThe collection of causes is not able to produce it.‚Äù

original: mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa ste zhes smos te sngon po la sogs pa nye bar bkod pa ni skabs dang mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa ste zhes smos te sngon po la sogs pa nye bar bkod pa ni skabs dang mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe incompatible is posited‚Äù means that blue, etc., are not posited as the occasion.

original: de ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ston pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin this way‚Äù indicates the teaching.

original: sngon po la sogs pa ni so so rang gi rang bzhin gyis mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa la rgyu nyid du rtogs pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis de dag tshogs pa rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa ni so so rang gi rang bzhin gyis mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa la rgyu nyid du rtogs pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis de dag tshogs pa rgyu yin no //
translated: Blue, etc., are understood to be the cause of the arising of visual consciousness by virtue of their own intrinsic nature. By that very cause, they are the cause of the collection.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag las gcig med kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag las gcig med kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
translated: Therefore, even if one of them is absent, visual consciousness arises,

original: sngon po bzhin du ser po yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po bzhin du ser po yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because yellow is the cause, just like blue.

original: sngon po med kyang rang gi rgyu ser po las 'byung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin du ser po med kyang sngon po las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po med kyang rang gi rgyu ser po las 'byung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin du ser po med kyang sngon po las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if blue is absent, it arises from its own cause, yellow, and likewise, even if yellow is absent, it arises from blue.

original: de rnams tshogs pa na yang yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yang med do //
analyzed: de rnams tshogs pa na yang yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yang med do //
translated: There is no contradiction at all because they are the cause when they are collected.

original: gang zhig med na shes pa med pa dngos su brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir re re med na shes pa med pa las de rgyu ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //üîΩde la yod pa'i phyir spyi las shes pa de nyid yin nam 'on te gnyi ga las yin zhes the tshom za ba'i phyir gsal ba rnams ni tshogs pa na ba lang rnams so zhes rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: gang zhig med na shes pa med pa dngos su brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir re re med na shes pa med pa las de rgyu ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no // de la yod pa'i phyir spyi las shes pa de nyid yin nam 'on te gnyi ga las yin zhes the tshom za ba'i phyir gsal ba rnams ni tshogs pa na ba lang rnams so zhes rtogs pa'am /
translated: Since it cannot be said that the cognition is absent when any one of them is absent, the collection of them cannot be the cause of the cognition, since the cognition is absent when any one of them is absent.üîΩSince it is doubtful whether the cognition is due to the universal alone, or to the collection of the universal and the particulars, the particulars are not established as the cause of the cognition that cognizes the collection of them as ‚Äúcows,‚Äù

original: so sor 'di la ba lang zhes rtogs pa'i shes pa de'i rgyu nyid du grub pa ma yin pa de pas na mi mtshungs so //
analyzed: so sor 'di la ba lang zhes rtogs pa'i shes pa de'i rgyu nyid du grub pa ma yin pa de pas na mi mtshungs so //
translated: or of the cognition that cognizes each of them as ‚Äúa cow.‚Äù Therefore, the example is not apt.

original: 'grel pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni sngon po la sogs pa la zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The commentary says ‚Äúblue, etc.‚Äù

original: sngon po la sogs pa dang gsal ba rnams mi mtshungs par ston pa ni /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa dang gsal ba rnams mi mtshungs par ston pa ni /
translated: To show that blue, etc., and the particulars are not similar,

original: gsal ba rnams ni zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams ni zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: it says ‚Äúthe particulars, etc.‚Äù

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te gal te spyis stong pa'i gsal ba rnams rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa byed na de'i tshe sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du 'di dag rnam par shes pa de'i rgyur 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te gal te spyis stong pa'i gsal ba rnams rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa byed na de'i tshe sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du 'di dag rnam par shes pa de'i rgyur 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: The idea is this: If the manifestation that is empty of the universal were to produce a consciousness that is in conformity with it, then, like blue and so on, it would be the cause of that consciousness.

original: gsal ba rnams ni spyi la ma ltos par shes pa skyed pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang spyi dang lhan cig pa kho nas yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams ni spyi la ma ltos par shes pa skyed pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang spyi dang lhan cig pa kho nas yin no //
translated: But the manifestation does not produce the consciousness without depending on the universal.

original: de lta yin dang rnam par shes pa 'di spyi las 'byung ba yin nam yang na spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid gnyi ga las yin zhes the tshom za ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang rnam par shes pa 'di spyi las 'byung ba yin nam yang na spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid gnyi ga las yin zhes the tshom za ba kho na'o //
translated: In that case, there would be doubt as to whether this consciousness arises from the universal or from both the universal and the particular.

original: de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gsal ba @269b so sor med kyang spyi'i shes pa 'byung ba dang sngon po la sogs pa tshogs pa'i rigs pa yang ma grub pa de bas bsal ba rnams kyis mi nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gsal ba @269b so sor med kyang spyi'i shes pa 'byung ba dang sngon po la sogs pa tshogs pa'i rigs pa yang ma grub pa de bas bsal ba rnams kyis mi nus pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, as it is said, because the cognition of the universal occurs even when the manifestation is absent, and because the reasoning of the collection of blue and so on is not established, the manifestation is certainly not the cause of the cognition of the universal.

original: pha rol po de dag re re med par rnam par shes pa de 'byung bas de'i 'bras bu ma yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩgal te de dag 'ga' zhig la //
analyzed: pha rol po de dag re re med par rnam par shes pa de 'byung bas de'i 'bras bu ma yin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir / gal te de dag 'ga' zhig la //
translated: In order to demonstrate that consciousness does not arise without each of those objects, and therefore is not their effect, he says:

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: If they do not exist individually,

original: gsal ba lhan cig byed pa can gyi spyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: gsal ba lhan cig byed pa can gyi spyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed do //
translated: A consciousness that is a universal that is a co-operating condition of the particulars arises.

original: des na gal te de dag so sor med kyang skyed par byed pa de lta na yang gsal ba la ma ltos par ni byed pa po ma yin te /
analyzed: des na gal te de dag so sor med kyang skyed par byed pa de lta na yang gsal ba la ma ltos par ni byed pa po ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even if they generate it, it is not a creator without relying on the particulars.

original: gsal ba mtha' dag med par de byed na de ltar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba mtha' dag med par de byed na de ltar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it creates without all the particulars, that would follow.

original: gsal ba gcig med par skyed pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i gsal ba gzhan yod pa yin pas de dang lhan cig byed pa'i skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba gcig med par skyed pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i gsal ba gzhan yod pa yin pas de dang lhan cig byed pa'i skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: Since it creates without one particular, it is a creator in dependence on another co-operating particular.

original: des na gsal ba spyi'i lhan cig byed pa can yin dang / spyi yang gsal ba'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi rnam par shes pa de skyed pa'i phyir gsal ba med do //
analyzed: des na gsal ba spyi'i lhan cig byed pa can yin dang / spyi yang gsal ba'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi rnam par shes pa de skyed pa'i phyir gsal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, the universal is the general co-operating cause of the particulars, and the particulars are the co-operating causes of the consciousness that produces the universal.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is explained in the following:

original: tha ga pa thag zangs med par ras yug mi 'thag ste /
analyzed: tha ga pa thag zangs med par ras yug mi 'thag ste /
translated: A weaver does not weave cloth without a warp.

original: 'ba' zhig gis mi 'thag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gis mi 'thag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He does not weave it alone.

original: de lta mod kyi thag zangs gcig med kyang thag zangs gzhan gyis 'thag la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi thag zangs gcig med kyang thag zangs gzhan gyis 'thag la /
translated: However, even if one warp is missing, he weaves it with another warp,

original: de med kyang gzhan gyis yin no //
analyzed: de med kyang gzhan gyis yin no //
translated: and even if that is missing, he weaves it with another.

original: des na de dag re re med kyang 'thag pa'i phyir thag zangs rgyu ma yin pa nyid ni ma yin te thag zangs gcig med kyang thag zangs gzhan gyis 'thag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na de dag re re med kyang 'thag pa'i phyir thag zangs rgyu ma yin pa nyid ni ma yin te thag zangs gcig med kyang thag zangs gzhan gyis 'thag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, even if each of them is missing, he weaves it, so the warp is not the non-cause of weaving, because he weaves it with another warp even if one warp is missing.

original: de kho na las zhes bya ba ni thag zangs dang bral ba'i tha ga pa 'ba' zhig las so //
analyzed: de kho na las zhes bya ba ni thag zangs dang bral ba'i tha ga pa 'ba' zhig las so //
translated: From that alone means from the weaver alone who is separated from the warp.

original: de bzhin du spyi 'ba' zhig ni rnam par shes pa de'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du spyi 'ba' zhig ni rnam par shes pa de'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the universal alone is not the cause of that consciousness.

original: de ltar pha rol pos rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pa bstan par mi nus par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar pha rol pos rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pa bstan par mi nus par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the opponent is said to be unable to demonstrate the absence of concomitance and reversal.

original: de lta na yang rjes su 'gro ba dag la the tshom za ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang rjes su 'gro ba dag la the tshom za ba yin te /
translated: Even so, there is doubt concerning the concomitance,

original: 'dir thag zangs la sogs pa'i tshul yod kyang ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir thag zangs la sogs pa'i tshul yod kyang ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because although there is a way of being like a copper pot, it is not ascertained.

original: ji ltar thag zangs med par thag pa 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung bar rtogs pa de bzhin du gsal ba med par spyi 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung bar rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar thag zangs med par thag pa 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung bar rtogs pa de bzhin du gsal ba med par spyi 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung bar rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Just as it is understood that a rope is not produced from a rope alone, without a snake, in the same way, it is not understood that a universal is not produced from a universal alone, without an instance.

original: gsal ba thams cad la song bar smra ba'i lta ba la gsal bas stong pa'i yul na de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba thams cad la song bar smra ba'i lta ba la gsal bas stong pa'i yul na de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in the view that advocates the pervasion of all instances, the universal does not exist in a place devoid of an instance.

original: thams cad kyi thams cad ma song ba la yang @270a * //
analyzed: thams cad kyi thams cad ma song ba la yang @270a * //
translated: Even in the case of nonpervasion,

original: gsal ba med na gsal bar ma gyur pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de grub par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gsal ba med na gsal bar ma gyur pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de grub par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: if there is no instance, it is not cognized as an instance, so is not that consciousness a producer?

original: yang na lhan cig byed pa med pa'i phyir yin zhes nges pa med do //
analyzed: yang na lhan cig byed pa med pa'i phyir yin zhes nges pa med do //
translated: or else, because there is no co-operating cause.

original: lhan cig byed pa nyid yin na ni de gnyi ga las skye la /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa nyid yin na ni de gnyi ga las skye la /
translated: If it is co-operating cause, then it arises from both.

original: gsal bas mngon par gsal bar gyur pa las yin na ni spyi 'ba' zhig las so //
analyzed: gsal bas mngon par gsal bar gyur pa las yin na ni spyi 'ba' zhig las so //
translated: If it is from the manifestation of the manifestation by the manifestation, then it is from the universal alone.

original: snang ba'i de ma thag pa can gyi de skyed pa ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: snang ba'i de ma thag pa can gyi de skyed pa ni ma grub ste /
translated: The production of that which has the manifestation as its antecedent is not established,üîΩbecause in the cognition of the non-different, the non-established manifestations alone appear in one aspect, and the delusion is the ground of the cognition of the universal.

original: tha mi dad pa'i shes pa la gsal ba na ma grub pa'i gsal ba dag kho na rnam pa gcig tu snang ba 'khrul pa spyi'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bsgrub pa na spyi dang lhan cig pa'i gsal ba kho na rten gyi dngos por 'thad
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i shes pa la gsal ba na ma grub pa'i gsal ba dag kho na rnam pa gcig tu snang ba 'khrul pa spyi'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bsgrub pa na spyi dang lhan cig pa'i gsal ba kho na rten gyi dngos por 'thad
translated: When it is established that the manifestation together with the universal is the cause of the cognition of the universal, then it is reasonable that the manifestation together with the universal is the basis.

original: pa yin no zhes gzhan 'dod pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: pa yin no zhes gzhan 'dod pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: This is the refutation of the assertion of others.

original: de ni rgyu nyid du ma grub kyang khas blangs nas nyes pa gzhan bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de ni rgyu nyid du ma grub kyang khas blangs nas nyes pa gzhan bshad pa ni /
translated: Even though it is not established as the cause, having accepted it, another fault is explained.

original: de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were so,

original: tha ga pa'i tshul yod pa yin yang gsal ba dag spyi la phan 'dogs na ji lta blo gcig nyid la phan 'dogs pa ma yin 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: tha ga pa'i tshul yod pa yin yang gsal ba dag spyi la phan 'dogs na ji lta blo gcig nyid la phan 'dogs pa ma yin 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: Although the weaver‚Äôs nature exists, when it benefits cloth in general, it does not benefit a single cognition.

original: gsal ba dang lhan cig byed pa can gyi spyi shes pa byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba dang lhan cig byed pa can gyi spyi shes pa byed pa yin no //
translated: The cognition of a universal that is a co-creator with the particulars produces the cognition of the universal.

original: gsal ba de dag gis phan btags pa'i spyi shes pa skyed par byed pa yin pas gsal ba tha dad pa rnams la yang don gcig la phan 'dogs pa nyid kyi rang bzhin de khyad par med pa yin na /
analyzed: gsal ba de dag gis phan btags pa'i spyi shes pa skyed par byed pa yin pas gsal ba tha dad pa rnams la yang don gcig la phan 'dogs pa nyid kyi rang bzhin de khyad par med pa yin na /
translated: Since the universal that is assisted by those particulars produces the cognition of the universal, the nature of assisting a single object is not different in the different particulars.

original: gal te 'di dag gis spyi la phan 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin so so rang gi rang bzhin la khyad par med pa yod na /
analyzed: gal te 'di dag gis spyi la phan 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin so so rang gi rang bzhin la khyad par med pa yod na /
translated: If the nature of assisting the universal exists in each of them, their individual natures are not different.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis hes pa gcig skyed skyed par 'gyur ba dang / de'i dmigs pa nyid du 'gro la rag mod don bya ba gcig byed pa mi 'gal bas na rang bzhin gcig las mi nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis hes pa gcig skyed skyed par 'gyur ba dang / de'i dmigs pa nyid du 'gro la rag mod don bya ba gcig byed pa mi 'gal bas na rang bzhin gcig las mi nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and that very nature of that sort generates a single cognition, and it is suitable to be the object of that cognition, because there is no contradiction in performing a single function, and therefore it does not diminish from being a single nature.

original: blo nyid la phan 'dogs la rag mod spyi la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di nyid la gtan tshigs gzhan bshad pa ni /
analyzed: blo nyid la phan 'dogs la rag mod spyi la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di nyid la gtan tshigs gzhan bshad pa ni /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit is only the cognition that is benefited, not the universal‚Äù is explained by another reason:

original: phan pa gang yin pa 'di ni gsal ba rnams kyi 'bras bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: phan pa gang yin pa 'di ni gsal ba rnams kyi 'bras bur 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThat benefit is the effect of the individual things,

original: de'i phyir yang blo la phan 'dogs par 'gyur gyi de la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang blo la phan 'dogs par 'gyur gyi de la ni ma yin no //
translated: and therefore it benefits the cognition, not that.‚Äù

original: gal te phan pa 'bras bu yin mod /
analyzed: gal te phan pa 'bras bu yin mod /
translated: If benefit is the effect,

original: ji ltar blo la 'dogs kyi spyi la ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar blo la 'dogs kyi spyi la ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: how does it benefit the cognition and not the universal?

original: gtan tshigs gzhan yang bshad pa ni //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan yang bshad pa ni //
translated: Another reason is explained:

original: phan 'dogs pa ni skyed pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa ni skyed pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBenefit is production.‚Äù

original: 'dir ni 'di ltar 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pa yin te de lta ma yin na 'di'i zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di ltar 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pa yin te de lta ma yin na 'di'i zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
translated: Here, the connection is stated in this way, because otherwise, ‚Äúthis‚Äù would not be tenable.

original: de'i sgra yang @270b sbyor ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sgra yang @270b sbyor ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù is possible in the compound,

original: cha snga ma bshad pa'i phyir sngon bzhin du zhes smos so //
analyzed: cha snga ma bshad pa'i phyir sngon bzhin du zhes smos so //
translated: ‚Äúas before‚Äù is stated in order to explain the first part.

original: spyi'i rnam par shes pa de skyed pa'i nus pa gsal ba las ma skyes na de'i bdag nyid la bogs 'byung ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam par shes pa de skyed pa'i nus pa gsal ba las ma skyes na de'i bdag nyid la bogs 'byung ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the capacity to generate that consciousness in general were not produced from the manifest, then the nature of that would not be enhanced.

original: des na gsal ba dang 'brel pa'i snga rol na 'di dag nyid ji lta ba nyid du gyur pa de kho na ltar gal te gsal ba dang 'brel kyang yin na ni /
analyzed: des na gsal ba dang 'brel pa'i snga rol na 'di dag nyid ji lta ba nyid du gyur pa de kho na ltar gal te gsal ba dang 'brel kyang yin na ni /
translated: Therefore, if these are just as they are before the connection with the manifest, and they are just as they are when there is a connection with the manifest,

original: de las shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa ma skyes pa'i phyir de'i tshe ji ltar gsal ba rnams phan pas ni 'di'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: de las shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa ma skyes pa'i phyir de'i tshe ji ltar gsal ba rnams phan pas ni 'di'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur /
translated: then how could the manifest be its cooperative condition at that time, since the capacity to generate consciousness from that is not produced?

original: phan pa 'bras bu ma yin yang gal te 'ga' zhig phan 'dogs par byed pa yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: phan pa 'bras bu ma yin yang gal te 'ga' zhig phan 'dogs par byed pa yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: If benefit were not the effect, then it would follow that anything that benefits would be a cause.

original: ; gal te phan pa lhan cig byed pa dag gis byad pa'i phyir phan pa 'bras bu yin mod /
analyzed: ; gal te phan pa lhan cig byed pa dag gis byad pa'i phyir phan pa 'bras bu yin mod /
translated: If you say that benefit is the effect because it is produced by coemergent benefit,

original: gang gi spyi rtag pa'i phyir de med pas na blo nyid la der 'gyur ba phan 'dogs pa phan gdags par bya ba'i skyed byed yin no zhes bya ba ga las zhes 'dogs na /
analyzed: gang gi spyi rtag pa'i phyir de med pas na blo nyid la der 'gyur ba phan 'dogs pa phan gdags par bya ba'i skyed byed yin no zhes bya ba ga las zhes 'dogs na /
translated: then why do you say that the mind itself is the producer of benefit that is to be benefited, because it is the universal of that?

original: bskyed par bya ba'i phan pa don gzhan yin pa yang sel ba ni phan gdags par bya ba la sogs pa don gzhan zhig byed na ni /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'i phan pa don gzhan yin pa yang sel ba ni phan gdags par bya ba la sogs pa don gzhan zhig byed na ni /
translated: The refutation of benefit being a different object is this: If benefit and so on were different objects,

original: phan pas phan pa bya ba la ci zhig byed /
analyzed: phan pas phan pa bya ba la ci zhig byed /
translated: then what would benefit do for benefit?

original: bogs gzhan zhig yin na /
analyzed: bogs gzhan zhig yin na /
translated: If it were a different enhancement,

original: de'i bogs mad pa kho na'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de la phan pa des ci yang byar med do //
analyzed: de'i bogs mad pa kho na'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de la phan pa des ci yang byar med do //
translated: then because it would be the nature of only the enhancement of that, that benefit would not do anything for it.

original: gal te bogs gzhan yin yang bdag nyid de la skyes pa des na bogs des 'di bogs dang bcas pa kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bogs gzhan yin yang bdag nyid de la skyes pa des na bogs des 'di bogs dang bcas pa kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the enhancement is different, then since it arises in that self, wouldn‚Äôt it be that only the enhancement is enhanced?

original: de ji ltar na des de la ci zhig byed ces brjod ce na zhes dogs pa la de de'i rten nyid yin na zhes smos te /
analyzed: de ji ltar na des de la ci zhig byed ces brjod ce na zhes dogs pa la de de'i rten nyid yin na zhes smos te /
translated: How could it be that it does something to it?

original: spyi de de'i rten nyid yin na phan pa'i rten nyid yin na zhes gzhan gyi gzhung rjes su brjod nas phan 'dogs pa med pa la zhes bya bas sel bar byed do //
analyzed: spyi de de'i rten nyid yin na phan pa'i rten nyid yin na zhes gzhan gyi gzhung rjes su brjod nas phan 'dogs pa med pa la zhes bya bas sel bar byed do //
translated: If the universal is the support of that, if it is the support of that which is enhanced, then, having stated the opponent‚Äôs view, it is refuted by the words ‚Äúthere is no benefit.‚Äù

original: phan 'dogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rten ma yin la brten pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rten ma yin la brten pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That which does not benefit is not a support and is not supported.

original: brten pas kyang phan btags nas rten rten nyid du 'gyur ba yin la rten gyis kyang phan btags pas brten pa nyid yin no zhes khar gzhong dang rgya shug rnam 'grel du bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brten pas kyang phan btags nas rten rten nyid du 'gyur ba yin la rten gyis kyang phan btags pas brten pa nyid yin no zhes khar gzhong dang rgya shug rnam 'grel du bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is explained in the Avatiira that the supported becomes the support by benefiting the support and the support becomes the supported by benefiting the supported.

original: des na phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni rten yang ma yin brten pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir na phan 'dogs pa med pa la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ci yang med do //üîΩphan 'dogs / pa med pa la rten dan @271a * //
analyzed: des na phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni rten yang ma yin brten pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir na phan 'dogs pa med pa la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ci yang med do // phan 'dogs / pa med pa la rten dan @271a * //
translated: Therefore, since that which does not benefit is neither a basis nor something based, there is no basis and no something based in the absence of benefit.

original: brten pa'i dngos po ji ltar med pa ni mdun nas ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brten pa'i dngos po ji ltar med pa ni mdun nas ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: How there is no basis and something based in the absence of benefit will be shown later.

original: phan pa byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par med kyang rten dang brten pa'i dngos po yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan pa byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par med kyang rten dang brten pa'i dngos po yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if there is no difference in the nature of benefit, the absurd consequence is that there would be a basis and something based.

original: de ste phan 'dogs pa yod do zhe na de'i tshe rten las kyang brten pa skye ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid las phan pa 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: de ste phan 'dogs pa yod do zhe na de'i tshe rten las kyang brten pa skye ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid las phan pa 'byung ba'am /
translated: If there is benefit, then since something based arises from a basis, benefit would arise from that itself.

original: gsal bas de byed pa'i phyir phan 'dogs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gsal bas de byed pa'i phyir phan 'dogs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Or, since the manifest makes it, what is the use of benefit?

original: 'brel pa ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni skye ba'o //
translated: The connection is arising.

original: spyi 'ba' zhig gis bdag nyid la brten pa'i phan pa skyed par mi nus te /
analyzed: spyi 'ba' zhig gis bdag nyid la brten pa'i phan pa skyed par mi nus te /
translated: A universal alone cannot generate benefit based on itself.

original: des na gsal ba la ltos nas de skyed pa'i phyir gsal bas phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes 'dogs na /
analyzed: des na gsal ba la ltos nas de skyed pa'i phyir gsal bas phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes 'dogs na /
translated: Therefore, if you designate the manifestation as the benefactor because it is the cause of the manifestation,

original: de las skye ba'i chos can ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: de las skye ba'i chos can ni zhes smos so //
translated: then you should say, ‚ÄúThe property of being the effect of that.‚Äù

original: ltos pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhig yin /
analyzed: ltos pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhig yin /
translated: What is this so-called dependence?

original: spyi la ni de mi 'thad de gang gi phyir ltos par bya ba de las skye ba'i chos can ni ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: spyi la ni de mi 'thad de gang gi phyir ltos par bya ba de las skye ba'i chos can ni ltos pa yin no //
translated: This is not tenable with respect to the universal because the property of being the effect of that which is dependent is dependence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na rang bzhin 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na rang bzhin 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why? Because of the relation of intrinsic nature.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin ni de nyid las skye ba'i phyir de la ltos par rig pa'i phyir ro zhes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin ni de nyid las skye ba'i phyir de la ltos par rig pa'i phyir ro zhes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the property of being the probandum is known to be dependent on that very thing because it arises from that.

original: 'di yang ji ltar zhes dogs na rnam pa gzhan med pa 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di yang ji ltar zhes dogs na rnam pa gzhan med pa 'chad pa ni /
translated: If you think that this is not so, he explains that there is no other alternative:

original: phogs dbyung du med pa can gyi bdag can zhes smos te /
analyzed: phogs dbyung du med pa can gyi bdag can zhes smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe property of being the effect of that which is not a different location.‚Äù

original: de las de'i rang bzhin skyes pa med pas ni de la ltos par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las de'i rang bzhin skyes pa med pas ni de la ltos par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the intrinsic nature of that does not arise from that, it is contradictory that it is dependent on that.

original: da lta bas na zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: da lta bas na zhes bya bas ni /
translated: ‚ÄúNow then,‚Äù he says,

original: bsgrub par bya ba mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: The conclusion of the probandum.

original: gang cung zad ces bya ba ni de nyid khyad par byed par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang cung zad ces bya ba ni de nyid khyad par byed par bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú Whatever‚Äù is the modifier of ‚Äúthat.‚Äù
