analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: If their effect is that, then it is said:üîΩIf their effect is that, then it is said:üîΩIf their effect is that, then it is said:üîΩIf their effect is that, then it is said:üîΩIf their effect is that, then it is said:

original: gang la ltos nas 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis 'dra bar brjod pa don dam par blo zhes bya ba'i dngos po gcig gsal ba tha dad pa rnams la yod pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gang la ltos nas 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis 'dra bar brjod pa don dam par blo zhes bya ba'i dngos po gcig gsal ba tha dad pa rnams la yod pa ni ma yin la /
translated: If their effect is that, then it is said:

original: 'di srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: If their effect is that, then it

original: mig la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu gcig pa nyid yin yang tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu gcig pa nyid yin yang tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eye and so on are one effect, but different.

original: 'on kyang khra bo la sogs pa de dag la nyams su myong blos gcig tu rtogs pa skyed na /
analyzed: 'on kyang khra bo la sogs pa de dag la nyams su myong blos gcig tu rtogs pa skyed na /
translated: But if the cognition that experiences the variegated and so on generates the understanding of one,

original: bdag la ni ba lang mthong ba skyes so zhes tha mi dad par snang bar zhen pa la ltos nas de tha mi dad par brjod do //
analyzed: bdag la ni ba lang mthong ba skyes so zhes tha mi dad par snang bar zhen pa la ltos nas de tha mi dad par brjod do //
translated: then, in dependence on the conception that the self sees the cow and so on, it is said that they are not different.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gcig tu rtogs pa tha mi dad par nges pa'i rgyur gyur pa na tha mi dad par snang ngo zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gcig tu rtogs pa tha mi dad par nges pa'i rgyur gyur pa na tha mi dad par snang ngo zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: For that very reason, when the cause of the ascertainment of the understanding of one is the appearance of nondifference, it is said that the appearance is nondifferent.

original: nyams su myong ba rnams 'bras bu rnam par rtog pa gcig dang ba'i phyir tha mi dad pa yin na zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dir don ma yin te rtogs pa la yang gcig nyid med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba rnams 'bras bu rnam par rtog pa gcig dang ba'i phyir tha mi dad pa yin na zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dir don ma yin te rtogs pa la yang gcig nyid med pa'i phyir te /
translated: The meaning here is not that the experiences are nondifferent because they are the effect of one conceptual cognition, because there is no oneness in the understanding either,

original: nyams su myong ba tha mi dad pa'i rgyu can gyi rnam par rtog pa rnams tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba tha mi dad pa'i rgyu can gyi rnam par rtog pa rnams tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the conceptual cognitions that have the experiences as their cause are nondifferent.

original: de dag kyang yul tha mi dad pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang yul tha mi dad pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And they are not different because their object is not different.

original: gal te rtag tu tha mi dad pa'i yul de yod pa yin na spyi nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te rtag tu tha mi dad pa'i yul de yod pa yin na spyi nyid du 'gyur /
translated: If the object exists as always undifferentiated, then it is a universal.

original: 'on te med pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'on te med pa kho na yin na /
translated: But if it does not exist at all,

original: da ni ji ltar de la don gyi chos tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa srid par 'gyur /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar de la don gyi chos tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa srid par 'gyur /
translated: how can it be possible that the object is different or not different from the thing?

original: slob dpon rtogs pa tha mi dad pa'i rgyu mi ston par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: slob dpon rtogs pa tha mi dad pa'i rgyu mi ston par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: And how can the master not teach the cause of undifferentiated understanding?

original: des na tha mi dad pa 'di ni bsams pa las gyur pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tha mi dad pa 'di ni bsams pa las gyur pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this undifferentiatedness is a matter of intention, not of reality.

original: des na de ltar lhag par zhen pas /
analyzed: des na de ltar lhag par zhen pas /
translated: Thus, because of this attachment,

original: gcig pa nyid kyi blo gcig la ltos nas 'bras bu gcig po de dang ldan pa'i gsal ba rnams gcig nyid du rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid kyi blo gcig la ltos nas 'bras bu gcig po de dang ldan pa'i gsal ba rnams gcig nyid du rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: the manifestation that possesses that single effect is established as one, in dependence on the single cognition.

original: de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni /
translated: This is explained:

original: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
analyzed: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
translated: The single cognition is the cause.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated.

original: des ni gang gi 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyi 'dra bar 'gyur ba blo tha dad @277a * //üîΩpa 'bras bu gcig ji ltar yin zhes gang smras pa'i rtsod pa spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: des ni gang gi 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyi 'dra bar 'gyur ba blo tha dad @277a * // pa 'bras bu gcig ji ltar yin zhes gang smras pa'i rtsod pa spangs pa yin te /
translated: This verse replies to the objection that if the cognitions are different, how can they have the same effect.

original: gcig tu lhag par zhen pa la ltos nas blo gcig tu brjod pa /
analyzed: gcig tu lhag par zhen pa la ltos nas blo gcig tu brjod pa /
translated: The reply is that the cognitions are said to be the same only in relation to the one who conceives them to be the same.

original: de las ni gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ni gsal ba rnams tha mi dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cognitions are not different from each other.

original: da bzhin du chu 'chu ba la sogs pa la yang zhen par byas pa'i gcig nyid khas blangs pa na 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: da bzhin du chu 'chu ba la sogs pa la yang zhen par byas pa'i gcig nyid khas blangs pa na 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, when one conceives of the water in the river as one, the similarity of the water is the reason for the conception of oneness.

original: da ni gang gis gcig tu zhen par 'gyur ba blo'i 'dra ba gang gis byas /
analyzed: da ni gang gis gcig tu zhen par 'gyur ba blo'i 'dra ba gang gis byas /
translated: Now, what is the similarity of the cognitions that causes the conception of oneness?

original: 'bras bu gzhan gyis byas so zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan gyis byas so zhe na /
translated: If you say that the effect causes it,

original: de lta na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de lta na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: then there would be an infinite regress.

original: mthar de 'di na yang 'bras bu gcig pas byas pa'i 'bras bu cis she na /
analyzed: mthar de 'di na yang 'bras bu gcig pas byas pa'i 'bras bu cis she na /
translated: Or else, in the end, why not say that the effect is caused by the one effect?

original: 'di la bshad zin te /
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin te /
translated: This has already been explained.

original: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid ni 'dra ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid ni 'dra ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The similarity of the effect is not the cause of the conception of oneness.

original: 'on kyang rang gi bdag nyid tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin las tha mi dad pa gsal ba gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba dang bral ba'i ba lang nyid khra bo la sogs pa phan tshun tha dad pa rnams kyi 'dra ba yin no zhes so //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi bdag nyid tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin las tha mi dad pa gsal ba gzhan la rjes su 'gro ba dang bral ba'i ba lang nyid khra bo la sogs pa phan tshun tha dad pa rnams kyi 'dra ba yin no zhes so //
translated: own nature, and is not related to anything else.

original: de yang 'bras bu gcig byed pa nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu gcig byed pa nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: This is illustrated by the fact that they perform the same function.

original: de rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they have the same kind of property.

original: 'di ltar chu 'dzin pa'i nus pa ni bum pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar chu 'dzin pa'i nus pa ni bum pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin la /
translated: Thus, the nature of a pot is to be able to hold water.

original: gcig gi gang yin pa de nyid ni gzhan gyi yang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig gi gang yin pa de nyid ni gzhan gyi yang ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is one thing cannot be another.

original: gcig tshul 'dzin par nus pa na /
analyzed: gcig tshul 'dzin par nus pa na /
translated: When one is able to hold water,

original: de'i tshul 'dzin pa'i nus pas stong pa'i nus pa gzhan chu 'dzin par mi nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshul 'dzin pa'i nus pas stong pa'i nus pa gzhan chu 'dzin par mi nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: another that is empty of the ability to hold water is not able to hold water.

original: des na 'bras bu gcig 'dra zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te don rnams kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni des byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: des na 'bras bu gcig 'dra zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te don rnams kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni des byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'o//
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the expression ‚Äúa single effect‚Äù is this: the nature of the similarity of the aspects of the objects is produced by that.

original: de la rtags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rtags ni 'di yin te /
translated: The reason is this:

original: blo gcig pa nyid la brgal zhing brtags pas 'bras bu tha mi dad pa gzhan ma brjod pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: blo gcig pa nyid la brgal zhing brtags pas 'bras bu tha mi dad pa gzhan ma brjod pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: because of the objection and examination of the one cognition, you do not mention any other effect that is not different.

original: 'on te de la yang rnam par rtog pa 'bras bu nyid du mngon par 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te de la yang rnam par rtog pa 'bras bu nyid du mngon par 'dod pa yin na /
translated: But if you also assert the conceptualization itself as the effect,

original: de'i tshe 'di la yang 'bras bu gzhan ci ste ma bstan /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di la yang 'bras bu gzhan ci ste ma bstan /
translated: then why do you not also teach another effect in this case?

original: med pa yin yang mngon par zhen pa'i yul ma yin par nges par bya'o //
analyzed: med pa yin yang mngon par zhen pa'i yul ma yin par nges par bya'o //
translated: Even if it does not exist, it should be ascertained that it is not the object of adherence.

original: de nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: In order to establish that very point, the text says:

original: ji ltar dngos po rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as the various conceptualizations . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: gang gi blo yang gcig tu 'gyur ba ngo bo nyid du na gcig pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi blo yang gcig tu 'gyur ba ngo bo nyid du na gcig pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But in reality, there is not even one that is unitary.

original: @277b de ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan rten du gyur pa'i don rim gyis zhes bya ba sngar nyams su myong ba byas nas rnam par rtog pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: @277b de ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan rten du gyur pa'i don rim gyis zhes bya ba sngar nyams su myong ba byas nas rnam par rtog pa'i rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: That is to say, the causes of error are the objects that serve as the basis of the error. They are produced by the conceptual thoughts that have previously experienced the objects in a sequential order.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni 'brel pa med kyi 'on kyang sre ba'i rnam pa can gyi blo 'khrul pa nyid do zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni 'brel pa med kyi 'on kyang sre ba'i rnam pa can gyi blo 'khrul pa nyid do zhes brjod pa /
translated: They are not related by nature, but rather, the cognition that has the aspect of the object is itself the error.

original: de byed pa'i sgrub pa can gzhan sel ba gang yin pa de ni de dag gi tha mi dad pa brjod do zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de byed pa'i sgrub pa can gzhan sel ba gang yin pa de ni de dag gi tha mi dad pa brjod do zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The proof of that is as follows: The exclusion of other is said to be inexpressible as being either the same as or different from those objects.

original: 'di dag gi zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gi zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúthose.‚Äù

original: des ni thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu yin no zhes gzhung btsugs nas /
analyzed: des ni thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu yin no zhes gzhung btsugs nas /
translated: This establishes the principle that in all cases, the aspect is inexpressible as being either the same as or different from those objects.

original: tshul 'di nyid kyis 'bras bu tha mi dad pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa ni shes pa la sogs pa de yang gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa na tha mi dad par snang ngo //üîΩde lta bur gyur pa'i lhag pa zhes bya ba'i dbang kho nas shes pa la sogs pa tha mi dad par rjod pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshul 'di nyid kyis 'bras bu tha mi dad pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa ni shes pa la sogs pa de yang gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa na tha mi dad par snang ngo // de lta bur gyur pa'i lhag pa zhes bya ba'i dbang kho nas shes pa la sogs pa tha mi dad par rjod pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: In order to demonstrate that the effect is not different, he says: ‚ÄúThat cognition, etc., is also perceived as undifferentiated when it becomes the cause of the cognition of unity.‚ÄùüîΩThe meaning is that the cognition of unity is the cause of the cognition of unity.

original: tha mi dad par snyems pa ni tha mi dad pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu rtogs pa'i don brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad par snyems pa ni tha mi dad pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu rtogs pa'i don brjod pa yin no //
translated: The cognition of unity is the subject that has as its object the undifferentiated, and so it is said to have the meaning of the cognition of unity.

original: gcig tu rtogs pa yin gyi rtogs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: gcig tu rtogs pa yin gyi rtogs pa yang yin la /
translated: It is the cognition of unity, and it is unity.

original: gcig kyang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig kyang yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúthe cognition of unity.‚Äù

original: des ni 'di ltar gcig ji ltar blo gcig nyid yin pa de ltar phyed snga ma rnam par bkrol nas /
analyzed: des ni 'di ltar gcig ji ltar blo gcig nyid yin pa de ltar phyed snga ma rnam par bkrol nas /
translated: Having thus explained the first half of the verse, he now explains the second half:

original: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
analyzed: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cognition of unity is the cause of the cognition of unity.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba 'grel pas rtogs pa de lta bu'i rgyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'grel pas rtogs pa de lta bu'i rgyu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The Commentary says ‚Äúthe cause of such a cognition,‚Äù and so on.üîΩThe cognition of a single pride is the cognition of the appearance of nondifference, and so on.

original: gcig tu snyems pa'i rtogs pa'i tha mi dad par snang ba'i shes pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: gcig tu snyems pa'i rtogs pa'i tha mi dad par snang ba'i shes pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: This is what is explained in the line:üîΩ‚ÄúBy the single entity of the cause.‚ÄùüîΩThe nondifference is made by mere adherence to the difference.

original: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
analyzed: blo gcig rgyu yi dngos po yis //
translated: The nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.

original: zhes bya ba de ltar gcig pa de bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de ltar gcig pa de bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said in the line:üîΩ‚ÄúBy the single entity of the cause.‚ÄùüîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.

original: gcig pa nyid ni lhag par zhen pa tsam gyis byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid ni lhag par zhen pa tsam gyis byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.

original: gsal ba rnams kyang ji ltar tha mi dad pa de gsungs pa ni /üîΩgsal ba rnams kyis kyang zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //üîΩrnam pa 'di lta bu gcig gi rgyu'i dngos pos rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gsal ba rnams kyi tha mi dad pa nyid ni de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid do //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams kyang ji ltar tha mi dad pa de gsungs pa ni /üîΩgsal ba rnams kyis kyang zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //üîΩrnam pa 'di lta bu gcig gi rgyu'i dngos pos rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gsal ba rnams kyi tha mi dad pa nyid ni de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid do //
translated: The nondifference of the manifestations is also like that.üîΩThe non

original: 'di 'ang 'bras bu gcig pa nyid mi srid par rtogs pas sngar bshad pa nyid brjod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni lan gcig ma yin par 'di thams cad bshad zin to zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'ang 'bras bu gcig pa nyid mi srid par rtogs pas sngar bshad pa nyid brjod pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni lan gcig ma yin par 'di thams cad bshad zin to zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This also is said to be the same as what was previously explained, because it is understood that it is impossible for there to be a single effect.

original: da ni mnyan pa ni sgra dang don gzhan sel ba na /üîΩrang gi don rjod par byed do zhes bya bas byed pa dang brjod pa @278a * //
analyzed: da ni mnyan pa ni sgra dang don gzhan sel ba na / rang gi don rjod par byed do zhes bya bas byed pa dang brjod pa @278a * //
translated: Now, when sound is heard, the exclusion of other objects is expressed.üîΩSince the object and the expression are understood, it is explained that the exclusion of superimposition is the direct object, and that the exclusion of other is the object in dependence on the conception of the exclusion of other.

original: rtogs pa'i phyir dngos su na de sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod par lhag par zhen pa la ltos te gzhan ldog pa'i yul can nyid dang rjod par byed pa nyid du bshad kyang byed pa gnyi ga ston pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar ma bshad pa des na /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i phyir dngos su na de sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod par lhag par zhen pa la ltos te gzhan ldog pa'i yul can nyid dang rjod par byed pa nyid du bshad kyang byed pa gnyi ga ston pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar ma bshad pa des na /
translated: Although it is explained that the exclusion of other is the object and the expression, it is not explained that it is the object and the expression in the manner of indicating both the object and the expression.

original: de ltar brjod pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa zlos par byed pa ni de de'i 'bras bu can mi bal ba zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa zlos par byed pa ni de de'i 'bras bu can mi bal ba zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to explain that, the topic is repeated: ‚ÄúIt is not the case that the exclusion of other is not the result of that.‚Äù

original: 'di dag gi tha dad pa de byed pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu can yang sel ba yin no zhes bshad zin pa nyid nges par bya'o /
analyzed: 'di dag gi tha dad pa de byed pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu can yang sel ba yin no zhes bshad zin pa nyid nges par bya'o /
translated: The difference between these is explained by the words ‚Äúbecause of the nature of non-activity,‚Äù etc.

original: don du mdo ston pa yin no zhes khong nas dbyung ba'i nges pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: don du mdo ston pa yin no zhes khong nas dbyung ba'i nges pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the sutra is being drawn out, and the certainty is being stated.

original: nges par gzung ba'i don nyid sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i don nyid sgrub pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the ascertainment itself is established.

original: 'dir phyi ma'i cha de dag las gzhan rjes su 'gro ba'i zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dir phyi ma'i cha de dag las gzhan rjes su 'gro ba'i zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Here, the latter part is ‚Äúfrom those other than that, there is concomitance.‚Äù

original: dngos ma mthong phyir zhes bya bas ni spyi rtogs par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos ma mthong phyir zhes bya bas ni spyi rtogs par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause the thing is not seen‚Äù expresses the absence of a valid cognition that comprehends the universal.

original: bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the negation‚Äù

original: ji ltar kun brtags pa la gnod pa nyid bstan to //
analyzed: ji ltar kun brtags pa la gnod pa nyid bstan to //
translated: teaches the contradiction in the imagined.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pas dgag pa ni bshad zin la /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pas dgag pa ni bshad zin la /
translated: The negation by the non-apprehension of appearance has been explained,

original: dngos po'i ngo bo gcig nyid phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes pas 'chad par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo gcig nyid phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes pas 'chad par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: and it will be explained by the fault stated in the words ‚Äúbecause of the identity of the nature of the thing,‚Äù etc.

original: de lta na de'i 'bras bu can nyid ni de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral ba nyid yin la de yang blo'i yul yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na de'i 'bras bu can nyid ni de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral ba nyid yin la de yang blo'i yul yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe cognition of that is the cognition of the object‚Äù is that the cognition of the object is the cognition of the object that is devoid of the nonobject.

original: sgra'i yul yang de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni gzhan med pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral bar rig pa yang de yin te dgos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i yul yang de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni gzhan med pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral bar rig pa yang de yin te dgos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe object of the word is also that‚Äù is that the object of the word is also the object that is devoid of the nonobject, because there is no other object.

original: de rig don gang la yod pa ni de rig don can de /
analyzed: de rig don gang la yod pa ni de rig don can de /
translated: That which has the object of the cognition of that is the object of the cognition of that.

original: brda ni de lta bur gyur par rigs so //
analyzed: brda ni de lta bur gyur par rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable to posit the convention in this way.

original: 'di yang bshad zin pa nyid nges par gzung ba'i don du brjod pa yin no zhes nges par gzung bas bstan to //
analyzed: 'di yang bshad zin pa nyid nges par gzung ba'i don du brjod pa yin no zhes nges par gzung bas bstan to //
translated: This is also stated by the expression ‚Äúthis is also stated,‚Äù which is for the purpose of indicating that this is also a restatement.

original: brda de rig don can yin pa nyid kyang lhag par zhen pa la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: brda de rig don can yin pa nyid kyang lhag par zhen pa la ltos pa yin no //
translated: The fact that the convention has the object of the cognition of that is also dependent on the adherence to the superimposition.

original: 'grel pa ni brda zhig tu byas nas yang dngos po rnams kyi phan tshun tha dad pa gang yin pa de kho na shes par bya ba'i phyir byed na mdzes te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni brda zhig tu byas nas yang dngos po rnams kyi phan tshun tha dad pa gang yin pa de kho na shes par bya ba'i phyir byed na mdzes te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary takes the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù as a term of address, and says, ‚ÄúIt would be beautiful if you would understand that the difference among things is just that.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs bshad pa de ma byed pa las tha dad par 'jug pa'i don can nyid kyis so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs bshad pa de ma byed pa las tha dad par 'jug pa'i don can nyid kyis so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For that very reason, the explanation of the reason is, ‚Äúbecause of the meaning of the engagement of the non-production of that.‚Äù

original: de byed pa'i don la byed pa ma yin pa'i sgro 'dogs rgyab tu btags pas tha dad pa ni /
analyzed: de byed pa'i don la byed pa ma yin pa'i sgro 'dogs rgyab tu btags pas tha dad pa ni /
translated: The difference of the superimposition of the non-existence of the meaning of the production of that is the exclusion.

original: de sel bar byed pas bsal ba ste /
analyzed: de sel bar byed pas bsal ba ste /
translated: The exclusion is the elimination of that.

original: des 'jug pa'i don rgyur gyur pas rnam par gcod @278b pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'thad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des 'jug pa'i don rgyur gyur pas rnam par gcod @278b pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'thad pa kho na'o //
translated: The meaning of the engagement of that is the cause, and the result is the exclusion, and the object of the exclusion of other is only tenable.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That is explained as follows: ‚ÄúIf you say that the word ‚Äòonly‚Äô is not a term of address, but rather a term of exclusion, then the meaning of the word ‚Äòonly‚Äô is the exclusion of other.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni ji skad bshad pa'i don la gtan tshigs nyid du bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ji skad bshad pa'i don la gtan tshigs nyid du bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: This proves the reason for the meaning as it has been explained.

original: brda de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral ba'i don can ma yin na ni /
analyzed: brda de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang bral ba'i don can ma yin na ni /
translated: If the word were not related to a meaning that is not the result of that convention,

original: tha snyad la de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang ma bral ba kho na la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha snyad la de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang ma bral ba kho na la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would apply only to what is not the result of that convention in conventional usage.

original: de lta yin dang nya phyis don du gnyer ba dngul lo zhes rtogs pa na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang nya phyis don du gnyer ba dngul lo zhes rtogs pa na /
translated: If that were so, then when one understands ‚Äúmother-of-pearl‚Äù as ‚Äúsilver,‚Äù

original: nya phyis la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nya phyis la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: one would engage with mother-of-pearl.

original: de'i phyir sgro 'dogs sel bas 'jug pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa nyid sgras brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgro 'dogs sel bas 'jug pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa nyid sgras brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it engages by eliminating superimposition, it is expressed by the word as being different from that.

original: gang gi phyir brda de rig don can nyid yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brda de rig don can nyid yin pa de bas na /
translated: Because that convention is related to the object of knowledge,üîΩthus, although the understanding of the meaning of a word that is designated by convention is nonerroneous, it is still an object of exclusion by double negation, as indicated by the two terms ‚Äúnondeceptive‚Äù and ‚Äúnonerroneous.‚Äù

original: de ltar brdar btags pa'i sgra'i don rtogs pa 'khrul pa med pa yin yang don la mi slu ba dang byed pa gnyis kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir mnyan pa de ni zhes 'grel par byas nas de med min las zhes byaüîΩba brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar brdar btags pa'i sgra'i don rtogs pa 'khrul pa med pa yin yang don la mi slu ba dang byed pa gnyis kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir mnyan pa de ni zhes 'grel par byas nas de med min las zhes byaüîΩba brjod do //
translated: In order to demonstrate this, the commentary says ‚Äúthat listener‚Äù and so on.

original: rang gi rnam par rtog pa ma yin pa 'bras bu mi byed pa las dngos po'i rang bzhin du lhag par zhen pa'i bdag nyid can no zhes bshad pa ni 'bras bu byed pa dang 'dra pa'i ngo bor snang ba can gyi blo skyed par byed pa yinüîΩna 'ang mnyan pa don la mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rnam par rtog pa ma yin pa 'bras bu mi byed pa las dngos po'i rang bzhin du lhag par zhen pa'i bdag nyid can no zhes bshad pa ni 'bras bu byed pa dang 'dra pa'i ngo bor snang ba can gyi blo skyed par byed pa yin na 'ang mnyan pa don la mi slu ba yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is not one‚Äôs own conception, it is not a non-producer, it is the nature of a thing‚Äù generates the awareness that has the appearance of being similar to a producer.

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa ni de mi byed /üîΩyongs spong yan lag ngo bo'i phyir te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa ni de mi byed / yongs spong yan lag ngo bo'i phyir te /
translated: But it is not deceptive with regard to the object that is heard.

original: sgro 'dogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The explanation of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is the nature of the complete abandonment of the object to be abandoned.‚ÄùüîΩIt is the cause of eliminating superimpositions.

original: zhen pa la ltos nas rigs mi 'dra ba dang / 'dres pa dang bral ba las gyur pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi don gyi yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhen pa la ltos nas rigs mi 'dra ba dang / 'dres pa dang bral ba las gyur pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi don gyi yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is an object that has a different nature from that which is dependent on conception, and it is an object that is free from the confusion of being mixed.

original: des na de rig pa ji lta ba de ltar don yod pas slu ba med pa nyid yin pas na rnam pa gnyis kyi gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na de rig pa ji lta ba de ltar don yod pas slu ba med pa nyid yin pas na rnam pa gnyis kyi gzhan sel ba'i yul can du 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, since the object exists in the way that it is cognized, it is undeceiving. Thus, it is an object of the exclusion of other in two ways.

original: don 'byed par byed pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba byed pa po yin pa'i phyir dang rang nyid kyi bral ba ma yin yang sgro 'dogs kyi dbang gis don gzhan dang 'dres par gyur pa de dang bral ba las gyur pa snga na med pa'i bral ba'i rang
analyzed: don 'byed par byed pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba byed pa po yin pa'i phyir dang rang nyid kyi bral ba ma yin yang sgro 'dogs kyi dbang gis don gzhan dang 'dres par gyur pa de dang bral ba las gyur pa snga na med pa'i bral ba'i rang
translated: It is the agent that eliminates other objects by differentiating objects.üîΩEven though it is not itself free, it becomes free from being mixed with other objects due to the power of reification.üîΩ

original: bzhin gyi don rig par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhin gyi don rig par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the agent of the exclusion of other by virtue of its own revealing of the object, and because it makes known the object that is the nature of a prior non-separation from that which is mixed with other objects by virtue of superimposition, even though it is not itself separated.

original: de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of that is:

original: de'i phyir gzhan sel yul can de //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan sel yul can de //
translated: Therefore, the subject of the exclusion of other

original: de byed ston pa'i ngo bo'i phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de byed ston pa'i ngo bo'i phyir // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is the nature of the revealer of that.

original: mnyan pas ni sgra dang don sel ba na 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba de bshad pa yin no //üîΩ'grel pa ni ngo bo nyid gcig @279a * //
analyzed: mnyan pas ni sgra dang don sel ba na 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba de bshad pa yin no // 'grel pa ni ngo bo nyid gcig @279a * //
translated: This explains that the listener engages in the exclusion of sound and meaning.üîΩThe commentary is:

original: dang bral ba'i don rnams la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dang bral ba'i don rnams la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: With regard to objects that are devoid of a single nature.

original: 'dis ni de byed min la zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni de byed min la zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the phrase ‚Äúnot that which produces it.‚Äù

original: de byed dang zhes bya la sogs pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de byed dang zhes bya la sogs pa bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúthat which produces it‚Äù and so on is:

original: phyin ci log tu snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it appears in a distorted way.

original: don med ces bya ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: don med ces bya ba brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression ‚Äúmeaningless‚Äù

original: mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par zhen pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par zhen pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means ‚Äúexcessive adherence to sameness.‚Äù

original: de mi byed na /
analyzed: de mi byed na /
translated: If one does not do that,

original: yongs spong yan lag ngo bo'i phyir //
analyzed: yongs spong yan lag ngo bo'i phyir //
translated: because of the nature of the branch of complete rejection,

original: zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: as was explained.

original: de las gzhan pa yongs su spong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa yongs su spong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other, called ‚Äúcomplete rejection,‚Äù and so on.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po yod pa'i sgo nas mi slu ba nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po yod pa'i sgo nas mi slu ba nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of non-deceptiveness in terms of the existence of a thing of that kind is

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthus.‚Äù

original: de lta ma yin na mi slu ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mi slu ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation that if it were not so, it would not be non-deceptive is

original: tha dad pa'am zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'am zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúdifferent.‚Äù

original: des na gzhan sel yul can de //
analyzed: des na gzhan sel yul can de //
translated: Therefore, in order to explain ‚Äúthe object of other-exclusion,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba bshad pa'i phyir / de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad pa'i phyir / de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said ‚Äúfor that very reason.‚Äù

original: gzhan las log pa'i don rnams la bye brag med par ldog pa'i khyad par la brten nas zhes bya ba ni des brten pa nyid du brjod pa yin la tha snyad la yang zhes bya bas ni de byed pa nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan las log pa'i don rnams la bye brag med par ldog pa'i khyad par la brten nas zhes bya ba ni des brten pa nyid du brjod pa yin la tha snyad la yang zhes bya bas ni de byed pa nyid du bshad do //
translated: The expression ‚Äúwithout distinction with regard to the objects that are the opposites of other‚Äù means that it is said to be based on that, and the expression ‚Äúin conventional usage‚Äù explains that it is the maker of that.

original: 'dir gzhon nu ma len la sogs pa don gyi de kho na ma rtogs pa rnams gzhan sel ba sgra'i don du brjod pa la phan tshun bsten pa'i skyon 'god pa yang spang ba'i phyir shing ma yin las log par te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhon nu ma len la sogs pa don gyi de kho na ma rtogs pa rnams gzhan sel ba sgra'i don du brjod pa la phan tshun bsten pa'i skyon 'god pa yang spang ba'i phyir shing ma yin las log par te /
translated: Here, to avoid the fault of mutual dependence when explaining the meaning of words as the exclusion of other, those who do not understand the meaning of thatness, such as the young brahmin S≈´ryavarman, say, ‚ÄúIf the meaning of tree is apprehended as the opposite of non-tree,

original: shing ma yin las tha dad par shing gi don 'dzin na /
analyzed: shing ma yin las tha dad par shing gi don 'dzin na /
translated: as different from non-tree,
